contents.text:
Network Working Group                                          I. Friend
Request for Comments: 5024                                        ODETTE
Obsoletes: 2204                                            November 2007
Category: Informational
ODETTE File Transfer Protocol 2
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE文件传输协议2

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: IESG Note
contents.zh-CHS: IESG注释

contents.text: This RFC is not a candidate for any level of Internet Standard. The IETF disclaims any knowledge of the fitness of this RFC for any purpose and in particular notes that the decision to publish is not based on IETF review for such things as security, congestion control, or inappropriate interaction with deployed protocols. The RFC Editor has chosen to publish this document at its discretion. Readers of this document should exercise caution in evaluating its value for implementation and deployment. See RFC 3932 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: 本RFC不适用于任何级别的互联网标准。IETF不承认本RFC适用于任何目的的任何知识，特别注意到，发布决定并非基于IETF对安全、拥塞控制或与已部署协议的不当交互等事项的审查。RFC编辑已自行决定发布本文件。本文档的读者在评估其实施和部署价值时应谨慎。有关更多信息，请参阅RFC 3932。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo updates the ODETTE File Transfer Protocol, an established file transfer protocol facilitating electronic data interchange of business data between trading partners, to version 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录将ODETTE文件传输协议（一种促进贸易伙伴之间业务数据电子数据交换的文件传输协议）更新为第2版。

contents.text: The protocol now supports secure and authenticated communication over the Internet using Transport Layer Security, provides file encryption, signing, and compression using Cryptographic Message Syntax, and provides signed receipts for the acknowledgement of received files.
contents.zh-CHS: 该协议现在支持使用传输层安全性在Internet上进行安全和经过身份验证的通信，使用加密消息语法提供文件加密、签名和压缩，并为接收文件的确认提供签名收据。

contents.text: The protocol supports both direct peer-to-peer communication and indirect communication via a Value Added Network and may be used with TCP/IP, X.25, and ISDN-based networks.
contents.zh-CHS: 该协议支持直接对等通信和通过增值网络进行的间接通信，并可用于基于TCP/IP、X.25和ISDN的网络。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: 1.1. Background
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1. 出身背景

contents.text: The ODETTE File Transfer Protocol (ODETTE-FTP) was defined in 1986 by working group four of the Organisation for Data Exchange by Tele Transmission in Europe (ODETTE) to address the electronic data interchange (EDI) requirements of the European automotive industry.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE文件传输协议（ODETTE-FTP）由欧洲远程传输数据交换组织（ODETTE）第四工作组于1986年定义，以满足欧洲汽车行业的电子数据交换（EDI）要求。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP allows business applications to exchange files on a peer-to-peer basis in a standardised, purely automatic manner and provides a defined acknowledgement process on successful receipt of a file.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP允许业务应用程序以标准化、纯自动的方式在点对点的基础上交换文件，并在成功接收文件时提供定义的确认过程。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP is not to be confused as a variant of, or similar to, the Internet FTP [FTP], which provides an interactive means for individuals to share files and which does not have any sort of acknowledgement process. By virtue of its interactive nature, lack of file acknowledgements, and client/server design, FTP does not easily lend itself to mission-critical environments for the exchange of business data.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP不应被混淆为Internet FTP[FTP]的变体或类似物，它为个人共享文件提供了一种交互方式，并且没有任何形式的确认过程。由于其交互性质、缺少文件确认和客户机/服务器设计，FTP不容易将其自身用于业务数据交换的关键任务环境。

contents.text: Over the last ten years, ODETTE-FTP has been widely deployed on systems of all sizes from personal computers to large mainframes while the Internet has emerged as the dominant international network, providing high-speed communication at low cost. To match the demand for EDI over the Internet, ODETTE has decided to extend the scope of its file transfer protocol to incorporate security functions and advanced compression techniques to ensure that it remains at the forefront of information exchange technology.
contents.zh-CHS: 在过去十年中，ODETTE-FTP已广泛部署在从个人计算机到大型主机的各种规模的系统上，而互联网已成为主导的国际网络，以低成本提供高速通信。为了满足互联网上对EDI的需求，ODETTE决定扩大其文件传输协议的范围，以纳入安全功能和先进的压缩技术，以确保其始终处于信息交换技术的前沿。

contents.text: The protocol now supports secure and authenticated communication over the Internet using Transport Layer Security, provides file encryption, signing, and compression using Cryptographic Message Syntax, and provides signed receipts for the acknowledgement of received files.
contents.zh-CHS: 该协议现在支持使用传输层安全性在Internet上进行安全和经过身份验证的通信，使用加密消息语法提供文件加密、签名和压缩，并为接收文件的确认提供签名收据。

contents.text: The protocol supports both direct peer-to-peer communication and indirect communication via a Value Added Network and may be used with TCP/IP, X.25 and ISDN based networks.
contents.zh-CHS: 该协议支持直接对等通信和通过增值网络进行的间接通信，并可用于基于TCP/IP、X.25和ISDN的网络。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP has been defined by the ODETTE Security Working Group which consists of a number of ODETTE member organisations. All members have significant operational experience working with and developing OFTP and EDI solutions.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP由ODETTE安全工作组定义，该工作组由多个ODETTE成员组织组成。所有成员都拥有丰富的运营经验，能够使用和开发OFTP和EDI解决方案。

contents.text: 1.2. Summary of Features
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 特色摘要

contents.text: This memo is a development of version 1.4 of ODETTE-FTP [OFTP] with these changes/additions:
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录是ODETTE-FTP[OFTP]1.4版的发展，包括以下更改/增补：

contents.text: Session level encryption File level encryption Secure authentication File compression Signed End to End Response (EERP) Signed Negative End Response (NERP) Maximum permitted file size increased to 9 PB (petabytes) Virtual file description added Extended error codes
contents.zh-CHS: 会话级加密文件级加密安全身份验证文件压缩签名端到端响应（EERP）签名负端响应（NERP）最大允许文件大小增加到9 PB（PB）虚拟文件描述添加扩展错误代码

contents.text: Version 1.4 of ODETTE-FTP included these changes and additions to version 1.3:
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP的1.4版包括对1.3版的这些更改和添加：

contents.text: Negative End Response (NERP) Extended Date and Time stamp New reason code 14 (File direction refused)
contents.zh-CHS: 否定结束响应（NERP）延长日期和时间戳新原因代码14（文件方向被拒绝）

contents.text: 1.3. General Principles
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3. 一般原则

contents.text: The aim of ODETTE-FTP is to facilitate the transmission of a file between one or more locations in a way that is independent of the data communication network, system hardware, and software environment.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP的目的是以独立于数据通信网络、系统硬件和软件环境的方式促进文件在一个或多个位置之间的传输。

contents.text: In designing and specifying the protocol, the following factors were considered.
contents.zh-CHS: 在设计和指定协议时，考虑了以下因素。

contents.text: 1. The possible differences of size and sophistication of file storage and small and large systems.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 文件存储和大小系统在大小和复杂度方面可能存在的差异。

contents.text: 2. The necessity to work with existing systems (reduce changes to existing products and allow easy implementation).
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 使用现有系统的必要性（减少对现有产品的更改并允许轻松实施）。

contents.text: 3. Systems of different ages.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 不同时代的系统。

contents.text: 4. Systems of different manufactures.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 不同制造商的系统。

contents.text: 5. The potential for growth in sophistication (limit impact and avoid changes at other locations).
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 成熟度增长的潜力（限制影响并避免在其他位置发生变化）。

contents.text: 1.4. Structure

ODETTE-FTP is modelled on the OSI reference model. It is designed to use the Network Service provided by level 3 of the model and provide a File Service to the users. Thus, the protocol spans levels 4 to 7 of the model.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETE-FTP是以OSI参考模型为模型的。它的设计目的是使用模型第3级提供的网络服务，并向用户提供文件服务。因此，协议跨越模型的4到7级。

contents.text: The description of ODETTE-FTP contained in this memo is closely related to the original 'X.25' specification of the protocol and in the spirit of the OSI model describes:
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录中对ODETTE-FTP的描述与协议的原始“X.25”规范密切相关，并本着OSI模型的精神描述：

contents.text: 1. A File Service provided to a User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 提供给用户监视器的文件服务。

contents.text: 2. A protocol for the exchange of information between peer ODETTE-FTP entities.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 对等ODETE-FTP实体之间交换信息的协议。

contents.text: 1.5. Virtual Files
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5. 虚拟文件

contents.text: Information is always exchanged between ODETTE-FTP entities in a standard representation called a Virtual File. This allows data transfer without regard for the nature of the communicating systems.
contents.zh-CHS: 信息始终以称为虚拟文件的标准表示形式在ODETTE-FTP实体之间交换。这允许在不考虑通信系统性质的情况下进行数据传输。

contents.text: The mapping of a file between a local and virtual representation will vary from system to system and is not defined here.
contents.zh-CHS: 本地表示和虚拟表示之间的文件映射因系统而异，此处未定义。

contents.text: A Virtual File is described by a set of attributes identifying and defining the data to be transferred. The main attributes are detailed in Sections 1.5.1 to 1.5.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件由一组标识和定义要传输的数据的属性来描述。主要属性详见第1.5.1节至第1.5.4节。

contents.text: 1.5.1. Organisation
Sequential
contents.zh-CHS: 顺序的

contents.text: Logical records are presented one after another. ODETTE-FTP must be aware of the record boundaries.
contents.zh-CHS: 逻辑记录一个接一个地呈现。ODETTE-FTP必须了解记录边界。

contents.text: 1.5.2. Identification
Dataset Name
contents.zh-CHS: 数据集名称

contents.text: Dataset name of the Virtual File being transferred, assigned by bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在传输的虚拟文件的数据集名称，由双边协议指定。

contents.text: Time stamp (HHMMSScccc)
contents.zh-CHS: 时间戳（HHMMSScccc）

contents.text: A file qualifier indicating the time the Virtual File was made available for transmission. The counter (cccc=0001-9999) gives higher resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件限定符，指示虚拟文件可用于传输的时间。计数器（cccc=0001-9999）具有更高的分辨率。

contents.text: Date stamp (CCYYMMDD)
contents.zh-CHS: 日期戳（CCYYMMDD）

contents.text: A file qualifier indicating the date the Virtual File was made available for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件限定符，指示虚拟文件可用于传输的日期。

contents.text: The Dataset Name, Date, and Time attributes are assigned by the Virtual File's originator and are used to uniquely identify a file. They are all mandatory and must not be changed by intermediate locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据集名称、日期和时间属性由虚拟文件的发起人指定，用于唯一标识文件。它们都是强制性的，中间位置不得更改。

contents.text: The User Monitor may use the Virtual File Date and Time attributes in local processes involving date comparisons and calculations. Any such use falls outside the scope of this protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户监视器可以在涉及日期比较和计算的本地进程中使用虚拟文件日期和时间属性。任何此类使用不属于本协议的范围。

contents.text: 1.5.3. Record Format
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.3. 记录格式

contents.text: Four record formats are defined:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义了四种记录格式：

contents.text: Fixed (F)
contents.zh-CHS: 固定（F）

contents.text: Each record in the file has the same length.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件中的每条记录都具有相同的长度。

contents.text: Variable (V)
contents.zh-CHS: 变量（V）

contents.text: The records in the file can have different lengths.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件中的记录可以有不同的长度。

contents.text: Unstructured (U)
contents.zh-CHS: 非结构化（U）

contents.text: The file contains a stream of data. No structure is defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 该文件包含一个数据流。没有定义任何结构。

contents.text: Text File (T)
contents.zh-CHS: 文本文件（T）

contents.text: A Text File is defined as a sequence of ASCII characters, containing no control characters except CR-LF that delimit lines. A line will not have more than 2048 characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 文本文件定义为ASCII字符序列，不包含任何控制字符，除了分隔行的CR-LF字符。一行不能超过2048个字符。

contents.text: 1.5.4. Restart
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.4. 重新启动

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP can negotiate the restart of an interrupted Virtual File transmission. Fixed and Variable format files are restarted on record boundaries. For Unstructured and Text files, the restart position is expressed as a file offset in 1K (1024 octet) blocks.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP可以协商重启中断的虚拟文件传输。固定格式和可变格式文件在记录边界上重新启动。对于非结构化文件和文本文件，重新启动位置表示为1K（1024个八位字节）块中的文件偏移量。

contents.text: The restart position is always calculated relative to the start of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新启动位置始终是相对于虚拟文件的开始计算的。

contents.text: 1.6. Service Description
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6. 服务描述

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP provides a file transfer service to a User Monitor and in turn uses the Internet transport layer stream service to communicate between peers.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP向用户监视器提供文件传输服务，并反过来使用Internet传输层流服务在对等点之间进行通信。

contents.text: These services are specified in this memo using service primitives grouped into four classes as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些服务在本备忘录中使用分成以下四类的服务原语指定：

contents.text: Request (RQ) An entity asks the service to do some work. Indication (IND) A service informs an entity of an event. Response (RS) An entity responds to an event. Confirm (CF) A service informs an entity of the response.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求（RQ）实体请求服务做一些工作。指示（IND）服务将事件通知实体。响应（RS）实体响应事件。确认（CF）服务通知实体响应。

contents.text: Services may be confirmed, using the request, indication, response, and confirm primitives, or unconfirmed using just the request and indication primitives.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务可以使用请求、指示、响应和确认原语进行确认，也可以仅使用请求和指示原语进行未确认。

contents.text: 1.7. Security
ODETTE-FTP provides a number of security services to protect a Virtual File transmission across a hostile network.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP提供了许多安全服务来保护恶意网络中的虚拟文件传输。

contents.text: These security services are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些保安服务如下：

contents.text: Confidentiality Integrity Non-repudiation of receipt Non-repudiation of origin Secure authentication
contents.zh-CHS: 机密性完整性不可否认性收据不可否认性来源安全认证

contents.text: Security services in this specification are implemented as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范中的安全服务实现如下：

contents.text: Session level encryption File level encryption Signed files Signed receipts Session level authentication ODETTE-FTP Authentication
contents.zh-CHS: 会话级加密文件级加密签名文件签名收据会话级身份验证ODETE-FTP身份验证

contents.text: Session level encryption provides data confidentiality by encryption of all the protocol commands and data exchanged between two parties, preventing a third party from extracting any useful information from the transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话级加密通过加密双方之间交换的所有协议命令和数据提供数据机密性，防止第三方从传输中提取任何有用信息。

contents.text: This session level encryption is achieved by layering ODETTE-FTP over Transport Layer Security [TLS], distinguishing between secure and unsecure TCP/IP traffic using different port numbers.
contents.zh-CHS: 此会话级加密是通过在传输层安全[TLS]上分层ODETE-FTP来实现的，使用不同的端口号区分安全和不安全的TCP/IP通信。

contents.text: File encryption provides complementary data confidentiality by encryption of the files in their entirety. Generally, this encryption occurs prior to transmission, but it is also possible to encrypt and send files while in session. File encryption has the additional benefit of allowing a file to remain encrypted outside of the communications session in which it was sent. The file can be received and forwarded by multiple intermediaries, yet only the final destination will be able to decrypt the file. File encryption does not encrypt the actual protocol commands, so trading partner EDI codes and Virtual File names are still viewable.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件加密通过对整个文件进行加密来提供补充数据机密性。通常，这种加密发生在传输之前，但也可以在会话中加密和发送文件。文件加密的另一个好处是允许文件在发送时的通信会话之外保持加密。该文件可以由多个中介接收和转发，但只有最终目的地才能解密该文件。文件加密不会加密实际的协议命令，因此贸易伙伴EDI代码和虚拟文件名仍然可见。

contents.text: Secure authentication is implemented through the session level authentication features available in [TLS] and proves the identity of the parties wishing to communicate.
contents.zh-CHS: 安全身份验证通过[TLS]中提供的会话级身份验证功能实现，并证明希望通信的各方的身份。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP Authentication also provides an authentication mechanism, but one that is integral to ODETTE-FTP and is available on all network infrastructures over which ODETTE-FTP is operated (this is in contrast to [TLS] which is generally only available over TCP/IP-based networks). Both parties are required to possess certificates when ODETTE-FTP Authentication is used.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP身份验证还提供了一种身份验证机制，但该机制是ODETTE-FTP的一个组成部分，可在所有运行ODETTE-FTP的网络基础设施上使用（这与[TLS]相反，后者通常仅在基于TCP/IP的网络上可用）。使用ODETE-FTP身份验证时，双方都必须拥有证书。

contents.text: The security features in ODETTE-FTP 2 are centred around the use of [X.509] certificates. To take advantage of the complete range of security services offered in both directions, each party is required to possess an [X.509] certificate. If the confidentiality of data between two parties is the only concern, then [TLS] alone can be used, which allows the party accepting an incoming connection (the Responder) to be the only partner required to possess a certificate.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP 2中的安全功能主要围绕[X.509]证书的使用。为利用双向提供的全套安全服务，各方均需持有[X.509]证书。如果双方之间的数据保密性是唯一的问题，那么可以单独使用[TLS]，这允许接受传入连接的一方（响应方）成为拥有证书所需的唯一合作伙伴。

contents.text: For businesses, this means that session level encryption between a hub and its trading partners can be achieved without requiring all the trading partners to obtain a certificate, assuming that trading partners always connect to the hub.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于企业而言，这意味着可以实现集线器与其贸易伙伴之间的会话级加密，而无需所有贸易伙伴获得证书，前提是贸易伙伴始终连接到集线器。

contents.text: With the exception of [TLS], all the security services work with X.25 and ISDN as transport media. Although nothing technically precludes [TLS] from working with X.25 or ISDN, implementations are rare.
contents.zh-CHS: 除[TLS]外，所有安全服务都使用X.25和ISDN作为传输介质。虽然从技术上讲，没有任何东西可以阻止[TLS]使用X.25或ISDN，但实现很少。

contents.text: 2. Network Service
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 网络服务

contents.text: 2.1. Introduction

ODETTE-FTP peer entities communicate with each other via the OSI Network Service or the Transmission Control Protocol Transport Service [RFC793]. This is described by service primitives representing request, indication, response, and confirmation actions.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP对等实体通过OSI网络服务或传输控制协议传输服务相互通信[RFC793]。这由表示请求、指示、响应和确认操作的服务原语描述。

contents.text: For the Internet environment, the service primitives mentioned below for the Network Service have to be mapped to the respective Transport Service primitives. This section describes the Network Service primitives used by ODETTE-FTP and their relationship to the TCP interface. In practice, the local transport service application programming interface will be used to access the TCP service.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于Internet环境，下面提到的用于网络服务的服务原语必须映射到相应的传输服务原语。本节介绍ODETTE-FTP使用的网络服务原语及其与TCP接口的关系。实际上，本地传输服务应用程序编程接口将用于访问TCP服务。

contents.text: 2.2. Service Primitives
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 服务原语

contents.text: All network primitives can be directly mapped to the respective Transport primitives when using TCP.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用TCP时，所有网络原语都可以直接映射到相应的传输原语。

contents.text: 2.2.1. Network Connection
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2.1. 网络连接

contents.text:
N_CON_RQ   ------>   N_CON_IND
N_CON_CF   <------   N_CON_RS

This describes the setup of a connection. The requesting ODETTE-FTP peer uses the N_CON_RQ primitive to request an active OPEN of a connection to a peer ODETTE-FTP, the Responder, which has previously requested a passive OPEN. The Responder is notified of the incoming connection via N_CON_IND and accepts it with N_CON_RS. The requester is notified of the completion of its OPEN request upon receipt of N_CON_CF.
contents.zh-CHS: 这描述了连接的设置。请求的ODETE-FTP对等方使用N_CON_RQ原语请求主动打开到对等ODETE-FTP的连接，该对等ODETE-FTP是先前请求被动打开的响应方。通过N_CON_IND通知响应者传入连接，并使用N_CON_RS接受连接。在收到N_CON_CF后，通知请求者其开放请求已完成。

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text:
Request           Indication        Response          Confirmation
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Dest addr ------> same              same              same
2.2.2. Network Data
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2.2. 网络数据

contents.text: N_DATA_RQ  ------>   N_DATA_IND

Data exchange is an unconfirmed service. The requester passes data for transmission to the Network Service via the N_DATA_RQ primitive. The Responder is notified of the availability of data via N_DATA_IND.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据交换是一项未经确认的服务。请求者通过N_data_RQ原语将要传输的数据传递给网络服务。通过N_data_IND通知响应者数据的可用性。

contents.text: In practice, the notification and receipt of data may be combined, such as by the return from a blocking read from the network socket.
contents.zh-CHS: 实际上，可以组合数据的通知和接收，例如通过从网络套接字读取的阻塞返回。

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: 2.2.3. Network Disconnection
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2.3. 网络断开

contents.text: N_DISC_RQ  ------>   N_DISC_IND

An ODETTE-FTP requests the termination of a connection with the N_DISC_RQ service primitive. Its peer is notified of the CLOSE by a N_DISC_IND event. It is recognised that each peer must issue a N_DISC_RQ primitive to complete the TCP symmetric close procedure.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP请求终止与N_DISC_RQ服务原语的连接。它的对等方被N_DISC_IND事件通知关闭。每个对等方都必须发出N_DISC_RQ原语以完成TCP对称关闭过程。

contents.text: 2.2.4. Network Reset
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2.4. 网络重置

contents.text: ------>   N_RST_IND

An ODETTE-FTP entity is notified of a network error by a N_RST_IND event. It should be noted that N_RST_IND would also be generated by a peer RESETTING the connection, but this is ignored here as N_RST_RQ is never sent to the Network Service by ODETTE-FTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络错误由N_RST__IND事件通知ODETTE-FTP实体。应该注意的是，N_RST_IND也会由对等方重置连接生成，但这里忽略了这一点，因为N_RST_RQ从未通过ODETTE-FTP发送到网络服务。

contents.text: 2.3. Secure ODETTE-FTP Session
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 安全ODETE-FTP会话

contents.text: [TLS] provides a mechanism for securing an ODETTE-FTP session over the Internet or a TCP network. ODETTE-FTP is layered over [TLS], distinguishing between secure and unsecure traffic by using different server ports.
contents.zh-CHS: [TLS]提供了一种通过Internet或TCP网络保护ODETTE-FTP会话的机制。ODETTE-FTP在[TLS]上分层，通过使用不同的服务器端口区分安全和不安全的通信量。

contents.text: The implementation is very simple. Layer ODETTE-FTP over [TLS] in the same way as layering ODETTE-FTP over TCP/IP. [TLS] provides both session encryption and authentication, both of which may be used by the connecting parties. A party acts as a [TLS] server when receiving calls and acts as a [TLS] client when making calls. When the [TLS] handshake has completed, the responding ODETTE-FTP may start the ODETTE-FTP session by sending the Ready Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现非常简单。[TLS]上的ODETTE-FTP分层方式与TCP/IP上的ODETTE-FTP分层方式相同。[TLS]提供会话加密和身份验证，连接方可以使用这两种功能。一方在接听电话时充当[TLS]服务器，在拨打电话时充当[TLS]客户端。[TLS]握手完成后，响应的ODETTE-FTP可通过发送就绪消息启动ODETTE-FTP会话。

contents.text: 2.4. Port Assignment
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. 港口分配

contents.text: An ODETTE-FTP requester will select a suitable local port.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETE-FTP请求程序将选择合适的本地端口。

contents.text: The responding ODETTE-FTP will listen for connections on Registered Port 3305; the service name is 'odette-ftp'.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应的ODETTE-FTP将侦听注册端口3305上的连接；服务名称为“odette ftp”。

contents.text: The responding ODETTE-FTP will listen for secure TLS connections on Registered Port 6619; the service name is 'odette-ftps'.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应的ODETTE-FTP将侦听注册端口6619上的安全TLS连接；服务名称为“odette ftps”。

contents.text: 3. File Transfer Service
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 文件传输服务

contents.text: The File Transfer Service describes the services offered by an ODETTE-FTP entity to its User Monitor (generally an application).
contents.zh-CHS: 文件传输服务描述了ODETTE-FTP实体向其用户监视器（通常是应用程序）提供的服务。

contents.text: NOTE: The implementation of the service primitives is an application issue.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：服务原语的实现是一个应用程序问题。

contents.text: 3.1. Model
Key: E-Buffer - Exchange Buffer F_ - File Transfer Service Primitive N_ - Network Service Primitive
contents.zh-CHS: 关键字：E-Buffer-Exchange Buffer F\文件传输服务原语N\网络服务原语

contents.text: 3.2. Session Setup
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 会话设置

contents.text: 3.2.1. Session Connection Service
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.1. 会话连接服务

contents.text: These diagrams represent the interactions between two communicating ODETTE-FTP entities and their respective User Agents.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些图表示两个通信ODETTE-FTP实体及其各自用户代理之间的交互。

contents.text: The vertical lines represent the ODETTE-FTP entities. The User Agents are not shown.
contents.zh-CHS: 垂直线表示ODETTE-FTP实体。未显示用户代理。

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 模式

contents.text: Specifies the file transfer capabilities of the entity sending or receiving a F_CONNECT primitive for the duration of the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定在会话期间发送或接收F_CONNECT原语的实体的文件传输能力。

contents.text: Value: Sender-only The entity can only send files. Receiver-only The entity can only receive files. Both The entity can both send and receive files.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：仅发件人实体只能发送文件。仅接收器实体只能接收文件。实体可以发送和接收文件。

contents.text: Negotiation: Sender-only Not negotiable. Receiver-only Not negotiable. Both Can be negotiated down to Sender-only or Receiver-only by the User Monitor or the ODETTE-FTP entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 协商：仅发送方不可协商。只收不可转让。用户监视器或ODETTE-FTP实体可以将两者协商到“仅发送方”或“仅接收方”。

contents.text:
Request           Indication        Response          Confirm
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Sender-only ----> Receiver-only --> Receiver-only --> Sender-only
Receiver-only --> Sender-only ----> Sender-only ----> Receiver-only

Both -----+-----> Both ----+------> Both -----------> Both
          |             or +------> Receiver-only --> Sender-only
          |             or +------> Sender-only ----> Receiver-only
          |
       or +-----> Receiver-only --> Receiver-only --> Sender-only
       or +-----> Sender-only ----> Sender-only ----> Receiver-only
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Restart
contents.zh-CHS: 重新启动

contents.text: Specifies the file transfer restart capabilities of the User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定用户监视器的文件传输重新启动功能。

contents.text: Value: Y The entity can restart file transfers. N The entity cannot restart file transfers.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：Y实体可以重新启动文件传输。N实体无法重新启动文件传输。

contents.text: Negotiation:
contents.zh-CHS: 谈判：

contents.text:
Request           Indication        Response          Confirm
---------------------------------------------------------------------
restart = Y ----> restart = Y --+-> restart = Y ----> restart = Y
                             or +-> restart = N ----> restart = N
Authentication
contents.zh-CHS: 认证

contents.text: Specifies the authentication requirement of the User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定用户监视器的身份验证要求。

contents.text: Value: Y Authentication required. N Authentication not required.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：需要Y身份验证。N不需要身份验证。

contents.text: Negotiation: Not negotiable.
contents.zh-CHS: 谈判：不可谈判。

contents.text: 3.3. File Transfer
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 文件传输

contents.text: 3.3.1. File Opening
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1. 文件打开

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 笔记：

contents.text: 1. Retry-later has values "Y" or "N". 2. Cause is the reason for refusing the transfer (1,..,13,99). 3. Restart-pos1 not equal 0 is only valid if restart has been agreed during initial negotiation. 4. Restart-pos2 is less than or equal to restart-pos1.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 稍后重试的值为“Y”或“N”。2.原因是拒绝转让的原因（1，…，13,99）。3.Restart-pos1不等于0仅在初始协商期间同意重新启动时有效。4.Restart-pos2小于或等于Restart-pos1。

contents.text: 3.3.2. Data Regime
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2. 数据体制

contents.text: Note: Unlike other commands, where the F_XXX_CF signal is a result of a corresponding F_XXX_RS command, in this case, the local entity layer issues this signal when it is ready for the next data request. This decision is based on the current credit count and the reception of CDT (Set Credit) from the receiver.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：与其他命令不同，F_XXX_CF信号是相应F_XXX_RS命令的结果，在这种情况下，本地实体层在准备好下一个数据请求时发出此信号。此决定基于当前信用计数和从接收方接收的CDT（设置信用）。

contents.text: 3.3.3. File Closing
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.3. 文件关闭

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: In a positive Close File response (F_CLOSE_FILE_RS(+)) the current Listener may either:
contents.zh-CHS: 在正向关闭文件响应（F_Close_File_RS（+））中，当前侦听器可能：

contents.text: 1. Set Speaker to "Yes" and become the Speaker or 2. Set Speaker to "No" and remain the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 将演讲者设置为“是”，并成为演讲者或2。将演讲者设置为“否”，并保持听众身份。

contents.text: The File Transfer service will ensure that the setting of the speaker parameter is consistent with the capabilities of the peer user.
contents.zh-CHS: 文件传输服务将确保扬声器参数的设置与对等用户的能力一致。

contents.text: The turn is never exchanged in the case of a negative response or confirmation.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果是否定回答或确认，则不交换回合。

contents.text: Only the Speaker is allowed to issue F_XXX_FILE_RQ primitives.
contents.zh-CHS: 只允许演讲者发布F_XXX_FILE_RQ原语。

contents.text: 3.3.4. Exchanging the Turn
3.3.4.1. Initial Turn (First Speaker)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.4.1. 第一回合（第一个发言者）

contents.text: The Initiator becomes the first Speaker at the end of the Session Setup (F_CONNECT_CF received by Initiator and F_CONNECT_RS sent by Responder).
contents.zh-CHS: 在会话设置结束时，发起者成为第一个发言者（发起者接收F_CONNECT_CF，响应者发送F_CONNECT_RS）。

contents.text: 3.3.4.2. Following Turns
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.4.2. 接下来的回合

contents.text: Rules:
contents.zh-CHS: 规则：

contents.text: 1. At each unsuccessful End of File, the turn is not exchanged.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 在文件的每一个不成功的结尾，回合不交换。

contents.text: 2. At each successful End of File, the turn is exchanged if requested by the Listener:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 在文件的每个成功结束时，如果侦听器请求，将交换回合：

contents.text: - The current Listener receives F_CLOSE_FILE_IND (Speaker = choice).
contents.zh-CHS: - 当前侦听器接收F_CLOSE_FILE_IND（Speaker=choice）。

contents.text: - If the Listener answers F_CLOSE_FILE_RS(Speaker = YES), it becomes the Speaker, the Speaker receives F_CLOSE_FILE_CF (Speaker = NO) and becomes the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果听者回答F_CLOSE_FILE_RS（Speaker=YES），它将成为演讲者，演讲者将收到F_CLOSE_FILE_CF（Speaker=NO）并成为听者。

contents.text: - If the Listener answers F_CLOSE_FILE_RS(Speaker = NO), it remains as the Listener, and the Speaker receives F_CLOSE_FILE_CF (Speaker = YES) and remains as the Speaker.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果听者回答F_CLOSE_FILE_RS（Speaker=NO），它将保留为听者，而说话者将收到F_CLOSE_FILE_CF（Speaker=YES）并保留为说话者。

contents.text: 3. The Speaker can issue a Change Direction request (F_CD_RQ) to become the Listener. The Listener receives a Change Direction indication (F_CD_IND) and becomes the Speaker.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 演讲者可以发出改变方向请求（F_CD_RQ）成为听众。听者收到改变方向指示（F_CD_IND）并成为演讲者。

contents.text: 4. In order to prevent loops of F_CD_RQ/IND, the Speaker may not send an F_CD_RQ after receiving an unsolicited F_CD_IND. If the Listener receives a solicited F_CD_IND as a result of sending EFPA(Speaker=Yes), it is acceptable to immediately relinquish the right to speak by sending an F_CD_RQ.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 为了防止F_CD_RQ/IND循环，演讲者在收到未经请求的F_CD_RQ后不得发送F_CD_RQ。如果听者由于发送EFPA而收到请求的F_CD_IND（演讲者=是），则可以通过发送F_CD_RQ立即放弃发言权。

contents.text: 3.3.5. End to End Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.5. 端到端响应

contents.text: This service is initiated by the current Speaker (if there is no file transfer in progress) to send an End to End Response from the final destination to the originator of a file.
contents.zh-CHS: 此服务由当前说话人启动（如果没有正在进行的文件传输），以从最终目的地向文件的发起人发送端到端响应。

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: Relationship with Turn:
contents.zh-CHS: 与Turn的关系：

contents.text: - Only the Speaker may send an End to End Response request.
contents.zh-CHS: - 只有演讲者可以发送端到端响应请求。

contents.text: - Invoking the EERP service does not change the turn.
contents.zh-CHS: - 调用EERP服务不会改变回合。

contents.text: - If an F_CD_IND has been received just before F_EERP_RQ is issued, this results in leaving the special condition created by the reception of F_CD_IND; i.e., while it was possible to issue F_RELEASE_RQ and not possible to issue F_CD_RQ just after the reception of F_CD_IND, after having issued F_EERP_RQ the normal Speaker status is entered again (F_CD_RQ valid, but F_RELEASE_RQ not valid).
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果F_CD_IND在F_EERP_RQ发布之前刚刚收到，这将导致留下F_CD_IND接收产生的特殊条件；i、 例如，虽然在收到F_CD_IND后可以发出F_RELEASE_RQ，但不可能发出F_CD_RQ，发出F_EERP_RQ后，再次进入正常扬声器状态（F_CD_RQ有效，但F_RELEASE_RQ无效）。

contents.text: Notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 笔记：

contents.text: 1. The F_EERP_RQ (and also F_NERP_RQ) is confirmed with an F_RTR_CF signal. The F_RTR_CF signal is common to both F_EERP_RQ and F_NERP_RQ. There should be no ambiguity, since there can only be one such request pending at any one time.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. F_EERP_RQ（以及F_NERP_RQ）由F_RTR_CF信号确认。F_RTR_CF信号对于F_EERP_RQ和F_NERP_RQ都是通用的。不应该有歧义，因为在任何时候都只能有一个这样的请求等待处理。

contents.text: 2. The signature is optional and is requested when sending the F_START_FILE_RQ.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 签名是可选的，在发送F_START_文件_RQ时请求签名。

contents.text: 3. If it is not possible to sign the EERP, then an unsigned EERP should still be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 如果无法对EERP进行签名，则仍应发送未签名的EERP。

contents.text: 4. It is an application implementation issue to validate the contents of the EERP and its signature and to decide what action to take on receipt of an EERP that fails validation or is not signed when a signed EERP was requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 这是一个应用程序实现问题，用于验证EERP及其签名的内容，并决定在收到未通过验证的EERP或在请求签名的EERP时未签名的EERP时应采取的措施。

contents.text: 3.3.6. Negative End Response
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.6. 负端反应

contents.text: This service is initiated by the current speaker (if there is no file transfer in progress) to send a Negative End Response when a file could not be transmitted to the next destination. It is sent only if the problem is of a non-temporary kind.
contents.zh-CHS: 当文件无法传输到下一个目标时，此服务由当前扬声器启动（如果没有正在进行的文件传输），以发送否定结束响应。仅当问题属于非临时性问题时才会发送。

contents.text: This service may also be initiated by the final destination instead of sending an End to End Response when a file could not be processed, after having successfully received the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 当文件在成功接收后无法处理时，此服务也可以由最终目标启动，而不是发送端到端响应。

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: Relationship with Turn:
contents.zh-CHS: 与Turn的关系：

contents.text: The same as for the End-To-End response (see Section 3.3.5).
contents.zh-CHS: 与端到端响应相同（见第3.3.5节）。

contents.text: 3.4. Session Take Down
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. 会话记录

contents.text: 3.4.1. Normal Close
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4.1. 正常关闭

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: The Release service can only be initiated by the Speaker.
contents.zh-CHS: 释放服务只能由扬声器启动。

contents.text: The Speaker can only issue a Release request (F_RELEASE_RQ) just after receiving an unsolicited Change Direction indication (F_CD_IND). This ensures that the other partner doesn't want to send any more files in this session.
contents.zh-CHS: 扬声器只能在收到未经请求的更改方向指示（F_CD_IND）后发出释放请求（F_Release_RQ）。这可确保其他合作伙伴不希望在此会话中发送更多文件。

contents.text: Peer ODETTE-FTP entities action a normal session release by specifying Reason = Normal in an End Session (ESID) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 对等ODETTE-FTP实体通过在结束会话（ESID）命令中指定REASURE=normal来操作正常会话释放。

contents.text: 3.4.2. Abnormal Close
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4.2. 异常关闭

contents.text: Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: Abnormal session release can be initiated by either the Speaker or the Listener and also by the user or provider.
contents.zh-CHS: 异常会话释放可以由说话者或听话者发起，也可以由用户或提供者发起。

contents.text: Abnormal session release can occur at any time within the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 异常会话释放可以在会话内的任何时间发生。

contents.text: Peer ODETTE-FTP entities action an abnormal session release by specifying Reason = Error-value in an End Session (ESID) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 对等ODETTE-FTP实体通过在结束会话（ESID）命令中指定Reason=Error值来操作异常会话释放。

contents.text: The abnormal session release deals with the following types of error:
contents.zh-CHS: 异常会话释放处理以下类型的错误：

contents.text: 1. The service provider will initiate an abnormal release in the following cases:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 在以下情况下，服务提供商将启动异常释放：

contents.text: 1. Protocol error. 2. Failure of the Start Session (SSID) negotiation. 3. Command not recognised. 4. Data Exchange Buffer size error. 5. Resources not available. 6. Other unspecified abort code (with Reason = unspecified).
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 协议错误。2.启动会话（SSID）协商失败。3.命令未被识别。4.数据交换缓冲区大小错误。5.没有可用的资源。6.其他未指定的中止代码（原因=未指定）。

contents.text: 2. The User Monitor will initiate an abnormal release in the following cases:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 在以下情况下，用户监视器将启动异常释放：

contents.text: 1. Local site emergency close down. 2. Resources not available. 3. Other unspecified abort code (with Reason = unspecified).
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 现场紧急关闭。2.没有可用的资源。3.其他未指定的中止代码（原因=未指定）。

contents.text: Other error types may be handled by an abort of the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他错误类型可以通过中断连接来处理。

contents.text: 3.4.3. Abort

|            |
F_ABORT_RQ ---->|------------|----> F_ABORT_IND
                |            |
User-Initiated Abort

|            |
F_ABORT_IND <----|------------|----> F_ABORT_IND
                 |            |
Provider-Initiated Abort
Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 参数

contents.text: The Abort service may be invoked by either entity at any time.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何实体都可以随时调用中止服务。

contents.text: The service provider may initiate an abort in case of error detection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果检测到错误，服务提供商可以启动中止。

contents.text: 3.4.4. Explanation of Session Take Down Services
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4.4. 会话记录服务说明

contents.text: 1. Normal Release
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 正常释放

contents.text: 2. User-Initiated Abnormal Release
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 用户启动的异常释放

contents.text: 3. Provider-Initiated Abnormal Release
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 提供程序启动了异常释放

contents.text: 4. User-Initiated Connection Abort
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 用户启动的连接中止

contents.text: 5. Provider-Initiated Connection Abort
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 提供程序启动的连接中止

contents.text:
Key:  *        Origin of command flow
      F_ --->  File Transfer Service primitive
      N_ --->  Network Service primitive
         ===>  ODETTE-FTP (OFTP) protocol message
3.5. Service State Automata
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 服务状态自动机

contents.text: These state automata define the service as viewed by the User Monitor. Events causing a state transition are shown in lower case and the resulting action in upper case where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些状态自动机定义用户监视器查看的服务。导致状态转换的事件以小写形式显示，相应的结果操作以大写形式显示。

contents.text: 3.5.1. Idle State Diagram
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.1. 空闲状态图

contents.text: 3.5.2. Speaker State Diagram
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5.2. 说话人状态图

contents.text:
o-----------------o                              o-----------------o
|  IDLE LISTENER  |                              |      IDLE       |

Predicates:
