4. Protocol Specification
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 协议规范

contents.text: 4.1. Overview
ODETTE-FTP is divided into five operating phases.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP分为五个操作阶段。

contents.text: Start Session Start File Data Transfer End File End Session
contents.zh-CHS: 开始会话开始文件数据传输结束文件结束会话

contents.text: After the End File phase, an ODETTE-FTP entity may enter a new Start File phase or terminate the session via the End Session phase.
contents.zh-CHS: 在结束文件阶段之后，ODETTE-FTP实体可以进入新的开始文件阶段或通过结束会话阶段终止会话。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP peers communicate by sending and receiving messages in Exchange Buffers via the Network Service. Each Exchange Buffer contains one of the following commands.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP对等方通过网络服务在Exchange缓冲区中发送和接收消息进行通信。每个Exchange缓冲区包含以下命令之一。

contents.text: SSRM Start Session Ready Message SSID Start Session SECD Security Change Direction AUCH Authentication Challenge AURP Authentication Response SFID Start File SFPA Start File Positive Answer SFNA Start File Negative Answer DATA Data CDT Set Credit EFID End File EFPA End File Positive Answer EFNA End File Negative Answer ESID End Session CD Change Direction EERP End to End Response NERP Negative End Response RTR Ready To Receive
contents.zh-CHS: SSRM开始会话就绪消息SSID开始会话SECD安全更改方向AUCH身份验证挑战AURP身份验证响应SFID开始文件SFPA开始文件肯定应答SFNA开始文件否定应答数据CDT设置信用EFID结束文件EFPA结束文件肯定应答EFNA结束文件否定应答ESID结束会话CD更改方向EERP端到端响应NERP负端响应RTR准备接收

contents.text: The remainder of this section describes the protocol flows. Section five details the command formats.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节的其余部分描述协议流。第五节详细介绍了命令格式。

contents.text: 4.2. Start Session Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 开始会话阶段

contents.text: The Start Session phase is entered immediately after the network connection has been established.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络连接建立后，立即进入启动会话阶段。

contents.text: 4.2.1. Entity Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.1. 实体定义

contents.text: The ODETTE-FTP entity that took the initiative to establish the network connection becomes the Initiator. Its peer becomes the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 主动建立网络连接的ODETTE-FTP实体成为发起方。它的同伴成为响应者。

contents.text: 4.2.2. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.2. 协议序列

contents.text: The first message must be sent by the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一条消息必须由响应者发送。

contents.text: 1. Initiator <-------------SSRM -- Responder Ready Message -- SSID ------------> Identification <------------ SSID -- Identification
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 发起者<-----------SSRM--响应者就绪消息--SSID------>标识<-----------SSID--标识

contents.text: 4.2.3. Secure Authentication
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.3. 安全认证

contents.text: Having exchanged SSIDs, the Initiator may optionally begin an authentication phase, in which each party proves its identity to the other.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换SSID后，发起方可以选择性地开始身份验证阶段，其中各方向另一方证明其身份。

contents.text: 4.2.4. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.4. 协议序列

contents.text: The first authentication message must be sent by the Initiator.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一条身份验证消息必须由启动器发送。

contents.text: 1. Initiator -- SECD ------------> Responder Change Direction <------------ AUCH -- Challenge -- AURP ------------> Response <------------ SECD -- Change Direction -- AUCH ------------> Challenge <------------ AURP -- Response
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 发起者--SECD-------->响应者更改方向--<-------------AUCH--Challenge--AURP-------->响应--SECD--Change Direction--AUCH-------->挑战--AURP--Response

contents.text: The Initiator sends a Security Change Direction (SECD) to which the Responder replies with an Authentication Challenge (AUCH).
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方发送安全更改方向（SECD），响应方用身份验证质询（AUCH）对其进行回复。

contents.text: The Responder looks up the public certificate that is linked to the purported identity of the Initiator (located in the SSID). If the Responder is unable to locate a suitable certificate then authentication fails. The Responder uses the public key contained in the certificate to encrypt a random challenge, unique for each session, for the Initiator. This encrypted challenge is sent as a [CMS] envelope to the Initiator as part of the AUCH.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者查找链接到发起者的声称身份（位于SSID中）的公共证书。如果响应者无法找到合适的证书，则身份验证失败。响应者使用证书中包含的公钥加密启动器的随机质询，该质询对于每个会话都是唯一的。该加密质询作为[CMS]信封发送给发起人，作为AUCH的一部分。

contents.text: The Initiator decrypts the challenge using their private key and sends the decrypted challenge back to the Responder in the Authentication Response (AURP).
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方使用其私钥解密质询，并在身份验证响应（AURP）中将解密的质询发送回响应方。

contents.text: The Responder checks that the data received in the AURP matches the random challenge that was sent to the Initiator.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应者检查在AURP中接收的数据是否与发送给发起方的随机质询匹配。

contents.text: If the data matches, then the Initiator has authenticated successfully and the Responder replies with a Security Change Direction (SECD) beginning the complementary process of verifying the Responder to the Initiator. If the data does not match, then the Initiator fails authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果数据匹配，则发起方已成功进行身份验证，响应方回复安全更改方向（SECD），开始向发起方验证响应方的补充过程。如果数据不匹配，则启动器验证失败。

contents.text: 4.3. Start File Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. 开始文件阶段

contents.text: 4.3.1. Entity Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.1. 实体定义

contents.text: The Initiator from the Start Session phase is designated the Speaker while the Responder becomes the Listener. The roles are reversed by the Speaker sending a Change Direction command to the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动会话阶段的发起者被指定为演讲者，而响应者则成为听者。演讲者向听者发送一个改变方向的命令，角色就颠倒了。

contents.text: 4.3.2. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2. 协议序列

contents.text: 1. Speaker -- SFID ------------> Listener Start File <------------ SFPA -- Answer YES
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 演讲者--SFID------>监听器开始文件<-----------SFPA--回答是

contents.text: 2. Speaker -- SFID ------------> Listener Start File <------------ SFNA -- Answer NO Go To 1
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 演讲者--SFID------>监听器开始文件<-----------SFNA--回答否转到1

contents.text: Note: The User Monitor should take steps to prevent a loop situation occurring.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：用户监视器应采取措施防止循环情况发生。

contents.text: 2. Speaker -- CD --------------> Listener Change Direction Listener <------------ EERP -- Speaker End to End Response -- RTR -------------> Ready to Receive <------------ NERP -- Negative End Response -- RTR -------------> Ready to Receive <------------ SFID -- Start File
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 扬声器--CD-------->侦听器更改方向侦听器--EERP--扬声器端到端响应--RTR-------->准备接收--NERP--负端响应--RTR-------->准备接收--SFID--开始文件

contents.text: 4.3.3. Restart Facilities
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.3. 重新启动设施

contents.text: The Start File command includes a count allowing the restart of an interrupted transmission to be negotiated. If restart facilities are not available, the restart count must be set to zero. The sender will start with the lowest record count + 1.
contents.zh-CHS: Start File命令包括允许协商中断传输的重启的计数。如果重新启动设施不可用，则重新启动计数必须设置为零。发件人将以最低记录计数+1开始。

contents.text: 4.3.4. Broadcast Facilities
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.4. 广播设施

contents.text: The destination in a Start File command can be specified as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: “开始文件”命令中的目标可以指定如下。

contents.text: 1. An explicitly defined destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 明确定义的目的地。

contents.text: 2. A group destination that allows an intermediate location to broadcast the Virtual File to multiple destinations.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 一种组目的地，允许中间位置将虚拟文件广播到多个目的地。

contents.text: The Listener will send a negative answer to the Speaker when the destination is not known.
contents.zh-CHS: 当目的地未知时，听者将向说话者发送否定回答。

contents.text: 4.3.5. Priority
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.5. 优先事项

contents.text: The prioritisation of files for transmission is left to the local implementation. To allow some flexibility, a change direction mechanism is available in the End File phase.
contents.zh-CHS: 要传输的文件的优先级由本地实施决定。为了允许一定的灵活性，在结束文件阶段可以使用更改方向机制。

contents.text: 4.3.6. End to End Response (EERP)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.6. 端到端响应（EERP）

contents.text: The End to End Response (EERP) command notifies the originator of a Virtual File that the Virtual File has been successfully delivered to its final destination. This allows the originator to perform house keeping tasks such as deleting copies of the delivered data.
contents.zh-CHS: 端到端响应（EERP）命令通知虚拟文件的发起人该虚拟文件已成功传递到其最终目标。这允许发起人执行内部管理任务，例如删除已交付数据的副本。

contents.text: If the originator of the Virtual File requested a signed EERP in the SFID, the EERP must be signed. Signing allows the originator of the file to prove that the EERP was generated by the final destination. If the final destination is unable to sign the EERP, it may send back an unsigned EERP. It is an implementation issue to allow the acceptance of an unsigned EERP if a signed EERP is requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果虚拟文件的发起人在SFID中请求签名的EERP，则必须对EERP进行签名。签名允许文件的发起人证明EERP是由最终目的地生成的。如果最终目的地无法签署EERP，则可能会发回未签署的EERP。如果请求签署的EERP，则允许接受未签署的EERP是一个实施问题。

contents.text: A Response Command must be sent from the location performing the final processing or distribution of the data to the originator. The Response is mandatory and may be sent in the same or in any subsequent session.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须从执行数据最终处理或分发的位置向发起人发送响应命令。响应是强制性的，可以在同一会话或任何后续会话中发送。

contents.text: When an intermediate location broadcasts or distributes a Virtual File, it must receive a Response command from all the locations to which it forwarded the data before sending its own Response. This ensures that the Response received by the Virtual File's originator accounts for all the destination locations. An intermediate location therefore needs to track the status of files it processes over time.
contents.zh-CHS: 当中间位置广播或分发虚拟文件时，在发送自己的响应之前，它必须从所有转发数据的位置接收响应命令。这确保了虚拟文件的发起人接收到的响应包含所有目标位置。因此，中间位置需要跟踪它随时间处理的文件的状态。

contents.text: The requesting of a signed EERP is incompatible with the use of broadcast facilities because an EERP can be signed by only one destination. If this scenario occurs, the intermediate broadcast location may continue and ignore the request for a signed EERP or send back a NERP.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于EERP只能由一个目的地签名，因此请求签名EERP与使用广播设施不兼容。如果出现这种情况，中间广播位置可能会继续并忽略对已签名EERP的请求或发回NERP。

contents.text: Example: Point to Point
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：点对点

contents.text: Location A sends file Ba to location B, which will send an EERP to location A after it successfully receives the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置A将文件Ba发送到位置B，位置B在成功接收文件后将向位置A发送EERP。

contents.text: Key: S - File Transfer R - Response EERP [Ba] - File for B from A
contents.zh-CHS: 键：S-文件传输R-响应EERP[Ba]-来自A的B文件

contents.text: Example: Data distribution
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：数据分发

contents.text: Location A sends a Virtual File containing data for distribution to locations B and C via clearing centres E1 and E2. Clearing centre E1 must wait for a response from E2 (for file Ba) and location C before it sends its response, R8, to location A. Clearing centre E2 can only send response R7 to E1 when location B acknowledges file Ba with response R6.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置A通过清算中心E1和E2将包含数据的虚拟文件发送到位置B和C。清算中心E1必须等待E2（对于文件Ba）和位置C的响应，然后才能将其响应R8发送到位置a。当位置B确认文件Ba具有响应R6时，清算中心E2只能将响应R7发送到E1。

contents.text: Example: Data collection
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：数据收集

contents.text: Locations A and B send files Ca and Cb to clearing centre E1, which forwards both files to location C in a single Virtual File. When it receives response R4 from C, clearing centre E1 sends response R5 to location A and R6 to location B.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置A和B将文件Ca和Cb发送到清算中心E1，清算中心E1在单个虚拟文件中将两个文件转发到位置C。当接收到来自C的响应R4时，清算中心E1将响应R5发送到位置A，将响应R6发送到位置B。

contents.text: 4.3.7. Negative End Response (NERP)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.7. 负端响应（NERP）

contents.text: In addition to the EERP, which allows control over successful transmission of a file, a Negative End Response signals that a file could not be delivered to the final destination or that the final destination could not process the received file.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了允许控制文件成功传输的EERP之外，负端响应还表示文件无法发送到最终目的地或最终目的地无法处理接收到的文件。

contents.text: It may be created by an intermediate node that could not transmit the file any further because the next node refuses to accept the file. The cause of the refusal has to be non-temporary, otherwise the intermediate node has to try the transmission again.
contents.zh-CHS: 它可能是由中间节点创建的，因为下一个节点拒绝接受该文件，所以无法进一步传输该文件。拒绝的原因必须是非临时的，否则中间节点必须再次尝试传输。

contents.text: It may also be created by the final node that is unable to process the file because of non-recoverable syntax or semantic errors in the file, or because of the failure of any other processing performed on the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于文件中存在不可恢复的语法或语义错误，或者由于对文件执行的任何其他处理失败，最终节点也可能无法处理该文件。

contents.text: The NERP will be sent back to the originator of the file.
contents.zh-CHS: NERP将发送回文件的发起人。

contents.text: The parameters are equal to the ones of the EERP, but with additional information about the creator of the NERP and the abort reason. Where the NERP is created due to a failure to transmit, the abort reason is taken from the refusal reason that was sent by the node refusing the file. Because of the NERP, it is possible for the intermediate node to stop trying to send the non-deliverable file and to delete the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些参数与EERP的参数相同，但包含有关NERP创建者和中止原因的附加信息。如果由于传输失败而创建NERP，则中止原因取自拒绝文件的节点发送的拒绝原因。由于NERP，中间节点可能停止尝试发送不可交付文件并删除该文件。

contents.text: The NERP allows the originator of the file to react to the unsuccessful transmission or processing, depending on the reason code and the creator of the NERP.
contents.zh-CHS: NERP允许文件的发起人对不成功的传输或处理做出反应，具体取决于原因代码和NERP的创建者。

contents.text: If the originator of the Virtual File requested a signed EERP in the SFID, the NERP must be signed. Signing allows the originator of the file to prove by whom the NERP was generated. If the location
contents.zh-CHS: 如果虚拟文件的发起人在SFID中请求签名的EERP，则必须对NERP进行签名。签名允许文件的发起人证明NERP是由谁生成的。如果地点

contents.text: generating the NERP is unable to sign the NERP, it may send back an unsigned NERP. It is an implementation issue to allow the acceptance of an unsigned EERP if a signed NERP is requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 生成NERP无法对NERP签名，它可能会发回未签名的NERP。如果请求签署的NERP，允许接受未签署的EERP是一个实施问题。

contents.text: 4.3.8. Ready To Receive Command (RTR)
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.8. 准备接收命令（RTR）

contents.text: In order to avoid congestion between two adjacent nodes caused by a continuous flow of EERPs and NERPs, a Ready To Receive (RTR) command is provided. The RTR acts as an EERP/NERP acknowledgement for flow control but has no end-to-end significance.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免EERP和NERP的连续流导致两个相邻节点之间的拥塞，提供了一个准备接收（RTR）命令。RTR作为EERP/NERP流量控制确认，但没有端到端意义。

contents.text:
Speaker  -- EERP ------------> Listener   End to End Response
         <------------- RTR --            Ready to Receive
         -- EERP ------------>            End to End Response
         <------------- RTR --            Ready to Receive
         -- NERP ------------>            Negative End Response
         <------------- RTR --            Ready to Receive
         -- SFID ------------>            Start File
                   or
         -- CD -------------->            Exchange the turn
After sending an EERP or NERP, the Speaker must wait for an RTR before sending any other commands. The only acceptable commands to follow are:
contents.zh-CHS: 在发送EERP或NERP后，扬声器在发送任何其他命令之前必须等待RTR。以下是唯一可接受的命令：

contents.text: EERP NERP SFID or CD (if there are no more EERPs or NERPs to be sent)
contents.zh-CHS: EERP NERP SFID或CD（如果不再发送EERP或NERP）

contents.text: 4.4. Data Transfer Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4. 数据传输阶段

contents.text: Virtual File data flows from the Speaker to the Listener during the Data Transfer phase, which is entered after the Start File phase.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件数据在数据传输阶段从说话人流向听话人，该阶段在开始文件阶段之后输入。

contents.text: 4.4.1. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4.1. 协议序列

contents.text: To avoid congestion at the protocol level, a flow control mechanism is provided via the Set Credit (CDT) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免协议级别的拥塞，通过Set Credit（CDT）命令提供了流控制机制。

contents.text: A Credit limit is negotiated in the Start Session phase; this represents the number of Data Exchange Buffers that the Speaker may send before it is obliged to wait for a Credit command from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 在启动会话阶段协商信用额度；这表示演讲者在被迫等待来自听者的信用命令之前可能发送的数据交换缓冲区的数量。

contents.text: The available credit is initially set to the negotiated value by the Start File positive answer, which acts as an implicit Credit command. The Speaker decreases the available credit count by one for each data buffer sent to the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 可用信用最初由启动文件肯定应答设置为协商值，该应答充当隐式信用命令。对于发送给侦听器的每个数据缓冲区，扬声器将可用信用计数减少一。

contents.text: When the available credit is exhausted, the Speaker must wait for a Credit command from the Listener; otherwise, a protocol error will occur and the session will be aborted.
contents.zh-CHS: 当可用信用耗尽时，演讲者必须等待听者发出信用命令；否则，将发生协议错误，会话将中止。

contents.text: The Listener should endeavour to send the Credit command without delay to prevent the Speaker blocking.
contents.zh-CHS: 听者应尽力毫不延迟地发送信用命令，以防止说话者阻塞。

contents.text: 1. Speaker -- SFID ------------> Listener Start File <------------ SFPA -- Answer YES
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 演讲者--SFID------>监听器开始文件<-----------SFPA--回答是

contents.text: 2. If the credit value is set to 2
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 如果信用值设置为2

contents.text:
Speaker  -- Data ------------> Listener   Start File
         -- Data ------------>
         <------------- CDT --            Set Credit
         -- Data ------------>
         -- EFID ------------>            End File
4.5. End File Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5. 结束文件阶段

contents.text: 4.5.1. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5.1. 协议序列

contents.text: The Speaker notifies the Listener that it has finished sending a Virtual File by sending an End File (EFID) command. The Listener replies with a positive or negative End File command and has the option to request a Change Direction command from the Speaker.
contents.zh-CHS: 扬声器通过发送结束文件（EFID）命令通知侦听器它已完成发送虚拟文件。侦听器使用肯定或否定的结束文件命令进行回复，并可以选择请求扬声器发出更改方向命令。

contents.text: 1. Speaker -- EFID ------------> Listener End File <------------ EFPA -- Answer YES
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 演讲者--EFID------>监听器结束文件<-----------EFPA--回答是

contents.text: 2. Speaker -- EFID ------------> Listener End File <------------ EFPA -- Answer YES + CD -- CD --------------> Change Direction Listener <------------ EERP -- Speaker End to End Response -------------- RTR -> Ready to Receive Listener <------------ NERP -- Speaker Negative End Response -------------- RTR -> Ready to Receive Go to Start File Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 扬声器--EFID-------->侦听器结束文件--EFPA--回答是+CD--CD-------->更改方向侦听器--EERP--扬声器端到端响应--RTR->准备接收侦听器--NERP--扬声器负端响应--RTR->准备接收转到开始文件阶段

contents.text: 3. Speaker -- EFID ------------> Listener End File <------------ EFNA -- Answer NO
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 说话人--EFID------>侦听器结束文件<-------EFNA--回答否

contents.text: 4.6. End Session Phase
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6. 结束会话阶段

contents.text: 4.6.1. Protocol Sequence
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6.1. 协议序列

contents.text: The Speaker terminates the session by sending an End Session (ESID) command. The Speaker may only do this if the Listener has just relinquished its role as speaker.
contents.zh-CHS: 演讲者通过发送结束会话（ESID）命令来终止会话。演讲者只有在听者刚刚放弃演讲者的角色时才能这样做。

contents.text: 1. Speaker -- EFID ------------> Listener End File <------------ EFPA -- Answer YES -- CD --------------> Change Direction Listener <------------ ESID -- Speaker End Session
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 演讲者--EFID-------->侦听器结束文件--EFPA--回答是--CD-------->更改方向侦听器--ESID--演讲者结束会话

contents.text: 4.7. Problem Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7. 问题处理

contents.text: Error detection and handling should be done as close as possible to the problem. This aids problem determination and correction. Each layer of the reference model is responsible for its own error handling.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误检测和处理应尽可能靠近问题。这有助于确定和纠正问题。参考模型的每一层都负责自己的错误处理。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP can detect protocol errors by virtue of its state machine and uses activity timers to detect session hang conditions. These mechanisms are separate from the End to End controls.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP可以借助其状态机检测协议错误，并使用活动计时器检测会话挂起情况。这些机制与端到端控件是分开的。

contents.text: 4.7.1. Protocol Errors
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.1. 协议错误

contents.text: If a protocol error occurs, the session will be terminated and application activity aborted. Both locations enter the IDLE state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果发生协议错误，会话将终止，应用程序活动将中止。两个位置都进入空闲状态。

contents.text: 4.7.2. Timers

To protect against application and network hang conditions, ODETTE-FTP uses activity timers for all situations where a response is required. The timers and actions to be taken if they expire are described in Section 9, "Protocol State Machine".
contents.zh-CHS: 为了防止应用程序和网络挂起情况，ODETTE-FTP在需要响应的所有情况下都使用活动计时器。第9节“协议状态机”中描述了计时器和过期时要采取的措施。

contents.text: 4.7.3. Clearing Centres
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7.3. 结算中心

contents.text: The use of clearing centres introduces the possibility of errors occurring as a result of data processing activities within the centre. Such errors are not directly related to ODETTE-FTP or the communication network and are therefore outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 清算中心的使用引入了由于中心内的数据处理活动而发生错误的可能性。此类错误与ODETTE-FTP或通信网络没有直接关系，因此不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: 5. Commands and Formats
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 命令和格式

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP entities communicate via Exchange Buffers. The Command Exchange Buffers are described below. Virtual File data is carried in Data Exchange Buffers, which are described in Section 7.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP实体通过交换缓冲区进行通信。命令交换缓冲区描述如下。虚拟文件数据在数据交换缓冲区中传输，如第7节所述。

contents.text: 5.1. Conventions
5.1.1. Representation Unit
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.1. 代表单位

contents.text: The basic unit of information is an octet, containing 8 bits.
contents.zh-CHS: 信息的基本单位是八位字节，包含8位。

contents.text: 5.1.2. Values and Characters
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.2. 值和字符

contents.text: The ISO 646 IRV 7-bit coded character set [ISO-646], according to Appendix B, is used to encode constants and strings within Command Exchange Buffers except where [UTF-8] is explicitly indicated against a field.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据附录B，ISO 646 IRV 7位编码字符集[ISO-646]用于对命令交换缓冲区内的常量和字符串进行编码，除非[UTF-8]在字段中明确指示。

contents.text: 5.2. Commands

A Command Exchange Buffer contains a single command starting at the beginning of the buffer. Commands and data are never mixed within an Exchange Buffer. Commands cannot be compressed. Variable-length parameters may be omitted entirely if not required and the associated length indicator field set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令交换缓冲区包含从缓冲区开始的单个命令。命令和数据永远不会在Exchange缓冲区中混合。命令不能被压缩。如果不需要，可变长度参数可以完全省略，并且相关的长度指示器字段设置为零。

contents.text: Components:
contents.zh-CHS: 组件：

contents.text: 1. Command identifier:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 命令标识符：

contents.text: The first octet of an Exchange Buffer is the Command Identifier and defines the format of the buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区的第一个八位字节是命令标识符，定义缓冲区的格式。

contents.text: 2. Parameter(s):
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 参数：

contents.text: Command parameters are stored in fields within a Command Exchange Buffer. Where variable-length fields are used, they are preceded with a header field indicating the length. All values are required except where explicitly indicated.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令参数存储在命令交换缓冲区内的字段中。在使用可变长度字段的情况下，它们前面会有一个指示长度的标题字段。除明确指示外，所有值都是必需的。

contents.text: 5.3. Command Formats
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 命令格式

contents.text: The ODETTE-FTP commands are described below using the following definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面使用以下定义描述ODETTE-FTP命令。

contents.text: Position (Pos)
contents.zh-CHS: 位置（Pos）

contents.text: Field offset within the Command Exchange Buffer, relative to a zero origin.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令交换缓冲区内相对于零原点的字段偏移量。

contents.text: Field
contents.zh-CHS: 领域

contents.text: The name of the field.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段的名称。

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: A description of the field.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段的描述。

contents.text: Format
contents.zh-CHS: 总体安排

contents.text: F - A field containing fixed values. All allowable values for the field are enumerated in the command definition.
contents.zh-CHS: F-包含固定值的字段。该字段的所有允许值都在命令定义中枚举。

contents.text: V - A field with variable values within a defined range. For example, the SFIDLRECL field may contain any integer value between 00000 and 99999.
contents.zh-CHS: V-在定义范围内具有可变值的字段。例如，SFIDLRECL字段可能包含00000到99999之间的任何整数值。

contents.text: X(n) - An alphanumeric field of length n octets.
contents.zh-CHS: X（n）-长度为n个八位字节的字母数字字段。

contents.text: A String contains alphanumeric characters from the following set:
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串包含以下集合中的字母数字字符：

contents.text: The numerals: 0 to 9 The upper case letters: A to Z The following special set: / - . & ( ) space.
contents.zh-CHS: 数字：0到9大写字母：A到Z以下特殊集合：/-.&（）空间。

contents.text: Space is not allowed as an embedded character.
contents.zh-CHS: 不允许将空格作为嵌入字符。

contents.text: 9(n) - A numeric field of length n octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 9（n）-长度为n个八位字节的数字字段。

contents.text: U(n) - A binary field of length n octets.
contents.zh-CHS: U（n）-长度为n个八位字节的二进制字段。

contents.text: Numbers encoded as binary are always unsigned and in network byte order.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码为二进制的数字总是无符号的，并且按网络字节顺序。

contents.text: T(n) - An field of length n octets, encoded using [UTF-8].
contents.zh-CHS: T（n）-长度为n个八位字节的字段，使用[UTF-8]编码。

contents.text: String and alphanumeric fields are always left justified and right padded with spaces where needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串和字母数字字段总是左对齐，需要时用空格右填充。

contents.text: Numeric fields are always right justified and left padded with zeros where needed.
contents.zh-CHS: 数字字段总是右对齐，需要时用零填充。

contents.text: Reserved fields should be padded with spaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留字段应填充空格。

contents.text: 5.3.1. SSRM - Start Session Ready Message
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.1. SSRM-启动会话就绪消息

contents.text: SSRMCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSRMCD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'I' SSRM Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“I”SSRM命令标识符。

contents.text: SSRMMSG Ready Message String(17)
contents.zh-CHS: SSRMMSG就绪消息字符串（17）

contents.text: Value: 'ODETTE FTP READY '
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“ODETTE FTP就绪”

contents.text: SSRMCR Carriage Return Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSRMCR回车符

contents.text: Value: Character with hex value '0D' or '8D'.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：具有十六进制值“0D”或“8D”的字符。

contents.text: 5.3.2. SSID - Start Session
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.2. SSID-启动会话

contents.text:
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
|       SSID        Start Session                                   |
|                                                                   |
|       Start Session Phase     Initiator <---> Responder           |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Pos | Field     | Description                           | Format  |
|-----+-----------+---------------------------------------+---------|
|   0 | SSIDCMD   | SSID Command 'X'                      | F X(1)  |
|   1 | SSIDLEV   | Protocol Release Level                | F 9(1)  |
|   2 | SSIDCODE  | Initiator's Identification Code       | V X(25) |
|  27 | SSIDPSWD  | Initiator's Password                  | V X(8)  |
|  35 | SSIDSDEB  | Data Exchange Buffer Size             | V 9(5)  |
|  40 | SSIDSR    | Send / Receive Capabilities (S/R/B)   | F X(1)  |
|  41 | SSIDCMPR  | Buffer Compression Indicator (Y/N)    | F X(1)  |
|  42 | SSIDREST  | Restart Indicator (Y/N)               | F X(1)  |
|  43 | SSIDSPEC  | Special Logic Indicator (Y/N)         | F X(1)  |
|  44 | SSIDCRED  | Credit                                | V 9(3)  |
|  47 | SSIDAUTH  | Secure Authentication (Y/N)           | F X(1)  |
|  48 | SSIDRSV1  | Reserved                              | F X(4)  |
|  52 | SSIDUSER  | User Data                             | V X(8)  |
|  60 | SSIDCR    | Carriage Return                       | F X(1)  |
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
SSIDCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'X' SSID Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“X”SSID命令标识符。

contents.text: SSIDLEV Protocol Release Level Numeric(1)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDLEV协议发布级别数字（1）

contents.text: Used to specify the level of the ODETTE-FTP protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 用于指定ODETTE-FTP协议的级别

contents.text: Value: '1' for Revision 1.2 '2' for Revision 1.3 '4' for Revision 1.4 '5' for Revision 2.0
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“1”表示修订版1.2“2”表示修订版1.3“4”表示修订版1.4“5”表示修订版2.0

contents.text: Future release levels will have higher numbers. The protocol release level is negotiable, with the lowest level being selected.
contents.zh-CHS: 未来的发布级别将有更高的数字。协议发布级别可以协商，选择最低级别。

contents.text: Note: ODETTE File Transfer Protocol 1.3 (RFC 2204) specifies '1' for the release level, despite adhering to revision 1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：ODETTE文件传输协议1.3（RFC 2204）规定发布级别为“1”，尽管遵守版本1.3。

contents.text: SSIDCODE Initiator's Identification Code String(25)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDCODE启动器的标识码字符串（25）

contents.text: Format: See Identification Code (Section 5.4)
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：见识别码（第5.4节）

contents.text: Uniquely identifies the Initiator (sender) participating in the ODETTE-FTP session.
contents.zh-CHS: 唯一标识参与ODETTE-FTP会话的启动器（发送方）。

contents.text: It is an application implementation issue to link the expected [X.509] certificate to the SSIDCODE provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 将预期的[X.509]证书链接到提供的SSIDCODE是应用程序实现问题。

contents.text: SSIDPSWD Initiator's Password String(8)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDPSWD启动器的密码字符串（8）

contents.text: Key to authenticate the sender. Assigned by bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 验证发件人身份的密钥。通过双边协议转让。

contents.text: SSIDSDEB Data Exchange Buffer Size Numeric(5)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDSDEB数据交换缓冲区大小数字（5）

contents.text: Minimum: 128 Maximum: 99999
The length, in octets, of the largest Data Exchange Buffer that can be accepted by the location. The length includes the command octet but does not include the Stream Transmission Header.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置可以接受的最大数据交换缓冲区的长度（以八位字节为单位）。长度包括命令八位字节，但不包括流传输头。

contents.text: After negotiation, the smallest size will be selected.
contents.zh-CHS: 协商后，将选择最小尺寸。

contents.text: SSIDSR Send / Receive Capabilities Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDSR发送/接收功能字符

contents.text: Value: 'S' Location can only send files. 'R' Location can only receive files. 'B' Location can both send and receive files.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“S”位置只能发送文件R'位置只能接收文件。'“B”位置可以发送和接收文件。

contents.text: Sending and receiving will be serialised during the session, so parallel transmissions will not take place in the same session.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送和接收将在会话期间序列化，因此并行传输不会在同一会话中发生。

contents.text: An error occurs if adjacent locations both specify the send or receive capability.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果相邻位置都指定了发送或接收功能，则会发生错误。

contents.text: SSIDCMPR Buffer Compression Indicator Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDCMPR缓冲区压缩指示符字符

contents.text: Value: 'Y' The location can handle OFTP data buffer compression 'N' The location cannot handle OFTP buffer compression
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“Y”该位置可以处理OFTP数据缓冲区压缩“N”该位置无法处理OFTP缓冲区压缩

contents.text: Compression is only used if supported by both locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当两个位置都支持时才使用压缩。

contents.text: The compression mechanism referred to here applies to each individual OFTP data buffer. This is different from the file compression mechanism in OFTP, which involves the compression of whole files.
contents.zh-CHS: 这里提到的压缩机制适用于每个单独的OFTP数据缓冲区。这与OFTP中的文件压缩机制不同，后者涉及整个文件的压缩。

contents.text: SSIDREST Restart Indicator Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDREST重新启动指示符字符

contents.text: Value: 'Y' The location can handle the restart of a partially transmitted file. 'N' The location cannot restart a file.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“Y”该位置可以处理部分传输文件的重新启动N'该位置无法重新启动文件。

contents.text: SSIDSPEC Special Logic Indicator Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDSPEC特殊逻辑指示器字符

contents.text: Value: 'Y' Location can handle Special Logic 'N' Location cannot handle Special Logic
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“Y”位置可以处理特殊逻辑“N”位置无法处理特殊逻辑

contents.text: Special Logic is only used if supported by both locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当两个位置都支持时，才使用特殊逻辑。

contents.text: The Special Logic extensions are only useful to access an X.25 network via an asynchronous entry and are not supported for TCP/IP connections.
contents.zh-CHS: 特殊逻辑扩展仅用于通过异步条目访问X.25网络，不支持TCP/IP连接。

contents.text: SSIDCRED Credit Numeric(3)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDCRED信用数字（3）

contents.text: Maximum: 999
contents.zh-CHS: 最高限额：999

contents.text: The number of consecutive Data Exchange Buffers sent by the Speaker before it must wait for a Credit (CDT) command from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 在必须等待来自侦听器的Credit（CDT）命令之前，扬声器发送的连续数据交换缓冲区数。

contents.text: The credit value is only applied to Data flow in the Data Transfer phase.
contents.zh-CHS: 信用值仅应用于数据传输阶段的数据流。

contents.text: The Speaker's available credit is initialised to SSIDCRED when it receives a Start File Positive Answer (SFPA) command from the Listener. It is zeroed by the End File (EFID) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 当演讲者从听者处收到开始文件肯定应答（SFPA）命令时，演讲者的可用信用被初始化为SSIDCRED。它由End File（EFID）命令归零。

contents.text: After negotiation, the smallest size must be selected in the answer of the Responder, otherwise a protocol error will abort the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 协商后，必须在响应者的回答中选择最小的大小，否则协议错误将中止会话。

contents.text: Negotiation of the "credit-window-size" parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 协商“信贷窗口大小”参数。

contents.text:
Window Size m  -- SSID ------------>
               <------------ SSID --  Window Size n
                                     (n less than or
                                      equal to m)
Note: negotiated value will be "n".
SSIDAUTH Secure Authentication Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDAUTH安全身份验证字符

contents.text: Value: 'Y' The location requires secure authentication. 'N' The location does not require secure authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“Y”该位置需要安全身份验证N'该位置不需要安全身份验证。

contents.text: Secure authentication is only used if agreed by both locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有在双方同意的情况下，才使用安全身份验证。

contents.text: If the answer of the Responder does not match with the authentication requirements of the Initiator, then the Initiator must abort the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应者的回答与启动器的身份验证要求不匹配，则启动器必须中止会话。

contents.text: No negotiation of authentication is allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: 不允许协商身份验证。

contents.text:
authentication p  -- SSID ------------>
                  <------------ SSID --  authentication q
p == q -> continue. p != q -> abort.
contents.zh-CHS: p==q->继续。p！=q->中止。

contents.text: SSIDRSV1 Reserved String(4)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDRSV1保留字符串（4）

contents.text: This field is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段保留供将来使用。

contents.text: SSIDUSER User Data String(8)
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDUSER用户数据字符串（8）

contents.text: May be used by ODETTE-FTP in any way. If unused, it should be initialised to spaces. It is expected that a bilateral agreement exists as to the meaning of the data.
contents.zh-CHS: 可由ODETTE-FTP以任何方式使用。如果未使用，则应将其初始化为空格。预计将就数据的含义达成双边协议。

contents.text: SSIDCR Carriage Return Character
contents.zh-CHS: SSIDCR回车符

contents.text: Value: Character with hex value '0D' or '8D'.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：具有十六进制值“0D”或“8D”的字符。

contents.text: 5.3.3. SFID - Start File
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.3. SFID-开始文件

contents.text:
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
|       SFID        Start File                                      |
|                                                                   |
|       Start File Phase           Speaker ----> Listener           |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Pos | Field     | Description                           | Format  |
|-----+-----------+---------------------------------------+---------|
|   0 | SFIDCMD   | SFID Command, 'H'                     | F X(1)  |
|   1 | SFIDDSN   | Virtual File Dataset Name             | V X(26) |
|  27 | SFIDRSV1  | Reserved                              | F X(3)  |
|  30 | SFIDDATE  | Virtual File Date stamp, (CCYYMMDD)   | V 9(8)  |
|  38 | SFIDTIME  | Virtual File Time stamp, (HHMMSScccc) | V 9(10) |
|  48 | SFIDUSER  | User Data                             | V X(8)  |
|  56 | SFIDDEST  | Destination                           | V X(25) |
|  81 | SFIDORIG  | Originator                            | V X(25) |
| 106 | SFIDFMT   | File Format (F/V/U/T)                 | F X(1)  |
| 107 | SFIDLRECL | Maximum Record Size                   | V 9(5)  |
| 112 | SFIDFSIZ  | File Size, 1K blocks                  | V 9(13) |
| 125 | SFIDOSIZ  | Original File Size, 1K blocks         | V 9(13) |
| 138 | SFIDREST  | Restart Position                      | V 9(17) |
| 155 | SFIDSEC   | Security Level                        | F 9(2)  |
| 157 | SFIDCIPH  | Cipher suite selection                | F 9(2)  |
| 159 | SFIDCOMP  | File compression algorithm            | F 9(1)  |
| 160 | SFIDENV   | File enveloping format                | F 9(1)  |
| 161 | SFIDSIGN  | Signed EERP request                   | F X(1)  |
| 162 | SFIDDESCL | Virtual File Description length       | V 9(3)  |
| 165 | SFIDDESC  | Virtual File Description              | V T(n)  |
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
SFIDCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'H' SFID Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“H”SFID命令标识符。

contents.text: SFIDDSN Virtual File Dataset Name String(26)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDDSN虚拟文件数据集名称字符串（26）

contents.text: Dataset name of the Virtual File being transferred, assigned by bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在传输的虚拟文件的数据集名称，由双边协议指定。

contents.text: No general structure is defined for this attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有为此属性定义常规结构。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: SFIDRSV1 Reserved String(3)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDRSV1保留字符串（3）

contents.text: This field is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段保留供将来使用。

contents.text: SFIDDATE Virtual File Date stamp Numeric(8)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDDATE虚拟文件日期戳数字（8）

contents.text: Format: 'CCYYMMDD' 8 decimal digits representing the century, year, month, and day.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：“CCYYMMDD”8位十进制数字，表示世纪、年、月和日。

contents.text: Date stamp assigned by the Virtual File's Originator indicating when the file was made available for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 由虚拟文件的发起人指定的日期戳，指示文件何时可用于传输。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: SFIDTIME Virtual File Time stamp Numeric(10)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDTIME虚拟文件时间戳数字（10）

contents.text: Format: 'HHMMSScccc' 10 decimal digits representing hours, minutes, seconds, and a counter (0001-9999), which gives higher resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：“HHMMSScccc”10位十进制数字，代表小时、分钟、秒和计数器（0001-9999），可提供更高的分辨率。

contents.text: Time stamp assigned by the Virtual File's Originator indicating when the file was made available for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 由虚拟文件的发起人指定的时间戳，指示文件何时可用于传输。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: SFIDUSER User Data String(8)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDUSER用户数据字符串（8）

contents.text: May be used by ODETTE-FTP in any way. If unused, it should be initialised to spaces. It is expected that a bilateral agreement exists as to the meaning of the data.
contents.zh-CHS: 可由ODETTE-FTP以任何方式使用。如果未使用，则应将其初始化为空格。预计将就数据的含义达成双边协议。

contents.text: SFIDDEST Destination String(25)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDDEST目标字符串（25）

contents.text: Format: See Identification Code (Section 5.4)
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：见识别码（第5.4节）

contents.text: The Final Recipient of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件的最终收件人。

contents.text: This is the location that will look into the Virtual File content and perform mapping functions. It is also the location that creates the End to End Response (EERP) command for the received file.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是查看虚拟文件内容并执行映射功能的位置。它也是为接收的文件创建端到端响应（EERP）命令的位置。

contents.text: SFIDORIG Originator String(25)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDORIG发起者字符串（25）

contents.text: Format: See Identification Code (Section 5.4)
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：见识别码（第5.4节）

contents.text: Originator of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件的发起人。

contents.text: It is the location that created (mapped) the data for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 它是创建（映射）传输数据的位置。

contents.text: SFIDFMT File Format Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDFMT文件格式字符

contents.text: Value: 'F' Fixed format binary file 'V' Variable format binary file 'U' Unstructured binary file 'T' Text
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“F”固定格式二进制文件“V”可变格式二进制文件“U”非结构化二进制文件“T”文本

contents.text: Virtual File format. Used to calculate the restart position (Section 1.5.4).
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件格式。用于计算重启位置（第1.5.4节）。

contents.text: Once a file has been signed, compressed, and/or encrypted, in file format terms it becomes unstructured, format U. The record boundaries are no longer discernable until the file is decrypted, decompressed, and/or verified. SFID File Format Field in this scenario indicates the format of the original file, and the transmitted file must be treated as U format.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦文件被签名、压缩和/或加密，以文件格式而言，它将变为非结构化格式U。在对文件进行解密、解压缩和/或验证之前，记录边界不再可见。此场景中的SFID文件格式字段表示原始文件的格式，传输的文件必须视为U格式。

contents.text: SFIDLRECL Maximum Record Size Numeric(5)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDLREL最大记录大小数字（5）

contents.text: Maximum: 99999
Length in octets of the longest logical record that may be transferred to a location. Only user data is included.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以传输到某个位置的最长逻辑记录的长度（以八位字节为单位）。只包括用户数据。

contents.text: If SFIDFMT is 'T' or 'U', then this attribute must be set to '00000'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果SFIDFMT为“T”或“U”，则此属性必须设置为“00000”。

contents.text: If SFIDFMT is 'V' and the file is compressed, encrypted, or signed, then the maximum value of SFIDRECL is '65536'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果SFIDFMT为“V”，且文件已压缩、加密或签名，则SFIDRECL的最大值为“65536”。

contents.text: SFIDFSIZ Transmitted File Size Numeric(13)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDFSIZ传输的文件大小数字（13）

contents.text: Space in 1K (1024 octet) blocks required at the Originator location to store the actual Virtual File that is to be transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起者位置存储要传输的实际虚拟文件所需的1K（1024个八位组）块空间。

contents.text: For example, if a file is compressed before sending, then this is the space required to store the compressed file.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，如果文件在发送前已压缩，则这是存储压缩文件所需的空间。

contents.text: This parameter is intended to provide only a good estimate of the Virtual File size.
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数旨在提供虚拟文件大小的良好估计。

contents.text: Using 13 digits allows for a maximum file size of approximately 9.3 PB (petabytes) to be transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用13位允许传输的最大文件大小约为9.3 PB（PB）。

contents.text: SFIDOSIZ Original File Size Numeric(13)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDOSIZ原始文件大小数字（13）

contents.text: Space in 1K (1024 octet) blocks required at the Originator location to store the original before it was signed, compressed, and/or encrypted.
contents.zh-CHS: 在签名、压缩和/或加密原件之前，发起者位置存储原件所需的1K（1024个八位组）块空间。

contents.text: If no security or compression services have been used, SFIDOSIZ should contain the same value as SFIDFSIZ.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果未使用安全或压缩服务，则SFIDOSIZ应包含与SFIDFSIZ相同的值。

contents.text: If the original file size is not known, the value zero should be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果原始文件大小未知，则应使用值零。

contents.text: This parameter is intended to provide only a good estimate of the original file size.
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数仅用于提供原始文件大小的良好估计。

contents.text: The sequence of events in file exchange are:
contents.zh-CHS: 文件交换中的事件顺序为：

contents.text: (a) raw data file ready to be sent SFIDOSIZ = Original File Size
contents.zh-CHS: (a) 准备发送的原始数据文件SFIDOSIZ=原始文件大小

contents.text: (b) signing/compression/encryption
contents.zh-CHS: (b) 签名/压缩/加密

contents.text: (c) transmission SFIDFSIZ = Transmitted File Size
contents.zh-CHS: (c) 传输SFIDFSIZ=传输的文件大小

contents.text: (d) decryption/decompression/verification
contents.zh-CHS: (d) 解密/解压缩/验证

contents.text: (e) received raw data file for in-house applications SFIDOSIZ = Original File Size
contents.zh-CHS: (e) 接收到内部应用程序的原始数据文件SFIDOSIZ=原始文件大小

contents.text: The Transmitted File Size at (c) indicates to the receiver how much storage space is needed to receive the file.
contents.zh-CHS: （c）处的传输文件大小向接收器指示接收文件需要多少存储空间。

contents.text: The Original File Size at (e) indicates to the in-house application how much storage space is needed to process the file.
contents.zh-CHS: （e）处的原始文件大小向内部应用程序指示处理文件需要多少存储空间。

contents.text: SFIDREST Restart Position Numeric(17)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDREST重新启动位置数字（17）

contents.text: Virtual File restart position.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件重新启动位置。

contents.text: The count represents the: - Record Number if SSIDFMT is 'F' or 'V'. - File offset in 1K (1024 octet) blocks if SFIDFMT is 'U' or 'T'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果SSIDFMT为“F”或“V”，则计数表示：-记录编号如果SFIDFMT为“U”或“T”，则文件偏移量以1K（1024个八位字节）块为单位。

contents.text: The count will express the transmitted user data (i.e., before ODETTE-FTP buffer compression, header not included).
contents.zh-CHS: 计数将表示传输的用户数据（即，在ODETTE-FTP缓冲区压缩之前，不包括标头）。

contents.text: After negotiation between adjacent locations, retransmission will start at the lowest value.
contents.zh-CHS: 在相邻位置之间协商后，重传将以最低值开始。

contents.text: Once a file has been signed, compressed, and/or encrypted, in file format terms, it has become unstructured, like format U. The file should be treated as format U for the purposes of restart, regardless of the actual value in SFIDFMT.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦文件以文件格式进行了签名、压缩和/或加密，它就变成了非结构化文件，如格式U。为了重新启动，无论SFIDFMT中的实际值如何，该文件都应被视为格式U。

contents.text: SFIDSEC Security Level Numeric(2)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDSEC安全级别数字（2）

contents.text: Value: '00' No security services '01' Encrypted '02' Signed '03' Encrypted and signed
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“00”无安全服务“01”加密“02”签名“03”加密并签名

contents.text: Indicates whether the file has been signed and/or encrypted before transmission. (See Section 6.2.)
contents.zh-CHS: 指示文件在传输之前是否已签名和/或加密。（见第6.2节。）

contents.text: SFIDCIPH Cipher suite selection Numeric(2)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDCIPH密码套件选择数字（2）

contents.text: Value: '00' No security services '01' See Section 10.2
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“00”无安全服务“01”见第10.2节

contents.text: Indicates the cipher suite used to sign and/or encrypt the file and also to indicate the cipher suite that should be used when a signed EERP or NERP is requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示用于对文件进行签名和/或加密的密码套件，以及在请求签名的EERP或NERP时应使用的密码套件。

contents.text: SFIDCOMP File compression algorithm Numeric(1)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDCOMP文件压缩算法数值（1）

contents.text: Value: '0' No compression '1' Compressed with [ZLIB] algorithm
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“0”没有使用[ZLIB]算法压缩的压缩“1”

contents.text: Indicates the algorithm used to compress the file. (See Section 6.4.)
contents.zh-CHS: 指示用于压缩文件的算法。（见第6.4节。）

contents.text: SFIDENV File enveloping format Numeric(1)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDENV文件封装格式数字（1）

contents.text: Value: '0' No envelope '1' File is enveloped using [CMS]
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“0”没有使用[CMS]封装信封“1”文件

contents.text: Indicates the enveloping format used in the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示文件中使用的信封格式。

contents.text: If the file is encrypted/signed/compressed or is an enveloped file for the exchange and revocation of certificates, this field must be set accordingly.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果文件是加密/签名/压缩的，或者是用于交换和撤销证书的封装文件，则必须相应地设置此字段。

contents.text: SFIDSIGN Signed EERP request Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDSIGN签名EERP请求字符

contents.text: Value: 'Y' The EERP returned in acknowledgement of the file must be signed 'N' The EERP must not be signed
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“Y”在确认文件时返回的EERP必须签名“N”EERP不能签名

contents.text: Requests whether the EERP returned for the file must be signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求是否必须对为文件返回的EERP进行签名。

contents.text: SFIDDESCL Virtual File Description length Numeric(3)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDDESCL虚拟文件描述长度数字（3）

contents.text: Length in octets of the field SFIDDESC.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段SFIDDESC的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: A value of 0 indicates that no description is present.
contents.zh-CHS: 值为0表示不存在描述。

contents.text: SFIDDESC Virtual File Description [UTF-8](n)
contents.zh-CHS: SFIDDESC虚拟文件描述[UTF-8]（n）

contents.text: May be used by ODETTE-FTP in any way. If not used, SFIDDESCL should be set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 可由ODETTE-FTP以任何方式使用。如果未使用，则应将SFIDDESCL设置为零。

contents.text: No general structure is defined for this attribute, but it is expected that a bilateral agreement exists as to the meaning of the data.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有为该属性定义一般结构，但预计就数据的含义存在双边协议。

contents.text: It is encoded using [UTF-8] to support a range of national languages.
contents.zh-CHS: 它使用[UTF-8]编码以支持一系列国家语言。

contents.text: Maximum length of the encoded value is 999 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码值的最大长度为999个八位字节。

contents.text: 5.3.4. SFPA - Start File Positive Answer
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.4. SFPA-启动文件肯定回答

contents.text: SFPACMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFPACMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: '2' SFPA Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“2”SFPA命令标识符。

contents.text: SFPAACNT Answer Count Numeric(17)
contents.zh-CHS: SFPAACNT应答计数数字（17）

contents.text: The Listener must enter a count lower than or equal to the restart count specified by the Speaker in the Start File (SFID) command. The count expresses the received user data. If restart facilities are not available, a count of zero must be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 侦听器输入的计数必须小于或等于扬声器在“开始文件”（SFID）命令中指定的重新启动计数。计数表示接收到的用户数据。如果重新启动设施不可用，则必须指定零计数。

contents.text: 5.3.5. SFNA - Start File Negative Answer
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.5. SFNA-启动文件否定回答

contents.text: SFNACMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFNACMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: '3' SFNA Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“3”SFNA命令标识符。

contents.text: SFNAREAS Answer Reason Numeric(2)
contents.zh-CHS: SFNAREAS答案原因数字（2）

contents.text: Value: '01' Invalid filename. '02' Invalid destination. '03' Invalid origin. '04' Storage record format not supported. '05' Maximum record length not supported. '06' File size is too big. '10' Invalid record count. '11' Invalid byte count. '12' Access method failure. '13' Duplicate file. '14' File direction refused. '15' Cipher suite not supported. '16' Encrypted file not allowed. '17' Unencrypted file not allowed. '18' Compression not allowed. '19' Signed file not allowed. '20' Unsigned file not allowed. '99' Unspecified reason.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“01”文件名无效02“目标无效。”03“无效来源”04“不支持存储记录格式。”05“不支持最大记录长度。”06“文件大小太大。”10“无效记录计数”11“无效字节计数”12“访问方法失败”13“重复文件”14“文件方向被拒绝。”15“不支持密码套件。”16“不允许使用加密文件。”17“不允许使用未加密的文件。”18“不允许压缩。”19“不允许使用签名文件。”20“不允许使用未签名的文件。”99'未指明原因。

contents.text: Reason why transmission cannot proceed.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输无法继续的原因。

contents.text: SFNARRTR Retry Indicator Character
contents.zh-CHS: SFNARRTR重试指示符字符

contents.text: Value: 'N' Transmission should not be retried. 'Y' The transmission may be retried later.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“N”不应重试传输Y’稍后可能会重试传输。

contents.text: This parameter is used to advise the Speaker if it should retry at a later time due to a temporary condition at the Listener site, such as a lack of storage space. It should be used in conjunction with the Answer Reason code (SFNAREAS).
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数用于建议说话人是否应在以后重试，因为侦听器站点存在临时情况，例如缺少存储空间。它应与应答原因码（SFNAREAS）一起使用。

contents.text: An invalid file name error code may be the consequence of a problem in the mapping of the Virtual File on to a real file. Such problems cannot always be resolved immediately. It is therefore recommended that when an SFNA with Retry = Y is received the User Monitor attempts to retransmit the relevant file in a subsequent session.
contents.zh-CHS: 无效的文件名错误代码可能是虚拟文件映射到真实文件时出现问题的结果。这些问题不可能总是立即得到解决。因此，建议当接收到重试=Y的SFNA时，用户监视器尝试在后续会话中重新传输相关文件。

contents.text: SFNAREASL Answer Reason Text Length Numeric(3)
contents.zh-CHS: SFNAREASL答案原因文本长度数字（3）

contents.text: Length in octets of the field SFNAREAST.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段SFNAREAST的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: 0 indicates that no SFNAREAST field follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示后面没有SFNAREAST字段。

contents.text: SFNAREAST Answer Reason Text [UTF-8](n)
contents.zh-CHS: SFNAREST应答原因文本[UTF-8]（n）

contents.text: Reason why transmission cannot proceed in plain text.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法以纯文本进行传输的原因。

contents.text: It is encoded using [UTF-8].
contents.zh-CHS: 使用[UTF-8]对其进行编码。

contents.text: Maximum length of the encoded reason is 999 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码原因的最大长度为999个八位字节。

contents.text: No general structure is defined for this attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有为此属性定义常规结构。

contents.text: 5.3.6. DATA - Data Exchange Buffer
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.6. 数据交换缓冲区

contents.text: DATACMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: DATACMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'D' DATA Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“D”数据命令标识符。

contents.text: DATABUF Data Exchange Buffer payload Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: DATABUF数据交换缓冲区有效负载二进制（n）

contents.text: Variable-length buffer containing the data payload. The Data Exchange Buffer is described in Section 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含数据有效负载的可变长度缓冲区。第7节介绍了数据交换缓冲区。

contents.text: 5.3.7. CDT - Set Credit
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.7. CDT-设置信用

contents.text: CDTCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: CDTCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'C' CDT Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“C”CDT命令标识符。

contents.text: CDTRSV1 Reserved String(2)
contents.zh-CHS: CDTRSV1保留字符串（2）

contents.text: This field is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段保留供将来使用。

contents.text: 5.3.8. EFID - End File
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.8. EFID-结束文件

contents.text: EFIDCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: EFIDCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'T' EFID Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“T”EFID命令标识符。

contents.text: EFIDRCNT Record Count Numeric(17)
contents.zh-CHS: EFIDRCNT记录计数数字（17）

contents.text: For SSIDFMT 'F' or 'V', the exact record count. For SSIDFMT 'U' or 'T', zeros.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于SSIDFMT“F”或“V”，精确的记录计数。对于SSIDFMT“U”或“T”，为零。

contents.text: The count will express the real size of the file (before buffer compression, header not included). The total count is always used, even during restart processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数将表示文件的实际大小（在缓冲区压缩之前，不包括头）。即使在重新启动处理期间，也始终使用总计数。

contents.text: EFIDUCNT Unit Count Numeric(17)
contents.zh-CHS: 电子感应单位计数数字（17）

contents.text: Exact number of units (octets) transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输的准确单位数（八位字节）。

contents.text: The count will express the real size of the file. The total count is always used, even during restart processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 计数将表示文件的实际大小。即使在重新启动处理期间，也始终使用总计数。

contents.text: 5.3.9. EFPA - End File Positive Answer
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.9. EFPA-结束文件肯定回答

contents.text: EFPACMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: EFPACMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: '4' EFPA Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“4”EFPA命令标识符。

contents.text: EFPACD Change Direction Indicator Character
contents.zh-CHS: EFPACD转向指示器字符

contents.text: Value: 'N' Change direction not requested. 'Y' Change direction requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“N”未请求更改方向你需要改变方向。

contents.zh-CHS: ESIDREAS原因代码数字（2）

contents.text: Value: '00' Normal session termination
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“00”正常会话终止

contents.text: '01' Command not recognised
contents.zh-CHS: 无法识别“01”命令

contents.text: An Exchange Buffer contains an invalid command code (1st octet of the buffer).
contents.zh-CHS: Exchange缓冲区包含无效的命令代码（缓冲区的第一个八位字节）。

contents.zh-CHS: “02”协议冲突

contents.text: '05' Local site emergency close down
contents.zh-CHS: “05”本地站点紧急关闭

contents.text: The local site has entered an emergency close down mode. Communications are being forcibly terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 本地站点已进入紧急关闭模式。通讯被强行终止。

contents.text: '06' Command contained invalid data
contents.zh-CHS: “06”命令包含无效数据

contents.text: '07' Exchange Buffer size error

contents.text: The length of the Exchange Buffer as determined by the Stream Transmission Header differs from the length implied by the Command Code.
contents.zh-CHS: 由流传输头确定的交换缓冲区长度与命令代码暗示的长度不同。

contents.text: '08' Resources not available

contents.zh-CHS: 由于资源短缺，连接请求已被拒绝。稍后应重试连接尝试。

contents.text: 5.3.13. EERP - End to End Response
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.13. EERP-端到端响应

contents.text:
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
|       EERP        End to End Response                             |
|                                                                   |
|       Start File Phase           Speaker ----> Listener           |
|       End File Phase             Speaker ----> Listener           |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Pos | Field     | Description                           | Format  |
|-----+-----------+---------------------------------------+---------|
|   0 | EERPCMD   | EERP Command, 'E'                     | F X(1)  |
|   1 | EERPDSN   | Virtual File Dataset Name             | V X(26) |
|  27 | EERPRSV1  | Reserved                              | F X(3)  |
|  30 | EERPDATE  | Virtual File Date stamp, (CCYYMMDD)   | V 9(8)  |
|  38 | EERPTIME  | Virtual File Time stamp, (HHMMSScccc) | V 9(10) |
|  48 | EERPUSER  | User Data                             | V X(8)  |
|  56 | EERPDEST  | Destination                           | V X(25) |
|  81 | EERPORIG  | Originator                            | V X(25) |
| 106 | EERPHSHL  | Virtual File hash length              | V U(2)  |
| 108 | EERPHSH   | Virtual File hash                     | V U(n)  |
|     | EERPSIGL  | EERP signature length                 | V U(2)  |
|     | EERPSIG   | EERP signature                        | V U(n)  |
o-------------------------------------------------------------------o
EERPCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: EERPCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'E' EERP Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“E”EERP命令标识符。

contents.text: EERPDSN Virtual File Dataset Name String(26)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPDSN虚拟文件数据集名称字符串（26）

contents.text: Dataset name of the Virtual File being transferred, assigned by bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在传输的虚拟文件的数据集名称，由双边协议指定。

contents.text: No general structure is defined for this attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有为此属性定义常规结构。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: EERPRSV1 Reserved String(3)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPRSV1保留字符串（3）

contents.text: This field is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段保留供将来使用。

contents.text: EERPDATE Virtual File Date stamp Numeric(8)
contents.zh-CHS: eUpdate虚拟文件日期戳数字（8）

contents.text: Format: 'CCYYMMDD' 8 decimal digits representing the century, year, month, and day, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：“CCYYMMDD”8位十进制数字，分别表示世纪、年、月和日。

contents.text: Date stamp assigned by the Virtual File's Originator indicating when the file was made available for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 由虚拟文件的发起人指定的日期戳，指示文件何时可用于传输。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: EERPTIME Virtual File Time stamp Numeric(10)
contents.zh-CHS: eOptime虚拟文件时间戳数字（10）

contents.text: Format: 'HHMMSScccc' 10 decimal digits representing hours, minutes, seconds, and a counter (0001-9999), which gives higher resolution.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：“HHMMSScccc”10位十进制数字，代表小时、分钟、秒和计数器（0001-9999），可提供更高的分辨率。

contents.text: Time stamp assigned by the Virtual File's Originator indicating when the file was made available for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 由虚拟文件的发起人指定的时间戳，指示文件何时可用于传输。

contents.text: See Virtual Files - Identification (Section 1.5.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 见虚拟文件-标识（第1.5.2节）

contents.text: EERPUSER User Data String(8)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPUSER用户数据字符串（8）

contents.text: May be used by ODETTE-FTP in any way. If unused, it should be initialised to spaces. It is expected that a bilateral agreement exists as to the meaning of the data.
contents.zh-CHS: 可由ODETTE-FTP以任何方式使用。如果未使用，则应将其初始化为空格。预计将就数据的含义达成双边协议。

contents.text: EERPDEST Destination String(25)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPDEST目标字符串（25）

contents.text: Format: See Identification Code (Section 5.4)
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：见识别码（第5.4节）

contents.text: Originator of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件的发起人。

contents.text: This is the location that created the data for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是为传输创建数据的位置。

contents.text: EERPORIG Originator String(25)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPORIG发起者字符串（25）

contents.text: Format: See Identification Code (Section 5.4)
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：见识别码（第5.4节）

contents.text: Final Recipient of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件的最终收件人。

contents.text: This is the location that will look into the Virtual File content and process it accordingly. It is also the location that creates the EERP for the received file.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是查看虚拟文件内容并进行相应处理的位置。它也是为接收的文件创建EERP的位置。

contents.text: EERPHSHL Virtual File hash length Binary(2)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPHSHL虚拟文件哈希长度二进制文件（2）

contents.text: Length in octets of the field EERPHSH.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段EERPHSH的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: A binary value of 0 indicates that no hash is present. This is always the case if the EERP is not signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 二进制值0表示不存在哈希。如果未签署EERP，则情况始终如此。

contents.text: EERPHSH Virtual File hash Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPHSH虚拟文件哈希二进制（n）

contents.text: Hash of the transmitted Virtual File, i.e., not the hash of the original file.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输的虚拟文件的散列，即，不是原始文件的散列。

contents.text: The algorithm used is determined by the bilaterally agreed cipher suite specified in the SFIDCIPH.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的算法由SFIDCIPH中规定的双边约定密码套件确定。

contents.text: It is an application implementation issue to validate the EERPHSH to ensure that the EERP is acknowledging the exact same file as was originally transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 验证EERPHSH以确保EERP确认的文件与最初传输的文件完全相同，这是一个应用程序实现问题。

contents.text: EERPSIGL EERP signature length Binary(2)
contents.zh-CHS: EERPSIGL EERP签名长度二进制（2）

contents.text: 0 indicates that this EERP has not been signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示此EERP尚未签名。

contents.text: Any other value indicates the length of EERPSIG in octets and indicates that this EERP has been signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何其他值表示EERPIG的长度（以八位字节为单位），并表示该EERP已签名。

contents.text: EERPSIG EERP signature Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: EERP签名二进制（n）

contents.text: Contains the [CMS] enveloped signature of the EERP.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含EERP的[CMS]信封签名。

contents.text: Signature = Sign{EERPDSN EERPDATE EERPTIME EERPDEST EERPORIG EERPHSH}
contents.zh-CHS: 签名=签名{EERPDSN EERPDATE EERPTIME EERPDEST EERPORIG EERPHSH}

contents.text: Each field is taken in its entirety, including any padding. The envelope must contain the original data, not just the signature.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个字段都是完整的，包括任何填充。信封必须包含原始数据，而不仅仅是签名。

contents.text: The [CMS] content type used is SignedData.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的[CMS]内容类型为SignedData。

contents.text: The encapsulated content type used is id-data.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的封装内容类型是id数据。

contents.text: It is an application issue to validate the signature with the contents of the EERP.
contents.zh-CHS: 验证带有EERP内容的签名是一个应用程序问题。

|  76 | NERPORIG  | Originator                            | V X(25) |
| 101 | NERPCREA  | Creator of NERP                       | V X(25) |

contents.text: "SFNA(RETRY=N)" below should be interpreted as "EFNA or SFNA(RETRY=N)" where appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 在适当情况下，下面的“SFNA（重试=N）”应解释为“EFNA或SFNA（重试=N）”。
