'50' Transmission stopped by the operator. '90' File size incompatible with recipient's protocol version. '99' Unspecified reason.
contents.zh-CHS: “23”SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因码为“13”（重复文件）“24”SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因码为“14”（文件方向被拒绝）“25”SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因码为“15”（不支持密码套件）“26”SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因码为“16”（不允许加密文件）“27”SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因代码为“17”（不允许未加密文件）'28'SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因代码为“18”（不允许压缩）'29'SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因代码为“19”（不允许签名文件）'30'SFNA（重试=N）接收的原因代码为“20”（不允许未签名文件）'31'文件签名无效。'32“文件解压缩失败。”33“文件解密失败。”34“文件处理失败。”35“未送达收件人”36“收件人未确认”50‘操作员停止了变速箱。’90“文件大小与收件人的协议版本不兼容。”99'未指明原因。

contents.text: NERPREASL Reason Text Length Numeric(3)
contents.zh-CHS: NERPRESAL原因文本长度数字（3）

contents.text: Length in octets of the field NERPREAST.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段nerprest的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: 0 indicates that no NERPREAST field follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示后面没有nerprest字段。

contents.text: NERPREAST Reason Text [UTF-8](n)
contents.zh-CHS: NERPEAST原因文本[UTF-8]（n）

contents.text: Reason why transmission cannot proceed in plain text.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法以纯文本进行传输的原因。

contents.text: It is encoded using [UTF-8].
contents.zh-CHS: 使用[UTF-8]对其进行编码。

contents.text: Maximum length of the encoded reason is 999 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码原因的最大长度为999个八位字节。

contents.text: No general structure is defined for this attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有为此属性定义常规结构。

contents.text: NERPHSHL Virtual File hash length Binary(2)
contents.zh-CHS: NERPHSHL虚拟文件哈希长度二进制文件（2）

contents.text: Length in octets of the field NERPHSH.
contents.zh-CHS: 字段NERPHSH的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: A binary value of 0 indicates that no hash is present. This is always the case if the NERP is not signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 二进制值0表示不存在哈希。如果没有签署NERP，情况总是如此。

contents.text: NERPHSH Virtual File hash Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: NERPHSH虚拟文件哈希二进制（n）

contents.text: Hash of the Virtual File being transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 正在传输的虚拟文件的哈希。

contents.text: The algorithm used is determined by the bilaterally agreed cipher suite specified in the SFIDCIPH.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的算法由SFIDCIPH中规定的双边约定密码套件确定。

contents.text: NERPSIGL NERP Signature length Binary(2)
contents.zh-CHS: NERPSIGL NERP签名长度二进制（2）

contents.text: 0 indicates that this NERP has not been signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 0表示此NERP尚未签名。

contents.text: Any other value indicates the length of NERPSIG in octets and indicates that this NERP has been signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何其他值表示以八位字节为单位的NERPIG长度，并表示该NERP已签署。

contents.text: NERPSIG NERP Signature Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: NERP签名二进制（n）

contents.text: Contains the [CMS] enveloped signature of the NERP.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含NERP的[CMS]信封签名。

contents.text: Signature = Sign{NERPDSN NERPDATE NERPTIME NERPDEST NERPORIG NERPCREA NERPHSH}
contents.zh-CHS: 签名=签名{NERPDSN NERPDATE NERPTIME NERPDEST NERPORIG NERPCREA NERPHSH}

contents.text: Each field is taken in its entirety, including any padding. The envelope must contain the original data, not just the signature.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个字段都是完整的，包括任何填充。信封必须包含原始数据，而不仅仅是签名。

contents.text: The [CMS] content type used is SignedData.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的[CMS]内容类型为SignedData。

contents.text: The encapsulated content type used is id-data.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的封装内容类型是id数据。

contents.text: It is an application issue to validate the signature with the contents of the NERP.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用NERP的内容验证签名是一个应用程序问题。

contents.text: 5.3.15. RTR - Ready To Receive
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.15. RTR-准备接收

contents.text: RTRCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: RTRCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'P' RTR Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“P”RTR命令标识符。

contents.text: 5.3.16. SECD - Security Change Direction
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.16. 秘书长-保安改革方向

contents.text: SECDCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: SECDCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'J' SECD Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“J”SECD命令标识符。

contents.text: 5.3.17. AUCH - Authentication Challenge
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.17. AUCH-身份验证挑战

contents.text: AUCHCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: AUCHCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'A' AUCH Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“A”AUCH命令标识符。

contents.text: AUCHCHLL Challenge length Binary(2)
contents.zh-CHS: AUCHCHLL质询长度二进制（2）

contents.text: Indicates the length of AUCHCHAL in octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 表示AUCHCHAL的长度（以八位字节为单位）。

contents.text: The length is expressed as an unsigned binary number using network byte order.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度使用网络字节顺序表示为无符号二进制数。

contents.text: AUCHCHAL Challenge Binary(n)
contents.zh-CHS: AUCHCHAL挑战二进制（n）

contents.text: A [CMS] encrypted 20-byte random number uniquely generated each time an AUCH is sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 每次发送AUCH时唯一生成的[CMS]加密的20字节随机数。

contents.text: NOTE:
contents.zh-CHS: 注:

contents.text: Any encryption algorithm that is available through a defined cipher suite (Section 10.2) may be used. See Section 10.1 regarding the choice of a cipher suite.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以使用通过定义的密码套件（第10.2节）提供的任何加密算法。关于密码套件的选择，请参见第10.1节。

contents.text: 5.3.18. AURP - Authentication Response
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3.18. AURP-身份验证响应

contents.text: AURPCMD Command Code Character
contents.zh-CHS: AURPCMD命令代码字符

contents.text: Value: 'S' AURP Command identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“S”AURP命令标识符。

contents.text: AURPRSP Response Binary(20)
contents.zh-CHS: AURPRP响应二进制文件（20）

contents.text: Contains the decrypted challenge (AUCHCHAL).
contents.zh-CHS: 包含已解密的质询（AUCHCHAL）。

contents.text: IMPORTANT:
contents.zh-CHS: 重要：

contents.text: It is an application implementation issue to validate a received AURP to ensure that the response matches the challenge. This validation is extremely important to ensure that a party is correctly authenticated.
contents.zh-CHS: 验证收到的AURP以确保响应与质询匹配是应用程序实现的问题。此验证对于确保正确验证一方极为重要。

contents.text: 5.4. Identification Code
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4. 识别码

contents.text: The Initiator (sender) and Responder (receiver) participating in an ODETTE-FTP session are uniquely identified by an Identification Code based on [ISO-6523], Structure for the Identification of Organisations (SIO). The locations are considered to be adjacent for the duration of the transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 参与ODETTE-FTP会话的发起者（发送者）和响应者（接收者）通过基于[ISO-6523]的标识码进行唯一标识，该标识码用于组织标识（SIO）。在传输期间，这些位置被认为是相邻的。

contents.text: The SIO has the following format.
contents.zh-CHS: SIO具有以下格式。

contents.text: SIOOID ODETTE Identifier Character
contents.zh-CHS: SIOOID-ODETTE标识符字符

contents.text: Value: 'O' Indicates ODETTE assigned Organisation Identifier. Other values may be used for non-ODETTE codes.
contents.zh-CHS: 值：“O”表示ODETTE分配的组织标识符。其他值可用于非ODETTE代码。

contents.text: SIOICD International Code Designator String(4)
contents.zh-CHS: SIOICD国际代码指示符字符串（4）

contents.text: A code forming part of the Organisation Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 构成组织标识符一部分的代码。

contents.text: SIOORG Organisation Code String(14)
contents.zh-CHS: 组织机构代码字符串（14）

contents.text: A code forming part of the Organisation Identifier. This field may contain the letters A to Z, the digits 0 to 9, and space and hyphen characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 构成组织标识符一部分的代码。此字段可能包含字母A到Z、数字0到9以及空格和连字符。

contents.text: SIOCSA Computer Subaddress String(6)
contents.zh-CHS: SIOCSA计算机子地址字符串（6）

contents.text: A locally assigned address that uniquely identifies a system within an organisation (defined by an Organisation Identifier).
contents.zh-CHS: 本地分配的地址，唯一标识组织内的系统（由组织标识符定义）。

contents.text: 6. File Services
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 文件服务

contents.text: 6.1. Overview

ODETTE-FTP provides services for compressing, encrypting, and signing files. These services should generally be performed off line, outside of the ODETTE-FTP communications session for performance reasons, although this is not a strict requirement.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP提供压缩、加密和签名文件的服务。出于性能原因，这些服务通常应在ODETTE-FTP通信会话之外离线执行，尽管这不是严格要求。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP requires that the following steps must be performed in this exact sequence, although any of steps 2, 3, or 4 may be omitted. Step 1 is required only if any of steps 2, 3, or 4 are performed:
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP要求以下步骤必须按此确切顺序执行，尽管步骤2、3或4中的任何一个都可以省略。仅当执行步骤2、3或4中的任何一个时，才需要步骤1：

contents.text: 1. Insert record length indicators (V format files only; see Section 6.5) 2. Sign 3. Compress 4. Encrypt
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 插入记录长度指示器（仅V格式文件；参见第6.5节）2。标志3。压缩4。加密

contents.text: The cipher suite for the encryption and signing algorithms is assigned by bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密和签名算法的密码套件由双边协议分配。

contents.text: Secured and/or compressed files must be enveloped. The envelope contains additional information about the service used that is necessary for a receiving party to fully process the file.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须封装安全和/或压缩文件。信封包含接收方完整处理文件所需的有关所用服务的附加信息。

contents.text: The [CMS] content types used are:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的[CMS]内容类型有：

contents.text: EnvelopedData - Indicates encrypted data CompressedData - Indicates compressed data SignedData - Indicates signed content Data - Indicates unstructured data
contents.zh-CHS: 信封数据-表示加密数据压缩数据-表示压缩数据签名数据-表示签名内容数据-表示非结构化数据

contents.text: For signed or encrypted data, the encapsulated content type (eContentType field) is id-data.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于签名或加密数据，封装的内容类型（eContentType字段）是id数据。

contents.text: 6.2. File Signing
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 文件签名

contents.text: Files that are to be signed are enveloped according to the file enveloping format (SFIDENV). Generally, this will be as a [CMS] package.
contents.zh-CHS: 要签名的文件根据文件封装格式（SFIDENV）进行封装。通常，这将作为一个[CMS]包。

contents.text: A file may be signed more than once to ease the changeover between old and new certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个文件可以多次签名，以简化新旧证书之间的转换。

contents.text: It is recommended that the envelope does not contain the public certificate of the signer. Where files are sent to the same recipient continuously, it would serve no benefit to repeatedly send the same certificate. Both the original file data and signature are stored within the [CMS] package.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议信封中不要包含签名人的公共证书。如果文件连续发送给同一个收件人，则重复发送同一证书没有任何好处。原始文件数据和签名都存储在[CMS]包中。

contents.text: 6.3. File Encryption
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. 文件加密

contents.text: Files that are to be encrypted are enveloped according to the file enveloping format (SFIDENV). Generally, this will be as a [CMS] package.
contents.zh-CHS: 要加密的文件根据文件封装格式（SFIDENV）进行封装。通常，这将作为一个[CMS]包。

contents.text: It is recommended that encryption should be performed before the ODETTE-FTP session starts because a large file takes a long time to encrypt and could cause session time outs, even on high-performance machines.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议在ODETTE-FTP会话开始之前执行加密，因为大型文件加密需要很长时间，甚至在高性能计算机上也可能导致会话超时。

contents.text: Likewise, decryption of the file should occur outside of the session. However, an application may choose to allow in-session encryption and decryption for very small files.
contents.zh-CHS: 同样，文件的解密应该在会话之外进行。但是，应用程序可以选择允许对非常小的文件进行会话内加密和解密。

contents.text: 6.4. File Compression
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4. 文件压缩

contents.text: Files that are to be compressed are enveloped according to the file enveloping format (SFIDENV). Generally, this will be as a [CMS] package using the [CMS-Compression] data type, which uses the [ZLIB] compression algorithm by default.
contents.zh-CHS: 要压缩的文件根据文件封装格式（SFIDENV）进行封装。通常，这将作为使用[CMS Compression]数据类型的[CMS]包，默认情况下使用[ZLIB]压缩算法。

contents.text: Unlike the buffer compression method, this method operates on a whole file. Because of the increased levels of compression, file level compression essentially deprecates the older buffer compression inside ODETTE-FTP. The buffer compression is kept for backwards compatibility.
contents.zh-CHS: 与缓冲区压缩方法不同，此方法对整个文件进行操作。由于压缩级别的提高，文件级压缩基本上不支持ODETTE-FTP中较旧的缓冲区压缩。保留缓冲区压缩是为了向后兼容。

contents.text: 6.5. V Format Files - Record Lengths
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5. V格式文件-记录长度

contents.text: A file that has been signed, compressed, and/or encrypted will have lost its record structure, so ODETTE-FTP will not be able to insert the End of Record Flag in subrecord headers in Data Exchange Buffers. To preserve the record structure, V format files must have record headers inserted into them prior to signing, compression, or encryption. These 2-byte binary numbers, in network byte order, indicate the length of each record, allowing the receiving system, where appropriate, to recreate the files complete with the original variable-length records. Note that the header bytes hold the number of data bytes in the record and don't include themselves.
contents.zh-CHS: 已签名、压缩和/或加密的文件将丢失其记录结构，因此ODETTE-FTP将无法在数据交换缓冲区的子记录头中插入记录结束标志。为了保留记录结构，V格式文件必须在签名、压缩或加密之前插入记录头。这些2字节二进制数（按网络字节顺序）表示每条记录的长度，允许接收系统在适当情况下重新创建包含原始可变长度记录的文件。请注意，头字节包含记录中的数据字节数，不包括它们自己。

contents.text: This is only applicable to V format files, which themselves are typically only of concern for mainframes.
contents.zh-CHS: 这仅适用于V格式文件，而V格式文件本身通常只与大型机有关。

contents.text: 7. ODETTE-FTP Data Exchange Buffer
contents.zh-CHS: 7. ODETE-FTP数据交换缓冲区

contents.text: 7.1. Overview

Virtual Files are transmitted by mapping the Virtual File records into Data Exchange Buffers, the maximum length of which was negotiated between the ODETTE-FTP entities via the Start Session (SSID) commands exchanged during the Start Session phase of the protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过将虚拟文件记录映射到数据交换缓冲区来传输虚拟文件，数据交换缓冲区的最大长度由ODETTE-FTP实体通过在协议的启动会话阶段交换的启动会话（SSID）命令协商确定。

contents.text: Virtual File records may be of arbitrary length. A simple compression scheme is defined for strings of repeated characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件记录可以是任意长度。为重复字符的字符串定义了一个简单的压缩方案。

contents.text: An example of the use of the Data Exchange Buffer can be found in Appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据交换缓冲区的使用示例见附录A。

contents.text: 7.2. Data Exchange Buffer Format
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 数据交换缓冲区格式

contents.text: For transmission of Virtual File records, data is divided into subrecords, each of which is preceded by a 1-octet Subrecord Header.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于虚拟文件记录的传输，数据被划分为子记录，每个子记录前面都有一个1-octet子记录头。

contents.text: The Data Exchange Buffer is made up of the initial Command Character followed by pairs of Subrecord Headers and subrecords, as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据交换缓冲区由初始命令字符和成对的子记录头和子记录组成，如下所示。

contents.text: CMD
contents.zh-CHS: 指令

contents.text: The Data Exchange Buffer Command Character, 'D'.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据交换缓冲区命令字符“D”。

contents.text: HDR
contents.zh-CHS: HDR

contents.text: A 1-octet Subrecord Header defined as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义如下的1-octet子记录头：

contents.text: Bits
contents.zh-CHS: 位

contents.text: 0 End of Record Flag
contents.zh-CHS: 0记录结束标志

contents.text: Set to indicate that the next subrecord is the last subrecord of the current record.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置以指示下一个子记录是当前记录的最后一个子记录。

contents.text: Unstructured files are transmitted as a single record; in this case, the flag acts as an end-of-file marker.
contents.zh-CHS: 非结构化文件作为单个记录传输；在这种情况下，该标志充当文件结束标记。

contents.text: 1 Compression Flag
contents.zh-CHS: 1压缩标志

contents.text: Set to indicate that the next subrecord is compressed.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置以指示下一个子记录已压缩。

contents.text: 2-7 Subrecord Count
contents.zh-CHS: 2-7子记录计数

contents.text: The number of octets in the Virtual File represented by the next subrecord expressed as a binary value.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件中的八位字节数，由下一个子记录表示为二进制值。

contents.text: For uncompressed data, this is simply the length of the subrecord.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于未压缩的数据，这只是子记录的长度。

contents.text: For compressed data, this is the number of times that the single octet in the following subrecord must be inserted in the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于压缩数据，这是必须将以下子记录中的单个八位字节插入虚拟文件的次数。

contents.text: As 6 bits are available, the next subrecord may represent between 0 and 63 octets of the Virtual File.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于有6位可用，下一个子记录可能表示虚拟文件的0到63个八位字节。

contents.text: 7.3. Buffer Filling Rules
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 缓冲区填充规则

contents.text: A Data Exchange Buffer may be any length up to the value negotiated in the Start Session exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据交换缓冲区的长度可以是在开始会话交换中协商的值之前的任意长度。

contents.text: Virtual File records may be concatenated within one Data Exchange Buffer or split across a number of buffers.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟文件记录可以连接在一个数据交换缓冲区内，也可以跨多个缓冲区拆分。

contents.text: A subrecord is never split between two Exchange Buffers. If the remaining space in the current Exchange Buffer is insufficient to contain the next 'complete' subrecord, one of the following strategies should be used:
contents.zh-CHS: 子记录永远不会在两个Exchange缓冲区之间分割。如果当前Exchange缓冲区中的剩余空间不足以容纳下一个“完整”子记录，则应使用以下策略之一：

contents.text: 1. Truncate the Exchange Buffer, and put the complete subrecord (preceded by its header octet) in a new Exchange Buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 截断Exchange缓冲区，并将完整的子记录（前面有其头八位字节）放入新的Exchange缓冲区。

contents.text: 2. Split the subrecord into two, filling the remainder of the Exchange Buffer with the first new subrecord and starting a new Exchange Buffer with the second.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 将子记录一分为二，用第一个新的子记录填充Exchange缓冲区的其余部分，并用第二个新的子记录启动新的Exchange缓冲区。

contents.text: A record of length zero may appear anywhere in the Exchange Buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度为零的记录可能出现在Exchange缓冲区中的任何位置。

contents.text: A subrecord of length zero may appear anywhere in the record and/or the Exchange Buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度为零的子记录可能出现在记录和/或Exchange缓冲区中的任何位置。

contents.text: 8. Stream Transmission Buffer
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 流传输缓冲器

contents.text: 8.1. Introduction

To utilise the TCP stream, a Stream Transmission Buffer (STB) is created by adding a Stream Transmission Header (STH) to the start of all Command and Data Exchange Buffers before they are passed to the TCP transport service. This allows the receiving ODETTE-FTP to recover the original Exchange Buffers.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了利用TCP流，在将所有命令和数据交换缓冲区传递到TCP传输服务之前，通过在所有命令和数据交换缓冲区的开头添加流传输头（STH）来创建流传输缓冲区（STB）。这允许接收ODETTE-FTP恢复原始Exchange缓冲区。

contents.text: Note: The Stream Transmission Buffer is not used when using ODETTE-FTP over an X.25 network.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：在X.25网络上使用ODETTE-FTP时，不使用流传输缓冲区。

contents.text: This is because ODETTE-FTP can rely on the fact that the Network Service will preserve the sequence and boundaries of data units transmitted through the network and that the Network Service will pass the length of the data unit to the receiving ODETTE-FTP. TCP offers a stream-based connection that does not provide these functions.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是因为ODETTE-FTP可以依赖这样一个事实，即网络服务将保留通过网络传输的数据单元的顺序和边界，并且网络服务将数据单元的长度传递给接收ODETTE-FTP。TCP提供的基于流的连接不提供这些功能。

contents.text: The Stream Transmission Buffer is composed of an STH and an OEB.
contents.zh-CHS: 流传输缓冲器由STH和OEB组成。

contents.text: STH - Stream Transmission Header OEB - ODETTE-FTP Exchange Buffer
contents.zh-CHS: STH-流传输头OEB-ODETE-FTP交换缓冲区

contents.text: 8.2. Stream Transmission Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 流传输头格式

contents.text: The Stream Transmission Header is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: 流传输头如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: Value: 0001 (binary)
Stream Transmission Header version number.
contents.zh-CHS: 流传输头版本号。

contents.text: Flags
contents.zh-CHS: 旗帜

contents.text: Value: 0000 (binary)
Reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留供将来使用。

contents.text: Length
contents.zh-CHS: 长

contents.text: Range: 5 - 100003 (decimal)
The length of the Stream Transmission Buffer (STH+OEB).
contents.zh-CHS: 流传输缓冲区的长度（STH+OEB）。

contents.text: The smallest STB is 5 octets consisting of a 4-octet header followed by a 1-octet Exchange Buffer such as a Change Direction (CD) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 最小的STB是5个八位字节，由4个八位字节的报头和1个八位字节的交换缓冲区（如更改方向（CD）命令）组成。

contents.text: The maximum Exchange Buffer length that can be negotiated is 99999 octets (Section 5.3.2) giving an STB length of 100003.
contents.zh-CHS: 可协商的最大交换缓冲区长度为99999个八位字节（第5.3.2节），STB长度为100003。

contents.text: The length is expressed as a binary number in network byte order.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度以网络字节顺序表示为二进制数。

contents.text: It is expected that implementations of this protocol will follow the Internet robustness principle of being conservative in what is sent and liberal in what is accepted.
contents.zh-CHS: 预计该协议的实现将遵循互联网健壮性原则，即发送内容保守，接受内容自由。

contents.text: 9. Protocol State Machine
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 协议状态机

contents.text: 9.1. ODETTE-FTP State Machine
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. ODETE-FTP状态机

contents.text: The operation of an ODETTE-FTP entity is formally defined by the State Machine presented below. There are five State and Transition tables, and for each table additional information is given in the associated Predicate and Action lists.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP实体的操作由下面的状态机正式定义。有五个状态表和转换表，每个表的附加信息在相关谓词和操作列表中给出。

contents.text: The response of an ODETTE-FTP entity to the receipt of an event is defined by a Transition table entry indexed by the Event/State intersection within the appropriate state table.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP实体对事件接收的响应由相应状态表中的事件/状态交叉点索引的转换表条目定义。

contents.text: Each Transition table entry defines the actions taken, events generated, and new state entered. Predicates may be used within a table entry to select the correct response on the basis of local information held by the entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个转换表条目定义所采取的操作、生成的事件和输入的新状态。谓词可以在表条目中使用，以根据实体持有的本地信息选择正确的响应。

contents.text: A Transition table contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 转换表包含以下字段：

contents.text: Index (I) State transition index.
contents.zh-CHS: 索引（I）状态转换索引。

contents.text: Predicate A list of predicates used to select between different possible transitions. The predicates are defined in the Predicate and Action lists.
contents.zh-CHS: 谓词用于在不同可能的转换之间进行选择的谓词列表。谓词在谓词和操作列表中定义。

contents.text: Actions A list of actions taken by the entity. The actions are defined in the Predicate and Action lists.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作实体采取的操作的列表。动作在谓词和动作列表中定义。

contents.text: Events Output events generated by the entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件输出实体生成的事件。

contents.text: Next State The new state of the entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 下一个状态实体的新状态。

contents.text: 9.2. Error Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. 错误处理

contents.text: The receipt of an event in a given state may be invalid for three reasons.
contents.zh-CHS: 在给定状态下接收事件可能无效，原因有三。

contents.text: 1. The case is impossible by design of the state automata, denoted 'X' in the state tables. For example, a timer that has not been set cannot run out.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 通过状态自动机的设计，这种情况是不可能的，在状态表中表示为“X”。例如，未设置的计时器无法运行。

contents.text: 2. The event is the result of an error in the Network Service implementation, also denoted 'X' in the state tables. The Network Service implementation is considered to be correct.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 该事件是网络服务实现中的错误导致的，在状态表中也表示为“X”。网络服务实现被认为是正确的。

contents.text: 3. For all other cases, the event is considered to be a User Error, denoted "U" in the state tables.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 对于所有其他情况，该事件被视为用户错误，在状态表中表示为“U”。

contents.text: The state tables define the conditions under which a User event is valid, thus preventing the generation of a protocol error by the ODETTE-FTP entity as a result of a User Monitor error. The reaction of the entity to such errors is undefined and regarded as a local implementation issue.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态表定义了用户事件有效的条件，从而防止ODETTE-FTP实体因用户监视器错误而生成协议错误。实体对此类错误的反应未定义，并被视为本地实现问题。

contents.text: The state tables also allow protocol errors due to the receipt of invalid Exchange Buffers, to be detected. In such cases, the reaction of the entity to the error is defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态表还允许检测由于接收到无效的Exchange缓冲区而导致的协议错误。在这种情况下，定义实体对错误的反应。

contents.text: 9.3. States
The Command Mode is strictly a half-duplex flip-flop mode.
contents.zh-CHS: 命令模式严格地说是半双工触发器模式。

contents.text: A_NC_ONLY Responder, Network Connection opened
contents.zh-CHS: 仅限NC的响应程序，网络连接已打开

contents.text: The Responder has sent its Ready Message (SSRM) and is waiting for Start Session (SSID) from the Initiator.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序已发送其就绪消息（SSRM），正在等待发起程序的启动会话（SSID）。

contents.text: A_WF_CONRS Responder Waiting for F_CONNECT_RS
contents.zh-CHS: 正在等待F\u连接的\u WF\u CONRS响应程序

contents.text: The Responder has received the Initiator's Start Session (SSID) and is waiting for a response (F_CONNECT_RS) from its User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应程序已收到启动器的启动会话（SSID），正在等待来自其用户监视器的响应（F_CONNECT_RS）。

contents.text: CDSTWFCD CD_RQ stored in WF_CD state
contents.zh-CHS: CDSTWFCD CD_RQ存储在WF_CD状态

contents.text: Since the User Monitor doesn't see the WF_CD state, it may send a Change Direction request (F_CD_RQ) before the ODETTE-FTP receives a Change Direction (CD) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于用户监视器看不到WF_CD状态，它可能会在ODETTE-FTP收到更改方向（CD）命令之前发送更改方向请求（F_CD_RQ）。

contents.text: CLIP Close Input Pending
contents.zh-CHS: 剪辑关闭输入挂起

contents.text: The Listener has received an End File (EFID) command and is waiting for the Close File response (F_CLOSE_FILE_RS) from its User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 侦听器已收到结束文件（EFID）命令，正在等待来自其用户监视器的关闭文件响应（F_Close_File_RS）。

contents.text: CLOP Close Out Pending
contents.zh-CHS: CLOP关闭待定

contents.text: The Speaker has sent an End File (EFID) command and is waiting for an End File Answer (EFPA or EFNA).
contents.zh-CHS: 扬声器已发送结束文件（EFID）命令，正在等待结束文件应答（EFPA或EFNA）。

contents.text: ERSTWFCD End to End Response stored in WF_CD state
contents.zh-CHS: ERSTWFCD端到端响应存储在WF_CD状态

contents.text: Since the User Monitor doesn't see the WF_CD state, it may send F_EERP_RQ, before ODETTE-FTP receives a Change Direction (CD) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于用户监视器看不到WF_CD状态，它可能会在ODETE-FTP收到更改方向（CD）命令之前发送F_EERP_RQ。

contents.text: IDLE Connection IDLE
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲连接空闲

contents.text: IDLELI Idle Listener
contents.zh-CHS: IDLELI空闲侦听器

contents.text: IDLELICD Idle Listener, F_CD_RQ Received
contents.zh-CHS: IDLELICD空闲侦听器，F_CD_RQ已接收

contents.text: The ODETTE-FTP entity has become the Listener after receiving a Change Direction request (F_CD_RQ) from the User Monitor. The receipt of an End Session (ESID) is valid in this state.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP实体在收到来自用户监视器的更改方向请求（F_CD_RQ）后已成为侦听器。结束会话（ESID）的接收在此状态下有效。

contents.text: IDLESP Idle Speaker
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲扬声器

contents.text: IDLESPCD Idle Speaker, F_CD_IND Sent
contents.zh-CHS: IDLESPCD空闲扬声器，F_CD_IND已发送

contents.text: The ODETTE-FTP entity has sent a Change Direction indication (F_CD_IND) to the User Monitor. A Change Direction request (F_CD_RQ) is invalid in this state.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP实体已向用户监视器发送更改方向指示（F_CD_IND）。更改方向请求（F_CD_RQ）在此状态下无效。

contents.text: I_WF_NC Initiator Waiting for Network Connection
contents.zh-CHS: I\u WF\u NC启动器正在等待网络连接

contents.text: The Initiator has requested a new network connection and is waiting for a Connection confirmation (N_CON_CF) from the Network Service.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动器已请求新的网络连接，正在等待网络服务的连接确认（N_CON_CF）。

contents.text: I_WF_RM Initiator Waiting for Ready Message
contents.zh-CHS: I\u WF\u RM启动器正在等待就绪消息

contents.text: Before sending Start Session (SSID), the Initiator must wait for a Ready Message (SSRM) from the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 在发送启动会话（SSID）之前，发起方必须等待响应方发送就绪消息（SSRM）。

contents.text: I_WF_SSID Initiator Waiting for SSID
contents.zh-CHS: I_WF_SSID启动器正在等待SSID

contents.text: The Initiator has sent a Start Session (SSID) command and is waiting for Start Session from the Responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起方已发送启动会话（SSID）命令，正在等待响应方的启动会话。

contents.text: NRSTWFCD Negative End Response stored in WF_CD state
contents.zh-CHS: NRSTWFCD负端响应存储在WF_CD状态

contents.text: Since the User Monitor doesn't see the WF_CD state, it may send F_NERP_RQ, before ODETTE-FTP receives a Change Direction (CD) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于用户监视器看不到WF_CD状态，它可能会在ODETE-FTP收到更改方向（CD）命令之前发送F_NERP_RQ。

contents.text: OPI Open Input (Data Transfer Phase)
contents.zh-CHS: OPI开放输入（数据传输阶段）

contents.text: The Listener is waiting for the Speaker to send a Data Exchange Buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 侦听器正在等待说话者发送数据交换缓冲区。

contents.text: OPIP Open Input Pending
contents.zh-CHS: OPIP打开输入挂起

contents.text: The Listener has received a Start File (SFID) command and is waiting for the Start File response (F_START_FILE_RS) from its User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 侦听器已收到启动文件（SFID）命令，正在等待来自其用户监视器的启动文件响应（F_Start_File_RS）。

contents.text: OPO Open Out (Data Transfer Phase)
contents.zh-CHS: OPO开放（数据传输阶段）

contents.text: The Speaker has received a Start File Positive Answer (SFPA) and is waiting for a Data (F_DATA_RQ) or Close File (F_CLOSE_FILE) request from its User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 扬声器已收到开始文件肯定应答（SFPA），正在等待来自其用户监视器的数据（F_Data_RQ）或关闭文件（F_Close_File）请求。

contents.text: OPOP Open Out Pending
contents.zh-CHS: OPOP开放待定

contents.text: The Speaker has sent a Start File (SFID) command and is waiting for a Start File Answer (SFPA or SFNA).
contents.zh-CHS: 扬声器已发送开始文件（SFID）命令，正在等待开始文件应答（SFPA或SFNA）。

contents.text: OPOWFC Open Out Wait for Credit
contents.zh-CHS: OPOWFC开放等待信贷

contents.text: The Speaker is waiting for a Set Credit (CDT) command before sending further Data Exchange buffers.
contents.zh-CHS: 在发送进一步的数据交换缓冲区之前，扬声器正在等待设置信用（CDT）命令。

contents.text: RTRP Ready to Receive (RTR) Pending
contents.zh-CHS: RTRP准备接收（RTR）挂起

contents.text: The Listener has received an EERP or a NERP and is waiting for the Ready to Receive response (F_RTR_RS) from its User Monitor.
contents.zh-CHS: 侦听器已收到EERP或NERP，正在等待来自其用户监视器的准备接收响应（F_RTR_RS）。

contents.text: SFSTWFCD Start File Request stored in WF_CD state.
contents.zh-CHS: SFSTWFCD启动文件请求存储在WF_CD状态。

contents.text: Since the User Monitor doesn't see the WF_CD state, it may send a Start File request (F_START_FILE_RQ) before the ODETTE-FTP receives a Change Direction (CD) command.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于用户监视器看不到WF_CD状态，它可能会在ODETTE-FTP收到更改方向（CD）命令之前发送启动文件请求（F_Start_File_RQ）。

contents.text: WF_CD Wait for Change Direction
contents.zh-CHS: WF_CD等待更改方向

contents.text: The Listener wishes to become the Speaker and is waiting for a Change Direction (CD) command after sending an End File Positive Answer (EFPA) requesting change direction.
contents.zh-CHS: 听者希望成为演讲者，并在发送请求更改方向的结束文件肯定应答（EFPA）后等待更改方向（CD）命令。

contents.text: WF_RTR Wait for Ready To Receive
contents.zh-CHS: WF\U RTR等待准备接收

contents.text: The Speaker has sent an End to End Response (EERP) or a Negative End Response (NERP) command and must wait for Ready To Receive (RTR) from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 说话人已发送端到端响应（EERP）或负端响应（NERP）命令，并且必须等待听话人的准备接收（RTR）。

contents.text: WF_NDISC Wait for N_DISC_IND
contents.zh-CHS: WF\u NDISC等待N\u磁盘索引

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP has sent an End Session (ESID) command and is waiting for a Disconnection indication (N_DISC_IND) from the Network Service.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP已发送结束会话（ESID）命令，正在等待网络服务的断开指示（N_DISC_IND）。

contents.text: WF_SECD Wait for Security Change Direction
contents.zh-CHS: WF_SECD等待安全更改方向

contents.text: The Speaker is expecting a Security Change Direction (SECD) from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 演讲者希望听众提供安全更改方向（SECD）。

contents.text: WF_AUCH Wait for Authentication Challenge
contents.zh-CHS: WF_AUCH等待验证质询

contents.text: The Speaker has sent a Security Change Direction (SECD) command and must wait for Authentication Challenge (AUCH) from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 说话人已发送安全更改方向（SECD）命令，必须等待侦听器发出身份验证质询（AUCH）。

contents.text: WF_AURP Wait for Authentication Response
contents.zh-CHS: WF_AURP等待身份验证响应

contents.text: The Speaker has sent an Authentication Challenge (AUCH) command and must wait for Authentication Response (AURP) from the Listener.
contents.zh-CHS: 说话人已发送身份验证质询（AUCH）命令，必须等待侦听器的身份验证响应（AURP）。

contents.text: 9.4. Input Events
contents.zh-CHS: 9.4. 输入事件

contents.text: User Monitor Input Events (Section 3)
contents.zh-CHS: 用户监视器输入事件（第3节）

contents.text:
F_DATA_RQ   F_CONNECT_RQ   F_START_FILE_RQ      F_CLOSE_FILE_RQ
F_EERP_RQ   F_CONNECT_RS   F_START_FILE_RS(+)   F_CLOSE_FILE_RS(+)
F_NERP_RQ   F_ABORT_RQ     F_START_FILE_RS(-)   F_CLOSE_FILE_RS(-)
F_CD_RQ     F_RELEASE_RQ   F_RTR_RS
Network Input Events (Section 2.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 网络输入事件（第2.2节）

contents.text: N_CON_IND N_CON_CF N_DATA_IND N_DISC_IND N_RST_IND
contents.zh-CHS: N_CON_IND N_CON_CF N_DATA_IND N_DISC_IND N_RST IND

contents.text: Peer ODETTE-FTP Input Events (Section 4)
contents.zh-CHS: 对等ODETE-FTP输入事件（第4节）

contents.text: SSID SFID SFPA SFNA EFID EFPA EFNA DATA ESID EERP RTR CD CDT SSRM NERP SECD AUCH AURP
contents.zh-CHS: SSID SFID SFPA SFNA EFID EFPA EFNA数据ESID EERP RTR CD CDT SSRM NERP SECD AUCH AURP

contents.text: Internal Input Events
contents.zh-CHS: 内部输入事件

contents.text: TIME-OUT - Internal ODETTE-FTP timer expires.
contents.zh-CHS: 超时-内部ODETTE-FTP计时器过期。

contents.text: Input event parameters are denoted I.Event-name.Parameter-name within the state table action and predicate lists. Their value can be examined but not changed by the ODETTE-FTP entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 输入事件参数在状态表动作和谓词列表中表示为I.event-name.Parameter-name。ODETTE-FTP实体可以检查它们的值，但不能更改它们的值。

contents.text: 9.5. Output Events
contents.zh-CHS: 9.5. 输出事件

contents.text: User Monitor Output Events (Section 3)
contents.zh-CHS: 用户监视器输出事件（第3节）

contents.text:
F_DATA_IND  F_CONNECT_IND  F_START_FILE_IND     F_CLOSE_FILE_IND
F_EERP_IND  F_CONNECT_CF   F_START_FILE_CF(+)   F_CLOSE_FILE_CF(+)
F_CD_IND    F_ABORT_IND    F_START_FILE_CF(-)   F_CLOSE_FILE_CF(-)
F_NERP_IND  F_RELEASE_IND  F_DATA_CF            F_RTR_CF
Network Output Events (Section 2.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 网络输出事件（第2.2节）

contents.text: N_CON_RQ N_CON_RS N_DATA_RQ N_DISC_RQ
contents.zh-CHS: N_CON_RQ N_CON_RS N_数据N_RQ N_光盘

contents.text: Peer ODETTE-FTP Output Events (Section 4)
contents.zh-CHS: 对等ODETE-FTP输出事件（第4节）

contents.text: SSID SFID SFPA SFNA EFID EFPA EFNA DATA ESID EERP RTR CD CDT SSRM NERP SECD AUCH AURP

contents.text: 9.6. Local Variables
contents.zh-CHS: 9.6. 局部变量

contents.text: The following variables are maintained by the ODETTE-FTP entity to assist the operation of the protocol. They are denoted V.Variable-name within the state table action and predicate lists. Their value can be examined and changed by the ODETTE-FTP entity. The initial value of each variable is undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下变量由ODETTE-FTP实体维护，以协助协议的运行。它们在状态表动作和谓词列表中表示为V.Variable-name。ODETTE-FTP实体可以检查和更改它们的值。每个变量的初始值未定义。

contents.text:
Variable       Type       Comments
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Buf-size       Integer    Negotiated Data Exchange Buffer size.
Called-addr    Address    Used to build O.F_CONNECT_IND.Called-addr
Calling-addr   Address    To build O.F_CONNECT_IND.Calling-addr
Compression    Yes/No     Compression in use as agreed.
Credit_L       Integer    Listener's credit counter.
Credit_S       Integer    Speaker's credit counter.
Id             String     Used to build O.SSID.Id
Mode                      Sender-only, Receiver-only, Both.
Pswd           String     Password, used to build O.SSID.Pswd
Req-buf        Primitive  Input event (F_XXX_RQ) stored in WF_CD
                           state.
Restart        Yes/No     Restart in used as agreed.
Restart-pos    Integer    Used only during file opening.
Window         Integer    The credit value negotiated for the
                           session.
Caller         Yes/No     This entity initiated the ODETTE-FTP
                           session.
Authentication Yes/No     Secure authentication in use as agreed
Challenge      Binary     Random challenge
---------------------------------------------------------------------
9.7. Local Constants
contents.zh-CHS: 9.7. 局部常数

contents.text: The following constants define the capabilities of a given ODETTE-FTP entity. They are denoted C.Constant-name within the state table action and predicate lists. Their value can be examined but not changed by the ODETTE-FTP entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下常量定义给定ODETTE-FTP实体的功能。它们在状态表动作和谓词列表中表示为C.Constant-name。ODETTE-FTP实体可以检查它们的值，但不能更改它们的值。

contents.text:
Constant         Value               Comments
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Cap-compression  Yes/No              Compression supported?
Cap-init         Initiator           Must be Initiator.
                 Responder           Must be Responder.
                 Both                Can be Initiator or Responder.
Cap-mode         Sender-only         Must be sender.
                 Receiver-only       Must be receiver.
                 Both                Can be sender or receiver.
Max-buf-size     127 < Int < 100000  Maximum Data Exchange Buffer
                                      size supported.
Max-window       0 < Int < 1000      Local maximum credit value.
Cap-restart      Yes/No              Restart supported?
Cap-logic        0, 1, 2             0 = does not support special
                                         logic
                                     1 = supports special logic
                                     2 = needs special logic
---------------------------------------------------------------------
