contents.text: 9.13. Example

Consider an ODETTE-FTP entity that has sent a Start File (SFID) command and entered the Open Out Pending (OPOP) state. Its response on receiving a Positive Answer (SFPA) is documented in Speaker State Table 1, which shows that transition 'K' should be applied and is interpreted as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑一个ODETTE-FTP实体，它已经发送了一个启动文件（SFID）命令，并进入了打开的待机状态（OPop'）状态。其在收到肯定回答（SFPA）时的响应记录在说话人状态表1中，表1显示应应用过渡“K”，并解释如下：

contents.text:
if (I.SFPA.Restart-pos > V.Restart-pos) then
begin                                       // invalid restart
   Actions:   Stop inactivity timer,        // reset timer
              Start inactivity timer;
   Output:    ESID(R=02),                   // to peer ODETTE-FTP
              F_ABORT_IND(R,AO=L);          // to User Monitor
   New State: WF_NDISC;
end
else begin
   Actions:   Stop inactivity timer,        // reset timer
              Start inactivity timer;
              Build F_START_FILE_CF(+) from I.SFPA
              V.Credit_S = V.Window         // initialise credit
   Output:    F_START_FILE_CF(+);           // to User Monitor
   New State: OPO;
end

ODETTE-FTP checks the restart position in the received Start File Positive Answer (SFPA) command. If it is invalid, it aborts the session by sending an End Session (ESID) command to its peer and an Abort indication (F_ABORT_IND) to its User Monitor. If the restart position is valid, a Start File confirmation (F_START_FILE_CF) is built and sent to the User Monitor, the credit window is initialised, and the Open Out (OPO) state is entered.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP检查收到的启动文件肯定应答（SFPA）命令中的重启位置。如果无效，它将通过向其对等方发送结束会话（ESID）命令和向其用户监视器发送中止指示（F_Abort_IND）来中止会话。如果重新启动位置有效，则生成启动文件确认（F_Start_File_CF）并发送给用户监视器，初始化信用窗口，并进入开放（OPO）状态。

contents.text: 10. Miscellaneous
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 混杂的

contents.text: 10.1. Algorithm Choice
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 算法选择

contents.text: The choice of algorithms to use for security or compression between partners is for bilateral agreement outside of ODETTE-FTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 合作伙伴之间用于安全或压缩的算法的选择是为了在ODETTE-FTP之外达成双边协议。

contents.text: 10.2. Cryptographic Algorithms
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. 密码算法

contents.text: The algorithms for symmetric and asymmetric cryptography and hashing are represented by a coded value, the cipher suite:
contents.zh-CHS: 对称和非对称加密和散列的算法由编码值表示，密码套件：

contents.text:
Cipher Suite  Symmetric          Asymmetric    Hashing
------------  -----------------  ------------  -------
01 3DES_EDE_CBC_3KEY RSA_PKCS1_15 SHA-1 02 AES_256_CBC RSA_PKCS1_15 SHA-1
contents.zh-CHS: 01 3DES_EDE_CBC_3KEY RSA_PKCS1_15 SHA-1 02 AES_256_CBC RSA_PKCS1_15 SHA-1

contents.text: Support of all cipher suites listed here is mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须支持此处列出的所有密码套件。

contents.text: The certificates used must be [X.509] certificates.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用的证书必须是[X.509]证书。

contents.text: TripleDES is using Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode for added security and uses the Encryption Decryption Encryption (EDE) process with 3 different 64-bit keys.
contents.zh-CHS: TripleDES使用密码块链接（CBC）模式来增加安全性，并使用3个不同的64位密钥的加密-解密-加密（EDE）过程。

contents.text: RSA padding is as defined in [PKCS#1].
contents.zh-CHS: RSA填充的定义见[PKCS#1]。

contents.text: AES is using a 256-bit key in CBC mode.
contents.zh-CHS: AES在CBC模式下使用256位密钥。

contents.text: An extended list of optional cipher suites may be used (Section 10.3), but there is no guarantee that two communicating ODETTE-FTP entities would both support these optional cipher suites.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以使用可选密码套件的扩展列表（第10.3节），但不能保证两个通信的ODETTE-FTP实体都支持这些可选密码套件。

contents.text: 10.3. Protocol Extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3. 协议扩展

contents.text: The algorithms and file enveloping formats available in ODETTE-FTP may be extended outside of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP中可用的算法和文件封装格式可扩展到本文件之外。

contents.text: An up-to-date list of cipher suite values for use in ODETTE-FTP is maintained by ODETTE International, and published on their website at www.odette.org.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE International维护用于ODETTE-FTP的密码套件值的最新列表，并在其网站www.ODETTE.org上发布。

contents.text: 10.4. Certificate Services
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4. 证书服务

contents.text: Certificates and certificate revocation lists may be exchanged as [CMS] enveloped files. It is therefore valid to exchange a [CMS] file that is neither encrypted, compressed, nor signed. It is an application implementation issue to determine the correct course of action on receipt of such a file.
contents.zh-CHS: 证书和证书撤销列表可以作为[CMS]信封文件交换。因此，交换既没有加密、压缩也没有签名的[CMS]文件是有效的。在收到此类文件时，确定正确的操作过程是一个应用程序实现问题。

contents.text: 11. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 安全考虑

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP security requires the use of [X.509] certificates. If no security options are agreed for use, the send and receive passwords are sent in plain text. Whilst this is acceptable over X.25 and ISDN networks, this is a risky practice over insecure public networks such as the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP安全性要求使用[X.509]证书。如果不同意使用安全选项，发送和接收密码将以纯文本形式发送。虽然这在X.25和ISDN网络上是可以接受的，但在不安全的公共网络（如互联网）上，这是一种危险的做法。

contents.text: All, some, or none of the security options available in ODETTE-FTP may be used. No recommendations for the use of these options are provided in this specification. Whilst use of the highest-strength encryption algorithms may seem admirable, there is often a performance tradeoff to be made, and signing all files and acknowledgements has potential legal implications that should be considered.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以使用ODETTE-FTP中的所有、部分或任何安全选项。本规范中未提供使用这些选项的建议。虽然使用最高强度的加密算法似乎令人钦佩，但通常需要进行性能权衡，并且签署所有文件和确认具有潜在的法律影响，应予以考虑。

contents.text: It should be noted that whilst the security measures ensure that an ODETTE-FTP partner is authenticated, it does not necessarily mean that the partner is authorised. Having proven the identity of a partner, it is an application issue to decide whether that partner is allowed to connect or exchange files.
contents.zh-CHS: 应注意的是，虽然安全措施确保ODETTE-FTP合作伙伴经过认证，但这并不一定意味着该合作伙伴已获得授权。在证明了合作伙伴的身份后，决定是否允许该合作伙伴连接或交换文件是一个应用程序问题。

contents.text: Extracted from [RFC3850]:
contents.zh-CHS: 摘自[RFC3850]：

contents.text: "When processing certificates, there are many situations where the processing might fail. Because the processing may be done by a user agent, a security gateway, or other program, there is no single way to handle such failures. Just because the methods to handle the failures have not been listed, however, the reader should not assume that they are not important. The opposite is true: if a certificate is not provably valid and associated with the message, the processing software should take immediate and noticeable steps to inform the end user about it.
contents.zh-CHS: “在处理证书时，有许多情况下处理可能会失败。由于处理可能由用户代理、安全网关或其他程序完成，因此没有单一的方法来处理此类失败。但是，仅仅因为没有列出处理失败的方法，读者不应假定它们是正确的不重要。事实正好相反：如果证书不可证明有效且与消息关联，则处理软件应立即采取明显的步骤通知最终用户。

contents.text: Some of the many situations in which signature and certificate checking might fail include the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 签名和证书检查可能失败的许多情况包括：

contents.text: No certificate chain leads to a trusted CA No ability to check the Certificate Revocation List (CRL) for a certificate An invalid CRL was received The CRL being checked is expired The certificate is expired The certificate has been revoked
contents.zh-CHS: 没有证书链导致受信任的CA无法检查证书吊销列表（CRL）中的证书接收到无效的CRL正在检查的CRL已过期证书已过期证书已被吊销

contents.text: There are certainly other instances where a certificate may be invalid, and it is the responsibility of the processing software to check them all thoroughly, and to decide what to do if the check fails. See RFC 3280 for additional information on certificate path validation."
contents.zh-CHS: 当然，在其他情况下，证书可能是无效的，处理软件有责任彻底检查所有证书，并决定如果检查失败怎么办。有关证书路径验证的更多信息，请参阅RFC 3280。“

contents.text: The push / pull nature of ODETTE-FTP means that a party can make an outbound connection from behind a firewall to another party and exchange files in both directions. There is no need for both partners to open ports on their firewalls to allow incoming connections; only one party needs to allow incoming connections.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP的推/拉特性意味着一方可以从防火墙后面建立到另一方的出站连接，并在两个方向上交换文件。双方无需在防火墙上打开端口以允许传入连接；只有一方需要允许传入连接。

contents.text: See Section 1.7 for a discussion of the benefits of session security [TLS] versus file security.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关会话安全性[TLS]与文件安全性的好处的讨论，请参见第1.7节。

contents.text: Appendix A. Virtual File Mapping Example
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.虚拟文件映射示例

contents.text: This example demonstrates the mapping of a Virtual File into a sequence of ODETTE-FTP Data Exchange Buffers.
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例演示如何将虚拟文件映射到ODETTE-FTP数据交换缓冲区序列。

contents.text: Each line in this extract from 'The Rime of the Ancient Mariner' by Coleridge [RIME] is separated by CR-LFs in a file that is being transmitted as a T format file.
contents.zh-CHS: 柯勒律治的《古代水手的雾凇》摘录中的每一行都由CR LFs分隔，并以T格式文件传输。

contents.text: It is an ancient Mariner, And he stoppeth one of three. "By thy long grey beard and glittering eye, Now wherefore stopp'st thou me?
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一个古代水手，他阻止了三个中的一个。“凭你那长长的灰胡子和闪闪发光的眼睛，你为什么要阻止我？

contents.text: "The Bridegroom's doors are opened wide, And I am next of kin; The guests are met, the feast is set: May'st hear the merry din."
contents.zh-CHS: “新郎的门开得很大，我是他的近亲；客人们都来了，宴会已经安排好了。我可以听到欢乐的喧闹声。”

contents.text: He holds him with his skinny hand, "There was a ship," quoth he. "Hold off! unhand me, grey-beard loon!" Eftsoons his hand dropt he.
contents.zh-CHS: 他用瘦削的手握住他，“有一艘船，”他引用道。“等等！放开我，灰胡子呆子！”埃夫特松了松手。

contents.text: He holds him with his glittering eye-- The Wedding-Guest stood still, And listens like a three years; child: The Mariner hath his will.
contents.zh-CHS: 他用闪闪发光的眼睛抱住他——婚礼上的客人一动不动地站着，像听了三年似的；孩子：水手有他的意志。

contents.text: The Wedding-Guest sat on a stone: He cannot chuse but hear; And thus spake on that ancient man, The bright-eyed Mariner.
contents.zh-CHS: 婚礼的客人坐在一块石头上：他不能不听到；就这样谈到了那个目光明亮的水手。

contents.text: The ship was cheered, the harbour cleared, Merrily did we drop Below the kirk, below the hill, Below the light-house top.
contents.zh-CHS: 船被欢呼，港口被清理干净，我们高兴地降落在柯克河下，山下，灯塔顶下。

contents.text: The Exchange Buffers below were built from the above. The top line of each represents the ASCII code, while the two lines below give the hexadecimal value.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的Exchange缓冲区是从上面构建的。每行的顶行表示ASCII码，而下面的两行表示十六进制值。

contents.text: Note that:
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意：

contents.text: . The "D" at the beginning of each Exchange Buffer is the command code.
contents.zh-CHS: . 每个Exchange缓冲区开头的“D”是命令代码。

contents.text: . The "?" preceding each subrecord is the header octet (see the hexadecimal value).
contents.zh-CHS: . 每个子记录前面的“？”是头八位字节（参见十六进制值）。

contents.text: Exchange Buffer 1
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区1

contents.text: Appendix B. ISO 646 Character Subset
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.ISO 646字符子集

contents.text: Appendix C. X.25 Specific Information
contents.zh-CHS: 附录C.X.25具体信息

contents.text: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) model is the basis for ODETTE-FTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 国际标准化组织（ISO）开放系统互连（OSI）模型是ODETE-FTP的基础。

contents.text: ODETTE-FTP covers levels 4 to 7, and originally CCITT X.25 was the only recommended telecommunication protocol for OSI's layers 1, 2, 3.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP涵盖4至7级，最初CCITT X.25是OSI第1、2、3层的唯一推荐电信协议。

contents.text: ISO Reference Model:
contents.zh-CHS: ISO参考模型：

contents.text: C.1. X.25 Addressing Restrictions
contents.zh-CHS: C.1. X.25解决限制

contents.text: When an X.25 call is made over a PSDN, the Network User Address (NUA) of the destination must be specified in order that the PTT may route the call. The call placed is directed to the termination equipment upon the user's premises.
contents.zh-CHS: 当通过PSDN进行X.25呼叫时，必须指定目的地的网络用户地址（NUA），以便PTT可以路由呼叫。发出的呼叫被定向到用户所在地的终端设备。

contents.text: It is possible to provide extra information in the Call Request Packet in addition to the mandatory NUA required by the PTT.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了PTT要求的强制性NUA之外，还可以在呼叫请求包中提供额外信息。

contents.text: This extra information may be of 2 kinds:
contents.zh-CHS: 此额外信息可能有两种：

contents.text: (a) A subaddress:
contents.zh-CHS: (a) 子地址：

contents.text: It is simply an extension to the address and it is put into the called address field of the Call Request Packet. This information (Address + Subaddress) is taken from the destination address field of the F_CONNECT_RQ; therefore, from the user's point of view, there is no distinction between the main address and subaddress parts.
contents.zh-CHS: 它只是地址的一个扩展，被放入呼叫请求包的被叫地址字段中。此信息（地址+子地址）取自F_CONNECT_RQ的目标地址字段；因此，从用户的角度来看，主地址和子地址部分之间没有区别。

contents.text: (b) User data:
contents.zh-CHS: (b) 用户数据：

contents.text: There is no standard for user data. Moreover, there is no information in the F_CONNECT_RQ from which the ODETTE-entity may derive user data to be put in the N_CONNECT_RQ; therefore, user data shall not be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户数据没有标准。此外，在F_CONNECT_RQ中不存在奥德特实体可从中导出要放入N_CONNECT_RQ中的用户数据的信息；因此，不得使用用户数据。

contents.text: C.2. Special Logic
contents.zh-CHS: C.2. 特殊逻辑

contents.text: The SSID field SSIDSPEC specifies whether special logic must be applied (Y (yes) or N (no)) to the Data Exchange Buffer before the ODETTE-FTP moves the data into the NSDU (Network Service Data Unit) and passes control to the Network Service.
contents.zh-CHS: SSID字段SSIDSPEC指定在ODETE-FTP将数据移动到NSDU（网络服务数据单元）并将控制权传递给网络服务之前，是否必须对数据交换缓冲区应用特殊逻辑（Y（是）或N（否）。

contents.text: C.2.1. When Special Logic Is Not To Be Used
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.1. 当不使用特殊逻辑时

contents.text: This logic is not applied to SSRM and SSID commands.
contents.zh-CHS: 此逻辑不适用于SSRM和SSID命令。

contents.text: C.2.2. The Need for "Enveloping" Exchange Buffers
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.2. 需要“封装”交换缓冲区

contents.text: The "special-logic" parameter was created in order to allow the use of ODETTE-FTP over asynchronous links. The "special-logic" could be needed to enable terminals to access an X.25 network via an asynchronous entry (through a PAD: Packet Assembly / Disassembly). The "special-logic" is not needed in case of a whole X.25 connection. This "special-logic" realises a CRC function in order to detect errors due to the asynchronous medium.
contents.zh-CHS: 创建“特殊逻辑”参数是为了允许在异步链路上使用ODETTE-FTP。可能需要“特殊逻辑”使终端能够通过异步条目（通过PAD：数据包组装/拆卸）访问X.25网络。在整个X.25连接的情况下，不需要“特殊逻辑”。这种“特殊逻辑”实现CRC功能，以便检测由异步介质引起的错误。

contents.text: Negotiation of the "special-logic" parameter in the SSID command is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: SSID命令中“特殊逻辑”参数的协商如下：

contents.text: This logic is activated when the "special-logic" parameter in the SSID specifies Y (yes).
contents.zh-CHS: 当SSID中的“特殊逻辑”参数指定Y（是）时，此逻辑被激活。

contents.text: Special logic processing, when activated, will function within level 4 of the OSI model.
contents.zh-CHS: 特殊逻辑处理在激活时，将在OSI模型的第4级内运行。

contents.text: C.2.3. Responsibilities of Special Logic
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.3. 特殊逻辑的责任

contents.text: When transmitting an Exchange Buffer and special logic is active, layer 4 will wrap the Exchange Buffer in synchronization and delineation characters, then protect the data integrity by means of a block checksum (BCS). When receiving an Exchange Buffer and special logic is active, layer 4 will remove such things as synchronization and delineation characters, etc., before passing the Exchange Buffer to the higher layers.
contents.zh-CHS: 当传输交换缓冲区且特殊逻辑处于活动状态时，第4层将以同步和描绘字符包装交换缓冲区，然后通过块校验和（BCS）保护数据完整性。当接收到交换缓冲区且特殊逻辑处于活动状态时，第4层将在将交换缓冲区传递给更高层之前删除同步和描绘字符等内容。

contents.text: C.2.4. Extended Exchange Buffer Format
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.4. 扩展交换缓冲区格式

contents.text: Each envelope has a 1-byte header prefixed to it, and a 2-byte checksum appended to the end. The checksum is derived in a manner specified in the ISO DIS 8073 TRANSPORT LAYER documentation.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个信封都有一个前缀为1字节的标题，结尾附加一个2字节的校验和。校验和以ISO DIS 8073传输层文档中规定的方式导出。

contents.text: The layout of the data buffer will be structured as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据缓冲区的布局结构如下：

contents.text: The envelope is initialised with an STX and the checksum variables are set to 0. The leading STX is not protected by the checksum calculation but is explicitly protected by a character compare at the receiver's end. The Exchange Buffer is processed character by character. As each character is removed from the Exchange Buffer, it is put through the checksum calculation and then, prior to its insertion in the envelope, it is put through the Shift-out transparency logic, which will result in either one or two characters being inserted. When the contents of the Exchange Buffer have been entirely processed, then the checksum variables are brought up to date by inserting two X'00's through the checksum calculator and the two resultant checksum characters forwarded to the Shift-out transparency logic for insertion into the envelope. Finally, a carriage return (CR) is appended to the envelope. The segment is now ready for transmission to line.
contents.zh-CHS: 信封用STX初始化，校验和变量设置为0。前导STX不受校验和计算的保护，但受接收器端字符比较的明确保护。交换缓冲区是逐字符处理的。当每个字符从Exchange缓冲区中删除时，都会对其进行校验和计算，然后在将其插入信封之前，会对其进行移出透明逻辑，这将导致插入一个或两个字符。当交换缓冲区的内容完全处理完毕后，通过校验和计算器插入两个X'00，并将两个结果校验和字符转发给移出透明逻辑以插入信封，从而使校验和变量更新。最后，在信封上附加回车符（CR）。该段现在已准备好传输到线路。

contents.text: Upon receipt of a valid envelope that has the correct sequence number, the host should increment his sequence number register ready for the next transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到具有正确序列号的有效信封后，主机应增加其序列号寄存器，以备下次传输。

contents.text: The receiver will initialise his receiving buffer area upon receipt of an STX character, place the STX at the beginning of the buffer, and reset checksum variables. All subsequent characters are processed using Shift-out logic before they are inserted into the buffer, at which point they will NOT be processed by the checksum calculator, although the character following the Shift-out (after subtracting X'20') will be. The checksum characters themselves will be processed by the checksum calculator by virtue of the design of the checksum algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收器将在收到STX字符后初始化其接收缓冲区，将STX置于缓冲区的开头，并重置校验和变量。所有后续字符在插入缓冲区之前都使用移位逻辑进行处理，此时校验和计算器将不处理这些字符，尽管移位后的字符（减去X'20'）将被删除。通过设计校验和算法，校验和计算器将处理校验和字符本身。

contents.text: C.2.5. Error recovery
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.5. 错误恢复

contents.text: C.2.5.1. Mechanism
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.5.1. 机械装置

contents.text: The error correction scheme is implemented by the definition of three timers and the use of an ASCII NAK (Negative Acknowledgement) character followed by a C/R. The <NAK><C/R> will flow between the two session partners, but only as a consequence of previous bad data.
contents.zh-CHS: 纠错方案通过定义三个计时器和使用ASCII NAK（否定确认）字符，后跟C/R来实现。<NAK><C/R>将在两个会话伙伴之间流动，但仅作为先前坏数据的结果。

contents.text: A user of the error recovery correcting extension must always work with a credit value of 1. This can be forced upon any session partner at SSID negotiation. The effect will be to force a simple half-duplex flip-flop protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误恢复更正扩展的用户必须始终使用信用值1。这可以在SSID协商时强制给任何会话伙伴。其效果将是强制使用一个简单的半双工触发器协议。

contents.text: Upon receipt of a bad block, send <NAK><C/R> to the session partner.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到坏块后，向会话伙伴发送<NAK><C/R>。

contents.text: Upon receipt of a <NAK><C/R>, a session partner should retransmit the last block in its entirety.
contents.zh-CHS: 在收到<NAK><C/R>后，会话伙伴应全部重新传输最后一个块。

contents.text: C.2.5.2. Timers

The majority of error conditions will be detected by a bad BCS sequence. However, certain conditions cannot be so detected. For example, a corrupt C/R will mean that the receiver will not know that the end of a block has been reached. No matter how long he waits, no more data will come from the sender. Thus, a timer is the only way to detect this type of corruption. There are three timers needed to detect all possible malignant conditions of this type.
contents.zh-CHS: 大多数错误情况将由错误的BCS序列检测。但是，某些情况无法检测到。例如，损坏的C/R将意味着接收器将不知道已到达块的末尾。无论他等待多长时间，都不会有更多的数据来自发送者。因此，计时器是检测此类损坏的唯一方法。需要三个计时器来检测这种类型的所有可能的恶性疾病。

contents.text: T1 - Exchange Buffer Time Out (Inactivity or Response) T2 - Inter Character Time Out T3 - Data Carrier Detect Loss Time Out
contents.zh-CHS: T1-交换缓冲区超时（不活动或响应）T2-字符间超时T3-数据载波检测丢失超时

contents.text: The three timers are in addition to the timer defined in the original protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 这三个定时器是原始协议中定义的定时器的补充。

contents.text: TIMER T1 - RESPONSE TIME OUT (DEFAULT = 45 SECONDS):
contents.zh-CHS: 计时器T1-响应超时（默认值为45秒）：

contents.text: Used to detect a high-level block Time Out, e.g., the Time Out between an SFID and its associated SFPA or SFNA response.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于检测高级块超时，例如，SFID与其相关SFPA或SFNA响应之间的超时。

contents.text: Started - It is started after the last character of an exchange buffer has been sent to the line.
contents.zh-CHS: 已启动-在exchange缓冲区的最后一个字符发送到行后启动。

contents.text: Stopped - It is stopped when an STX has been received.
contents.zh-CHS: 已停止-收到STX后停止。

contents.text: Expiry - Retransmit the whole block again, until such time as the retry limit has been reached.
contents.zh-CHS: 到期-再次重新传输整个数据块，直到达到重试限制。

contents.text: TIMER T2 - INTER CHARACTER TIME OUT (DEFAULT = 7 SECONDS):
contents.zh-CHS: 计时器T2-字符间超时（默认值为7秒）：

contents.text: Used to detect errors in the reception of individual characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于检测单个字符接收中的错误。

contents.text: Started - For an asynchronous entity, it is started upon receipt of each character while in synchronisation mode. For an X.25 entity, it is started after a received block that did not terminate an Exchange Buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 已启动-对于异步实体，它在同步模式下收到每个字符后启动。对于X.25实体，它在接收到未终止Exchange缓冲区的块之后启动。

contents.text: Stopped - Upon receipt of the next character.
contents.zh-CHS: 停止-在收到下一个字符时。

contents.text: Expiry - Send a <NAK><C/R>, drop out of synchronised mode, and go back and listen to line.
contents.zh-CHS: 到期-发送<NAK><C/R>，退出同步模式，然后返回并收听线路。

contents.text: TIMER T3 - DATA CARRIER TEMPORARY LOSS (DEFAULT = 1 SECOND):
contents.zh-CHS: 计时器T3-数据载体临时丢失（默认值=1秒）：

contents.text: Used by an asynchronous entity only and is used to detect a temporary carrier failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 仅由异步实体使用，用于检测临时载波故障。

contents.text: Started - When DCD (Data Carrier Detect) is lost.
contents.zh-CHS: 已启动-当DCD（数据载波检测）丢失时。

contents.text: Stopped - When DCD is regained.
contents.zh-CHS: 停止-恢复DCD时。

contents.text: Expiry - Disconnect the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 到期-断开会话连接。

contents.text: C.2.5.3. Types of Error
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.5.3. 错误类型

contents.text: Data corruption when it occurs can be categorised in one of five ways:
contents.zh-CHS: 发生数据损坏时，可按以下五种方式之一进行分类：

contents.text: (1) CORRUPT STX (START OF TEXT)
contents.zh-CHS: (1) 损坏的STX（文本开头）

contents.text: In this situation the STX is not seen and synchronisation is not achieved. The terminating C/R is received out of synchronisation and hence the block is not seen by the receiver. A <NAK><C/R> is transmitted to the sender to indicate this. The sender should then retransmit the last block (each implementation will need to set a retry limit to be used for the number of consecutive times it attempts to retransmit a block -- a default limit of 5 is recommended). All data received outside synchronisation (except <NAK><C/R>) are ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，无法看到STX，也无法实现同步。终端C/R接收不同步，因此接收器看不到该块。一个<NAK><C/R>被发送到发送方以指示这一点。然后，发送方应该重新传输最后一个块（每个实现需要设置一个重试限制，用于它尝试重新传输块的连续次数——建议默认限制为5）。在同步之外接收的所有数据（除了<NAK><C/R>）都将被忽略。

contents.text: Dropped Start of Text (STX)
contents.zh-CHS: 删除的文本开头（STX）

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Resent
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区重新发送

contents.text: (2) CORRUPT TERMINATION (C/R)
contents.zh-CHS: (2) 损坏的终止（C/R）

contents.text: This situation manifests itself as an extended period of synchronisation with no activity. The T2 timer will detect this condition.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种情况表现为无活动的长时间同步。T2定时器将检测到这种情况。

contents.text: Corrupt Carriage Return
contents.zh-CHS: 损坏的回车

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Resent
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区重新发送

contents.text: (3) BAD DATA (4) BAD BCS (BLOCK CHECK SUM)
contents.zh-CHS: (3) 错误数据（4）错误BCS（块校验和）

contents.text: In this situation, the receiver is unable to tell whether the error is bad data or bad BCS. In either case, the response is to discard the Exchange Buffer and send a <NAK><C/R>.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，接收器无法判断错误是坏数据还是坏BCS。在这两种情况下，响应都是丢弃Exchange缓冲区并发送<NAK><C/R>。

contents.text: Bad Data/BCS
contents.zh-CHS: 坏数据/BCS

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Resent
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区重新发送

contents.text: (5) BAD BLOCK SEQUENCE NUMBER (BSN)
contents.zh-CHS: (5) 坏块序列号（BSN）

contents.text: A circular sequential number (0 up to and including 9) is assigned to transmitted Exchange Buffers. This is to aid detection of duplicate or out-of-sequence Exchange Buffers. Once a duplicate block is detected, the Exchange Buffer in question is discarded. Once an out of sequence block is detected, this should result in a protocol violation.
contents.zh-CHS: 向传输的交换缓冲区分配一个循环序列号（0到9，包括9）。这有助于检测重复或无序的交换缓冲区。一旦检测到重复块，将丢弃有问题的Exchange缓冲区。一旦检测到无序块，这将导致协议冲突。

contents.text: Example protocol sequence:
contents.zh-CHS: 协议序列示例：

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Discard Block and start Timer T1
contents.zh-CHS: 丢弃块并启动计时器T1

contents.text: T1 Timed Out
contents.zh-CHS: T1超时

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Resent
contents.zh-CHS: 交换缓冲区重新发送

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Exchange Buffer Being Sent
contents.zh-CHS: 正在发送Exchange缓冲区

contents.text: Note: A credit value of 1 must be used to guarantee half-duplex flip-flop.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：必须使用信用值1来保证半双工触发器。

contents.text: C.2.6. Sequence of Events for Special Logic Processing
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.6. 用于特殊逻辑处理的事件序列

contents.text: The following functions will be executed in sequence:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下功能将按顺序执行：

contents.text: 1. Calculation of the Block Sequence Number (BSN):
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 块序列号（BSN）的计算：

contents.text: BSN is set to zero by SSID. First block will be sent with value zero. Value of BSN is increased by one for each data buffer to be transmitted. When BSN value exceeds 9, counter will be reset to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: BSN由SSID设置为零。第一个数据块将以零值发送。对于要传输的每个数据缓冲区，BSN的值增加1。当BSN值超过9时，计数器将重置为零。

contents.text: Format: numeric/1 pos.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：数字/1位。

contents.text: 2. Calculation of the Block Checksum (BCS):
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 块校验和（BCS）的计算：

contents.text: Calculation is done as specified in the ISO DIS 8073 TRANSPORT LAYER document.
contents.zh-CHS: 按照ISO DIS 8073传输层文件的规定进行计算。

contents.text: Format: binary/2 pos.
contents.zh-CHS: 格式：二进制/2位。

contents.text: 3. Shift-out transparency (See TRANSMIT/RECEIVE logic.)
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 移出透明度（参见发送/接收逻辑。）

contents.text: To avoid appearance of any control characters in the data stream, all the characters of the extended Exchange Buffer (with exception of the STX and carriage return characters enveloping the buffer) are put through a Shift-out logic, which result in a character being inserted (SO) and adding hex value '20' to the control character.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免数据流中出现任何控制字符，扩展交换缓冲区的所有字符（包围缓冲区的STX和回车字符除外）都通过移位逻辑，这导致插入字符（SO）并向控制字符添加十六进制值“20”。

contents.text: 4. The carriage return is inserted at the end of the data buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 回车插入到数据缓冲区的末尾。

contents.text: Note: After adding STX, BSN, BCS, CR, and SO-logic, the data buffer may exceed the Data Exchange Buffer size.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：添加STX、BSN、BCS、CR等逻辑后，数据缓冲区可能会超过数据交换缓冲区的大小。

contents.text: C.2.7. Checksum Creation Algorithm
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.7. 校验和生成算法

contents.text: These follow the ISO DIS 8073 TRANSPORT LAYER standard.
contents.zh-CHS: 它们遵循ISO DIS 8073传输层标准。

contents.text: SYMBOLS:
contents.zh-CHS: 符号：

contents.text: The following symbols are used:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用以下符号：

contents.text: C0,C1 Variables used in the algorithm L Length of the complete NSDU X Value of the first octet of the checksum parameter Y Value of the second octet of the checksum parameter
contents.zh-CHS: 算法L中使用的C0、C1变量校验和参数第一个八位字节的完整NSDU X值的长度校验和参数第二个八位字节的Y值

contents.text: ARITHMETIC CONVENTIONS:
contents.zh-CHS: 算术约定：

contents.text: Addition is performed in one of the two following modes:
contents.zh-CHS: 通过以下两种模式之一执行添加：

contents.text: a) modulo 255 arithmetic b) one's complement arithmetic in which if any of the variables has the value minus zero (i.e., 255) it shall be regarded as though if was plus zero (i.e., 0).
contents.zh-CHS: a) 模255算术b）一种补码算术，其中，如果任何变量的值为负零（即255），则应视为if为正零（即0）。

contents.text: ALGORITHM FOR GENERATING CHECKSUM PARAMETERS:
contents.zh-CHS: 生成校验和参数的算法：

contents.text: . Set up the complete NSDU with the value of the checksum parameter field set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: . 设置完整的NSDU，将校验和参数字段的值设置为零。

contents.text: . Initialise C0 and C1 to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: . 将C0和C1初始化为零。

contents.text: . Process each octet sequentially from i=1 to L by
contents.zh-CHS: . 按顺序从i=1到L处理每个八位组

contents.text: a) adding the value of the octet to C0, then b) adding the value of C0 to C1.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 将八位字节的值与C0相加，然后b）将C0的值与C1相加。

contents.text: . Calculate X and Y such that
contents.zh-CHS: . 计算X和Y，使

contents.text: . Place the values X and Y in the checksum bytes 1 and 2, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: . 将值X和Y分别放在校验和字节1和2中。

contents.text: C.2.8. Algorithm for checking checksum parameters
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.8. 校验和参数检查算法

contents.text: . Initialise parameters C0 and C1 to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: . 将参数C0和C1初始化为零。

contents.text: . Process each octet of NSDU sequentially from i=1 to L by
contents.zh-CHS: . 按顺序从i=1到L处理NSDU的每个八位组

contents.text: a) adding the value of the octet to C0, then b) adding the value of C0 to C1.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 将八位字节的值与C0相加，然后b）将C0的值与C1相加。

contents.text: . If, when all the octets have been processed, either or both C0 and C1 does not have the value zero, then the checksum formulas have not been satisfied.
contents.zh-CHS: . 如果处理完所有八位字节后，C0和C1中的一个或两个值都不为零，则校验和公式不满足要求。

contents.text: Note that the nature of the algorithm is such that it is not necessary to compare explicitly the stored checksum bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，该算法的本质是不需要显式比较存储的校验和字节。

contents.text: C.2.9. Shift-out Processing
contents.zh-CHS: C.2.9. 移位处理

contents.text: (Transparency for all control characters)
contents.zh-CHS: （所有控制字符的透明度）

contents.text: TRANSMIT LOGIC (values SO: X'0E' or X'8E')
contents.zh-CHS: 传输逻辑（值SO:X'0E'或X'8E'）

contents.text: Buffer(1), ... , (n) is a character in the buffer to be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 缓冲器（1），（n） 是缓冲区中要发送的字符。

contents.text: FOR i=1 to n                    /* for all octets of the buffer */
IF    ((buffer(i)  &  X'7F')  <  X'20')
THEN output (SO) output (buffer(i) + X'20')
contents.zh-CHS: 然后输出（SO）输出（缓冲区（i）+X'20'）

contents.text: ELSE output (buffer(i))
contents.zh-CHS: ELSE输出（缓冲区（i））

contents.text: NEXT:
contents.zh-CHS: 下一步：

contents.text: RECEIVE LOGIC (values SO: X'0E' or X'8E')
contents.zh-CHS: 接收逻辑（值SO:X'0E'或X'8E'）

contents.text: Buffer(1), ... , (n) is a character in the received buffer.
contents.zh-CHS: 缓冲器（1），（n） 是接收缓冲区中的字符。

contents.text:
drop = false
FOR i=1 to n                    /* for all octets of the buffer */
IF drop = true
contents.zh-CHS: 如果drop=true

contents.text: THEN output (buffer(i) - X'20') drop = false
contents.zh-CHS: 然后输出（缓冲区（i）-X'20'）drop=false

contents.text:
ELSE  IF    buffer(i) = (X'0D'  or  X'8D')
      THEN  Stop
      ELSE  IF    buffer(i) = SO
            THEN  drop = true
            ELSE  output (buffer(i))
NEXT:
contents.zh-CHS: 下一步：

contents.text: C.3. PAD Parameter Profile
contents.zh-CHS: C.3. 焊盘参数剖面图

contents.text: Before an (ODETTE-FTP) asynchronous entity --> Modem --> PAD --> (ODETTE-FTP) native X.25 link can be established, the target PAD parameters must be set such that correct communication is established. It is strongly recommended that the PAD parameters are set by the X.25 entity. CCITT recommendations X.3, X.28, and X.29 define the PAD parameters and procedures for exchange of control information and user data between a PAD and a packet mode Data Terminal Equipment (DTE).
contents.zh-CHS: 在建立（ODETTE-FTP）异步实体-->调制解调器-->PAD-->（ODETTE-FTP）本机X.25链路之前，必须设置目标PAD参数，以便建立正确的通信。强烈建议由X.25实体设置焊盘参数。CCITT建议X.3、X.28和X.29定义了PAD参数和程序，用于在PAD和分组模式数据终端设备（DTE）之间交换控制信息和用户数据。

contents.text: Following is the Parameter list and values used to set the PAD for ODETTE-FTP communication. For further detailed information see the specification for CCITT X.25, X.28, X.29 and X.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是用于设置ODETTE-FTP通信PAD的参数列表和值。有关更多详细信息，请参阅CCITT X.25、X.28、X.29和X.3规范。

contents.text:
No. Description                    Value  Meaning
---------------------------------------------------------------
1   Escape from Data Transfer       0     Controlled by host
2   Echo                            0     No Echo
3   Data Forwarding Signal          2     Carriage Return
4   Selection of Idle Timer Delay   20    1 second
5   Ancillary Device Control        0     X-ON, X-OFF not used
6   PAD Service Signals             1     All except prompt
7   Procedure on Break              2     Reset
8   Discard Output                  0     Do not discard
9   Padding after Carriage Return   0     No padding

10 Line Folding 0 No line folding 11 Terminal Data Rate - Read only 12 Flow Control of the PAD 0 No flow control used 13 Linefeed Insertion after C/R 0 No linefeed 14 Linefeed Padding 0 No linefeed padding 15 Editing 0 No editing 16 Character Delete 127 Delete 17 Line Delete 24 <CTRL>X 18 Line Display 18 <CTRL>R 19 Editing PAD Service Signals 0 No service signal 20 Echo Mask 0 No echo mask 21 Parity Treatment 0 No parity check 22 Page Wait 0 No page wait
contents.zh-CHS: 10行折叠0无行折叠11终端数据速率-只读12焊盘流量控制0无流量控制使用13 C/R后换行插入0无换行14换行填充0无换行填充15编辑0无编辑16字符删除127删除17行删除24<CTRL>x18行显示18<CTRL>R19编辑焊盘维修信号0无服务信号20回波掩码0无回波掩码21奇偶校验处理0无奇偶校验22页面等待0无页面等待

contents.text: Note 1:

Refer to CCITT (1984) - Parameters 1 - 12 are mandatory and available internationally. - Parameters 13 - 22 may be available on certain networks and may also be available internationally. - A parameter value may be mandatory or optional.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考CCITT（1984）-参数1-12是强制性的，在国际上可用。-参数13-22可能在某些网络上可用，也可能在国际上可用。-参数值可以是必需的，也可以是可选的。

contents.text: The ODETTE profile refers only to parameter values which must be internationally implemented if the parameter is made available internationally.
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE配置文件仅指参数值，如果参数在国际上可用，则必须在国际上实现这些参数值。

contents.text: The ODETTE-FTP "special-logic" parameter may be impossible on some PADs because they do not support of some of the parameters (13 - 22). (If the PAD is supporting parity check (21) by default, ODETTE-FTP special logic would be impossible.)
contents.zh-CHS: ODETTE-FTP“特殊逻辑”参数在某些焊盘上可能不可用，因为它们不支持某些参数（13-22）。（如果PAD默认支持奇偶校验（21），则不可能使用ODETTE-FTP特殊逻辑。）

contents.text: It is a user responsibility to ensure special logic consistency when making the PAD subscription.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户有责任在进行PAD订阅时确保特殊逻辑的一致性。

contents.text: Note 2:

Some parameters may have to be set differently depending on: - Make and function of the start-stop mode DTE entity. - Start-stop mode DTE entity ODETTE-FTP monitor function. - PAD services implemented. - Packet mode DTE entity ODETTE-FTP monitor function.
contents.zh-CHS: 某些参数的设置可能会有所不同，具体取决于：-启动-停止模式DTE实体的品牌和功能。-启动-停止模式DTE实体ODETE-FTP监控功能。-已实现PAD服务。-数据包模式DTE实体ODETTE-FTP监控功能。

contents.text: Appendix D. OFTP X.25 over ISDN Recommendation
contents.zh-CHS: 附录D.关于ISDN的OFTP X.25建议

contents.text: This appendix describes the recommendation of ODETTE Group 4 (1) for the use of OFTP (2) over X.25 over ISDN.
contents.zh-CHS: 本附录描述了ODETTE第4（1）组关于通过ISDN在X.25上使用OFTP（2）的建议。

contents.text: (1) ODETTE Group 4 is responsible for the specification of Telecommunications standards and recommendations for use within the Automotive Industry.
contents.zh-CHS: (1) ODETTE Group 4负责汽车行业内使用的电信标准和建议的规范。

contents.text: (2) OFTP (ODETTE File Transfer Protocol) is the communications standard specified by ODETTE Group 4 designed for the transfer of both EDI and non-EDI data.
contents.zh-CHS: (2) OFTP（ODETE文件传输协议）是ODETE第4组规定的通信标准，设计用于传输EDI和非EDI数据。

contents.text: This document offers an introductory overview of a technical subject. It is structured to contain the ODETTE recommendation, together with introductory information for the person not familiar with ISDN, and notes on the issues associated with the implementation of the recommendation.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档提供了一个技术主题的介绍性概述。它的结构包含ODETTE建议，以及为不熟悉ISDN的人提供的介绍性信息，以及关于与建议实施相关的问题的说明。

contents.text: The first section provides the detailed ODETTE recommendation, which is followed by a general discussion. If you are not familiar with the terminology, please read the subsequent sections first.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一节提供了详细的ODETTE建议，随后是一般性讨论。如果您不熟悉术语，请先阅读后面的章节。

contents.text: How far an existing X.25 Line adapter may be replaced by an ISDN line adapter in an installation depends on the opportunities in view of connections (X.25 or ISDN) of the involved partners for file transfer.
contents.zh-CHS: 在安装过程中，现有的X.25线路适配器在多大程度上可以被ISDN线路适配器替换，这取决于相关合作伙伴的文件传输连接（X.25或ISDN）的机会。

contents.text: Companies that keep many connections to external partners (for example, car manufacturing companies) may use the OFTP file transfer in view of compatibility, which must always be considered anyway only in parallel to the X.25 network.
contents.zh-CHS: 与外部合作伙伴保持大量连接的公司（例如，汽车制造公司）可能会使用OFTP文件传输，以确保兼容性，但无论如何，只有在与X.25网络并行的情况下才能考虑这种兼容性。

contents.text: It is not the aim of this recommendation to remove the OFTP file transfer generally from the X.25 network to the ISDN network. This will not always be possible for international connections because of technical reasons, and this does not always make sense for connections with a low size of data to be transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 本建议的目的并不是一般取消从X.25网络到ISDN网络的OFTP文件传输。由于技术原因，这对于国际连接并不总是可能的，对于传输数据量较小的连接来说，这并不总是有意义的。

contents.text: Certainly, the use of ISDN, when exchanging a high volume of data (for example, CAD/CAM files), is very much cheaper than the use of an X.25 network. For such cases, this recommendation shall provide a cost-effective possibility for file transfer.
contents.zh-CHS: 当然，在交换大量数据（例如CAD/CAM文件）时，使用ISDN比使用X.25网络便宜得多。对于这种情况，本建议应为文件传输提供成本效益高的可能性。

contents.text: This appendix is organized as follows. D.1 defines the ODETTE recommendation in these terms, D.2 introduces the ISDN environment to the unfamiliar reader, D.3 describes the various methods of connecting to ISDN, and D.4 covers implementation issues.
contents.zh-CHS: 本附录的组织结构如下。D.1在这些术语中定义了ODETTE建议，D.2向不熟悉的读者介绍了ISDN环境，D.3描述了连接到ISDN的各种方法，D.4涵盖了实施问题。

contents.text: D.1. ODETTE ISDN Recommendation
contents.zh-CHS: D.1. ODETTE ISDN建议

contents.text: X.25: Level 2 ISO 7776 Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: X.25：2级ISO 7776协议

contents.text: Level 3 ISO 8208 Protocol
contents.zh-CHS: 3级ISO 8208协议

contents.text: Packet Size 128
contents.zh-CHS: 数据包大小128

contents.text: Level 2 7 Window Size
contents.zh-CHS: 2级7窗口大小

contents.text: Level 3 7 Window Size
contents.zh-CHS: 3级7窗口大小

contents.text: First LCN 1
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个LCN 1

contents.text: Number of LCNs 1
contents.zh-CHS: LCN数量1

contents.text: Facilities Window Size and Packet Size negotiation shall be supported by everybody. Call User Data should not be required.
contents.zh-CHS: 设施窗口大小和数据包大小协商应得到所有人的支持。呼叫用户数据不应是必需的。

contents.text: Calling NUA Optionally provided by the call initiator.
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫发起人可选地提供呼叫NUA。

contents.text: Called NUA Should be set to a value where the last 'n' digits can be specified by the called party.
contents.zh-CHS: 被叫NUA应设置为被叫方可以指定最后“n”位的值。

contents.text: ISDN: Apart from requesting a 64K unrestricted digital call, no ISDN features shall be required.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN：除了请求64K无限制数字呼叫外，不需要ISDN功能。

contents.text: Timeout control: To avoid connections (B channels) within the circuit-switched ISDN network remaining active but unused for a long time, the adapter should include a timeout control.
contents.zh-CHS: 超时控制：为了避免电路交换ISDN网络中的连接（B通道）保持活动但长时间未使用，适配器应包括超时控制。

contents.text: An ISDN connection (B channel) should be released if no X.25 packets have been transmitted on this connection for a longer time. For flexibility a variable user definable timer should be incorporated into the adapter.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果ISDN连接（B通道）上没有传输X.25数据包的时间更长，则应释放该连接。为了灵活性，适配器中应包含一个用户可定义的可变计时器。

contents.text: In the event of a timeout situation the adapter has to release the ISDN connection and notify the local OFTP by the transmission of a clear packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 在超时情况下，适配器必须释放ISDN连接，并通过传输清除数据包通知本地OFTP。

contents.text: The pages that follow are informational and do not form part of this recommendation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下页面仅供参考，不构成本建议的一部分。

contents.text: D.2. Introduction to ISDN
contents.zh-CHS: D.2. ISDN简介

contents.text: The use of digital encoding techniques over such high-quality, error-free backbone networks has allowed the PTTs to offer high bandwidths to the end user. The service is named ISDN (Integrated Services Digital Network).
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种高质量、无差错的骨干网络上使用数字编码技术使得ptt能够向最终用户提供高带宽。该业务被命名为ISDN（综合业务数字网）。

contents.text: The increasing need to transfer larger volumes of EDI data, in particular CAD/CAM drawings, has focused attention upon high-speed, low-cost communication. The traditional X.25 over a Packet Switched Data Network (PSDN) has been a good general purpose communications subsystem. Unfortunately, its cost and transfer speed make PSDN expensive for the new requirement.
contents.zh-CHS: 越来越多地需要传输更大容量的EDI数据，特别是CAD/CAM图纸，这使得人们将注意力集中在高速、低成本的通信上。传统的分组交换数据网（PSDN）上的X.25是一个良好的通用通信子系统。不幸的是，它的成本和传输速度使得PSDN对于新的需求来说非常昂贵。

contents.text: X.25 over the new ISDN provides both the transfer speed and cost benefits to satisfy the new requirements.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25在新的ISDN上提供传输速度和成本效益，以满足新的要求。

contents.text: We include the following terminology because for us to make sense of ISDN and X.25, it is important that we use definitions precisely and avoid the abuses of the past.
contents.zh-CHS: 我们使用以下术语是因为为了理解ISDN和X.25，准确使用定义并避免过去的滥用是很重要的。

contents.text: ISDN: Integrated Services Digital Network
contents.zh-CHS: 综合业务数字网

contents.text: X.25: X.25 is a communications protocol. It defines the structure of data packets that comprise the protocol and the manner in which they are used.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25:X.25是一种通信协议。它定义了组成协议的数据包的结构及其使用方式。

contents.text: PSDN: A PSDN (Packet Switched Data Network) is a network over which the X.25 protocol is operated.
contents.zh-CHS: PSDN:PSDN（分组交换数据网络）是一个X.25协议运行的网络。

contents.text: PSPDN: A PSPDN (Packet Switched Public Data Network) is a PSDN operated by the PTTs. PSPDNs are given trade names, such as PSS in the UK, Datex-P in Germany, and Transpac in France.
contents.zh-CHS: PSPDN:PSPDN（分组交换公共数据网）是由PTT运营的PSDN。PSPDN被命名为商品名，如英国的PSS、德国的Datex-P和法国的Transpac。

contents.text: BRI: Basic Rate Interface, also known as Basic Rate Access, defines an ISDN facility with 2 x 64 K B channels.
contents.zh-CHS: BRI：基本速率接口，也称为基本速率访问，定义了具有2 x 64 KB通道的ISDN设施。

contents.text: PRI: Primary Rate Interface, also known as Primary Rate Access, defines an ISDN facility with 30 x 64 K B channels.
contents.zh-CHS: PRI:Primary Rate Interface，也称为Primary Rate Access，定义了具有30 x 64 KB通道的ISDN设施。

contents.text: Channels: ISDN is typically brought into a consumer's premises using a twisted pair of wire. Over this wire, data can be transmitted in frequency bands. These frequency bands are allocated as channels.
contents.zh-CHS: 信道：ISDN通常使用双绞线引入消费者的场所。通过这根电线，数据可以在频带内传输。这些频带被分配为信道。

contents.text: B channels: The B channels are the data channels and operate at 64 Kb. The two end users of a connection will communicate over a B channel.
contents.zh-CHS: B通道：B通道是数据通道，以64 Kb运行。连接的两个最终用户将通过B通道进行通信。

contents.text: D channel: Signalling on ISDN is performed over the D channel. Signalling is used to set up and release connections on the B channels. In some countries, the D channel can also be used for limited X.25 access to the PTTs' PSDN.
contents.zh-CHS: D通道：ISDN上的信令通过D通道执行。信令用于建立和释放B通道上的连接。在一些国家，D频道也可用于有限的X.25接入PTTs的PSDN。

contents.text: The D channel operates at the lower speed of 16 Kb as it is normally used only at the beginning and end of a connection.
contents.zh-CHS: D通道以16 Kb的较低速度运行，因为它通常仅在连接的开始和结束时使用。

contents.text: Bandwidth Allocation: 2 Wire B2 - 64 Kb Twisted Pair B1 - 64 Kb D Channel - 16 Kb
contents.zh-CHS: 带宽分配：2线B2-64 Kb双绞线B1-64 Kb D通道-16 Kb

contents.text: The standard for the operation of the D channel is called ETSI and is used in most European countries. However, some countries that started the introduction very early used proprietary standards, for example:
contents.zh-CHS: D通道的操作标准称为ETSI，在大多数欧洲国家使用。然而，一些很早就开始采用专利标准的国家，例如：

contents.text: 1TR6 - Used in Germany BTNR - Used in the UK
contents.zh-CHS: 1TR6-用于德国BTNR-用于英国

contents.text: Although there are D channel variations, this will not affect communications over the B channels as the communication over the D channel is between the subscriber and the ISDN service provider.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然存在D信道变化，但这不会影响B信道上的通信，因为D信道上的通信是在用户和ISDN服务提供商之间进行的。

contents.text: However, the consumer's equipment must be able to handle the channel D signalling operated by the ISDN service provider and so there may be a problem of equipment availability and certification.
contents.zh-CHS: 然而，用户的设备必须能够处理ISDN服务提供商操作的信道D信令，因此可能存在设备可用性和认证问题。

contents.text: All the PTTs have committed to migrate to ETSI (also known as EURO-ISDN and Q.931) and many are currently supporting both their national variant and ETSI. It is advisable that in this situation the subscriber select the ETSI variant to avoid unnecessary equipment obsolescence.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有PTT都已承诺迁移到ETSI（也称为EURO-ISDN和Q.931），许多PTT目前支持其国家变体和ETSI。在这种情况下，建议用户选择ETSI变体，以避免不必要的设备过时。

contents.text: Services: The high-speed service is provided in two forms, Basic and Primary.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务：高速服务以两种形式提供，基本和主要。

contents.text: Basic: 2+D, the D 2B channel operates at 16 Kb. The Basic Rate access is normally provided to the subscriber over simple twisted pair cable.
contents.zh-CHS: 基本：2+D，D2B通道以16 Kb运行。基本速率接入通常通过简单的双绞线电缆提供给用户。

contents.text: Primary: 30B+D, the D channel operates at 64 Kb. Primary Rate access is normally provided to the subscriber over shielded coaxial cable. Note that the bandwidth for Primary is 2.048 Mbit/s.
contents.zh-CHS: 主：30B+D，D通道以64KB运行。主要速率接入通常通过屏蔽同轴电缆提供给用户。请注意，主设备的带宽为2.048 Mbit/s。

contents.text: Protocols: The B channel is a binary channel and is transparent to the flow of data. Therefore, all of the currently available protocols can operate over a B channel. The most common protocol is X.25.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议：B通道是一个二进制通道，对数据流是透明的。因此，所有当前可用的协议都可以在B通道上运行。最常见的协议是X.25。

contents.text: X.25: The X.25 protocol is a primary protocol for open computer-to-computer communication.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25:X.25协议是开放式计算机对计算机通信的主要协议。

contents.text: Passive Bus: It is possible to have an ISDN service enter a building and then have an 8-core cable laid within the building with multiple ISDN junction points, in the same way as one would have multiple telephone points (extensions) for a particular external telephone line.
contents.zh-CHS: 无源总线：可以让一个ISDN服务进入建筑物，然后在建筑物内铺设一条8芯电缆，带有多个ISDN连接点，就像一条特定的外部电话线有多个电话点（分机）一样。

contents.text: Connection Setup
contents.zh-CHS: 连接设置

contents.text: The adapter is responsible for analysing the outgoing X.25 call request and making an ISDN call to a derived ISDN address, establishing a new X.25 level-2 and level-3, and then propagating the X.25 Call Request Packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 适配器负责分析传出的X.25呼叫请求，并对派生的ISDN地址进行ISDN呼叫，建立新的X.25 2级和3级，然后传播X.25呼叫请求数据包。

contents.text: Connection Termination
contents.zh-CHS: 连接终止

contents.text: The termination phase of the X.25 call is made with a Clear Request and finalised with a Clear Confirmation. The recipient of the Clear Confirm should then close down the ISDN connection.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25呼叫的终止阶段以明确的请求进行，并以明确的确认完成。然后，清除确认的接收者应关闭ISDN连接。

contents.text: The clear down of the ISDN connection should only be made if there are no other Switched Virtual Circuits (SVCs) active on the ISDN connection; note that the usage of multiple simultaneous SVCs is only by virtue of bilateral agreement.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有在ISDN连接上没有其他活动的交换虚拟电路（SVC）时，才应清除ISDN连接；请注意，多个同时SVC的使用仅取决于双边协议。

contents.text: D.3. Equipment Types
contents.zh-CHS: D.3. 设备类型

contents.text: There are a number of ways in which ISDN/X.25 access can be made.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN/X.25访问有多种方式。

contents.text: Integrated Adapter
contents.zh-CHS: 集成适配器

contents.text: This is normally a PC-based ISDN adapter inside a PC. It is normal in such an environment that the OFTP application has the ability to manipulate the ISDN and X.25 aspects of the session independently and therefore have complete control.
contents.zh-CHS: 这通常是PC内基于PC的ISDN适配器。在这样的环境中，OFTP应用程序能够独立操作会话的ISDN和X.25方面，因此具有完全控制权，这是正常的。

contents.text: Equally important is that the speed of communication between the adapter and the application are at PC BUS speeds. It is therefore more likely that the effective transmission speed will be nearer the 64K limit.
contents.zh-CHS: 同样重要的是，适配器和应用程序之间的通信速度为PC总线速度。因此，有效传输速度更可能接近64K限制。

contents.text: The other benefit of such a direct linkage is that both 64K B channels may be used in parallel and both able to operate at 64Kb.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种直接链接的另一个好处是，两个64K B通道可以并行使用，并且都能够以64Kb的速度运行。

contents.text: Elementary Terminal Adapter
contents.zh-CHS: 基本终端适配器

contents.text: In this scenario, the computer has an integral X.25 adapter communicating X.21 with a Terminal Adapter that fronts the ISDN network. This allows a host with a X.25 capability to interface to ISDN, normally on a one-to-one basis.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，计算机有一个集成的X.25适配器，该适配器与面向ISDN网络的终端适配器通信X.21。这允许具有X.25功能的主机与ISDN接口，通常是一对一的方式。

contents.text: The interface between the Terminal Adapter and the PC will typically only support one 64K B channel. This is obviously an inefficient usage of the ISDN service.
contents.zh-CHS: 终端适配器和PC之间的接口通常只支持一个64K B通道。这显然是ISDN服务的低效使用。

contents.text: Because the linkage between the computer and the Terminal Adapter is only X.25, then some modification/configuration may be needed inside the Terminal Adapter when new users are added.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于计算机和终端适配器之间的链接仅为X.25，因此在添加新用户时，可能需要在终端适配器内部进行一些修改/配置。

contents.text: X.25 Switch
contents.zh-CHS: X.25开关

contents.text: This solution is normally found inside the larger corporates where an internal X.25 network is operated or where dual X.25 and ISDN is required.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种解决方案通常存在于运行内部X.25网络或需要双X.25和ISDN的大型公司中。

contents.text: The main benefit of a switch is to support both PSDN and ISDN simultaneously. Also, multiple X.21 lines may be implemented between the X.25 switch and the computer.
contents.zh-CHS: 交换机的主要优点是同时支持PSDN和ISDN。此外，在X.25交换机和计算机之间可以实现多条X.21线路。

contents.text: This solution normally requires more effort to configure and may require obligations to be placed upon how incoming callers specify routing.
contents.zh-CHS: 此解决方案通常需要更多的工作来配置，并且可能需要对传入呼叫者如何指定路由设置义务。

contents.text: D.4. Implementation
contents.zh-CHS: D.4. 实施

contents.text: The adoption of ISDN as an additional subsystem to support OFTP communications has associated implementation problems, which can be categorised as below:
contents.zh-CHS: 采用ISDN作为支持OFTP通信的附加子系统存在相关的实施问题，可分为以下几类：

contents.text: X.25/ISDN Addressing Making a Call Receiving a Call Logical Channel Assignment Facilities Negotiation ISDN Call Attributes Homologation Issues Growth Performance
contents.zh-CHS: X.25/ISDN寻址发出呼叫接收呼叫逻辑信道分配设施协商ISDN呼叫属性认证问题增长性能

contents.text: D.4.1. X.25/ISDN Addressing
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.1. X.25/ISDN寻址

contents.text: The original OFTP was designed to work over the X.25 networks provided by the PTTs (PSPDNs). The national X.25 networks were interconnected to provide a global X.25 network, and a common addressing scheme was adopted by all. Although there were a few differences in addressing within a national network, the interface to other countries was quite rigid and normalised.
contents.zh-CHS: 最初的OFTP设计用于在PTTs（PSPDNs）提供的X.25网络上工作。国家X.25网络相互连接，以提供一个全球X.25网络，所有国家都采用了共同的寻址方案。尽管在一个国家网络内处理问题存在一些差异，但与其他国家的接口相当僵化和规范化。

contents.text: PSPDN Numbering
contents.zh-CHS: PSPDN编号

contents.text: The addressing scheme adopted in X.25 is a 15-digit number (Network User Address, NUA) where the first three identify the country, the fourth digit identifies the network within the country, and the remainder specify the individual subscriber plus an optional subaddress. In the UK where a full X.25 numbering scheme is adopted, a NUA is, e.g., 234221200170, where 2342 is the DNIC (Data Network Identification Code) and 21200170 is the subscriber number.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25中采用的寻址方案是一个15位数字（网络用户地址，NUA），其中前三位标识国家，第四位标识国家内的网络，其余数字指定单个订户和可选子地址。在采用完整X.25编号方案的英国，NUA是，例如234221200170，其中2342是DNIC（数据网络标识码），21200170是订户号码。

contents.text: ISDN Numbering
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN编号

contents.text: ISDN is an extension of the normal telephone system; consequently, it adopts (or rather is) the same numbering scheme as the telephone system (PSTN).
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN是普通电话系统的延伸；因此，它采用（或者更确切地说是）与电话系统（PSTN）相同的编号方案。

contents.text: The Numbering Conflict
contents.zh-CHS: 编号冲突

contents.text: The PSDN and PSTN numbering schemes are two totally different numbering schemes. There is no relationship between them. It is this conflict that is at the heart of the matter.
contents.zh-CHS: PSDN和PSTN编号方案是两种完全不同的编号方案。他们之间没有关系。这场冲突才是问题的核心。

contents.text: D.4.2. Making a Call
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.2. 打电话

contents.text: It is a consequence of PSDN and PSTN being based upon different and unconnected numbering schemes that the key problem arises.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于PSDN和PSTN基于不同且不相连的编号方案，因此出现了关键问题。

contents.text: For X.25 to work over ISDN, three main methods of addressing are available:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于在ISDN上工作的X.25，有三种主要的寻址方法：

contents.text: Un-mapped: The X.25 called NUA is used as the PSTN number. Thus, an X.25 call to 0733394023 will result in a PSTN call to 0733394023 and the call request that consequently flows will also be to 0733394023.
contents.zh-CHS: 未映射：称为NUA的X.25用作PSTN号码。因此，对0733394023的X.25呼叫将导致对0733394023的PSTN呼叫，并且随后流动的呼叫请求也将是对0733394023的。

contents.text: Manipulated: The X.25 called NUA is manipulated by the subtraction and/or addition of digits to derive a resultant PSTN number. Thus, 2394023 could be manipulated to derive a PSTN number of 00944733394023, where the prefix 2 is deleted and replaced by 00944733.
contents.zh-CHS: 操纵：称为NUA的X.25通过数字的减法和/或加法进行操纵，以得出结果PSTN号码。因此，可以操纵2394023来导出PSTN号码00944733394023，其中前缀2被删除并替换为00944733。

contents.text: Mapped: The X.25 called NUA is used as a look-up into a table of PSTN numbers. Thus, an X.25 call to 234221200170 could be mapped to and result in a PSTN call to 0733394023 and the call request that consequently flows will remain as 234221200170.
contents.zh-CHS: 映射：称为NUA的X.25用作PSTN号码表的查找。因此，对234221200170的X.25呼叫可以映射到并导致对0733394023的PSTN呼叫，并且因此流的呼叫请求将保持为234221200170。

contents.text: Un-mapped Calls
contents.zh-CHS: 未映射呼叫

contents.text: Un-mapped calls are where the host-specified X.25 NUA is converted directly to the corresponding ISDN number.
contents.zh-CHS: 未映射呼叫是指主机指定的X.25 NUA直接转换为相应的ISDN号码。

contents.text: Thus, an X.25 call issued by the host to X.25 NUA 0733394023 will result in an ISDN call to the PSTN number 0733394023. After the call has been established, then HDLC/X.25 protocol setup will be established after which an X.25 call request will be transferred with the NUA 0733394023.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，主机向X.25 NUA 0733394023发出的X.25呼叫将导致向PSTN号码0733394023发出ISDN呼叫。建立呼叫后，将建立HDLC/X.25协议设置，之后将通过NUA 0733394023传输X.25呼叫请求。

contents.text: When a PSTN call is made, the number of digits in the called number vary depending upon the location of the called party.
contents.zh-CHS: 当进行PSTN呼叫时，被叫号码中的位数取决于被叫方的位置。

contents.text: When a number is called, it may be local, national, or international.
contents.zh-CHS: 当一个号码被呼叫时，它可能是本地的、国家的或国际的。

contents.text: local: 394023 national: 0733 394023 international: 009 44 733 394023
Depending upon where a call originates, the corresponding X.25 NUA in the call request packet will vary dramatically.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据呼叫的起始位置，呼叫请求数据包中相应的X.25 NUA将发生显著变化。

contents.text: Such variation of X.25 NUA, in particular the changing prefix, can be difficult to be accommodated by X.25 routing logic in many products.
contents.zh-CHS: 在许多产品中，X.25路由逻辑很难适应X.25 NUA的这种变化，特别是前缀的变化。

contents.text: When an international PSTN call is being made, then it is likely that the PSTN number exceeds 15 digits, which is the maximum length of an X.25 NUA. Therefore, using un-mapped addressing may make some international calls impossible to make.
contents.zh-CHS: 当进行国际PSTN呼叫时，PSTN号码可能超过15位，这是X.25 NUA的最大长度。因此，使用未映射的寻址可能会使一些国际电话无法拨打。

contents.text: Manipulated Calls
contents.zh-CHS: 操纵呼叫

contents.text: The X.25 called NUA is manipulated by the subtraction and/or addition of digits to derive a resultant PSTN number.
contents.zh-CHS: 称为NUA的X.25通过数字的减法和/或加法操作，从而得出一个最终的PSTN号码。

contents.text: Let us assume that by internal convention we have identified the prefix '2' to indicate an international ISDN call. Thus, an X.25 call request of 244733394023 could be manipulated to derive a PSTN number of 00944733394023, where the prefix '2' is deleted and replaced by '009' (the international prefix).
contents.zh-CHS: 让我们假设，根据内部约定，我们已识别前缀“2”以表示国际ISDN呼叫。因此，可以操纵244733394023的X.25呼叫请求来导出00944733394023的PSTN号码，其中前缀“2”被删除并替换为“009”（国际前缀）。

contents.text: The X.25 called NUA would typically be left in its un-manipulated state. As individual internal conventions vary, the X.25 called NUA will vary. In the case above, it would be 244733394023, but another installation might have the convention where a prefix of '56' specifies the UK and so the NUA will be 56733394023, where the '56' is deleted and replaced with '00944' to derive the PSTN number.
contents.zh-CHS: 被称为NUA的X.25通常会处于未被操纵的状态。由于各个内部约定不同，称为NUA的X.25将有所不同。在上述情况下，它将是244733394023，但另一个安装可能有这样的约定，即前缀“56”指定英国，因此NUA将是56733394023，其中删除“56”并替换为“00944”以获得PSTN号码。

contents.text: Mapped Calls
contents.zh-CHS: 映射呼叫

contents.text: The mapped method offers maximum flexibility in that:
contents.zh-CHS: 映射方法在以下方面提供了最大的灵活性：

contents.text: The PSTN number can exceed 15 digits.
contents.zh-CHS: PSTN号码可以超过15位。

contents.text: The X.25 NUA and PSTN number can be totally different.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25 NUA和PSTN号码可能完全不同。

contents.text: The problem with mapped calls is administrative. IBM mainframes can't handle X.25 over ISDN at all, let alone support mapping. For the mainframe solution to work, an external X.25/ISDN router box is required and it is the responsibility of the external box to provide any mapping necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: 映射调用的问题是管理性的。IBM大型机根本无法通过ISDN处理X.25，更不用说支持映射了。为了使大型机解决方案正常工作，需要一个外部X.25/ISDN路由器盒，外部盒负责提供任何必要的映射。

contents.text: This means that any changes or addition of OFTP partners over ISDN will require access to the computer room or special configuration equipment to change the tables inside the external X.25/ISDN router box.
contents.zh-CHS: 这意味着，通过ISDN对OFTP合作伙伴进行的任何更改或添加都需要访问计算机室或特殊配置设备，以更改外部X.25/ISDN路由器盒内的表格。

contents.text: D.4.3. Receiving a Call
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.3. 接电话

contents.text: We have seen from the previous section that the called X.25 NUA from an ISDN incoming call may vary considerably. If ISDN/X.25 is confined to a national boundary, then such variation will not be so great as most calls will have matching called X.25 NUA and PSTN numbers.
contents.zh-CHS: 我们从上一节中看到，ISDN传入呼叫的被叫X.25 NUA可能会有很大差异。如果ISDN/X.25仅限于国家边界，那么这种变化将不会太大，因为大多数呼叫都有匹配的被叫X.25 NUA和PSTN号码。

contents.text: X.25 switches and X.25 adapters normally route/accept/reject calls based upon their X.25 called NUA. In particular, routing is made upon the X.25 called NUA subaddress.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25交换机和X.25适配器通常根据其称为NUA的X.25路由/接受/拒绝呼叫。特别是，路由是在称为NUA子地址的X.25上进行的。

contents.text: To derive this subaddress, there are 2 methods:
contents.zh-CHS: 要派生此子地址，有两种方法：

contents.text: 1) the last 'n' digits are analysed.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 分析最后的“n”位。

contents.text: 2) the base X.25 NUA of the line is removed from the called NUA. For example, if the called X.25 NUA is 23422120017010 and the PSDN subscriber NUA is 234221200170, then the subaddress derived from subtraction is 10.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 线路的基准X.25 NUA从被称为NUA的线路中删除。例如，如果被调用的X.25 NUA是234221120017010，而PSDN订户NUA是2342211200170，则从减法中派生的子地址是10。

contents.text: Obviously, the second method will not work if the incoming NUA varies.
contents.zh-CHS: 显然，如果传入的NUA发生变化，第二种方法将不起作用。

contents.text: ISDN Features
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN特性

contents.text: ISDN, like X.25, has a core set of features that are then enriched with options. In the original OFTP X.25 specification, it was decided that the Q-bit and D-bit options were not common to all networks or applications; they were therefore positively excluded from the specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 与X.25一样，ISDN也有一组核心功能，这些功能随后通过选项进行了丰富。在最初的OFTP X.25规范中，决定了Q位和D位选项并非所有网络或应用都通用；因此，他们被排除在规范之外。

contents.text: It is proposed that apart from the core ISDN features necessary to establish a call, no other features be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议除建立呼叫所需的核心ISDN功能外，不得使用其他功能。

contents.text: Subaddressing
contents.zh-CHS: 子寻址

contents.text: There are two forms of ISDN subaddressing, overdialled and specific.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN子地址有两种形式，过度指定和特定。

contents.text: The overdial method allows an ISDN number to be artificially extended. A typical case would be where a private exchange has been installed in a larger company. Assume that the base number is 394023 and the computer is on internal extension 1234, then by specifying an ISDN number of 3940231234, direct access may be made to the internal extension.
contents.zh-CHS: 过量法允许人工扩展ISDN号码。一个典型的例子是，大型公司安装了专用交换机。假设基本号码是394023，计算机位于内部分机1234上，则通过指定ISDN号码394023234，可以直接访问内部分机。

contents.text: The problem with this method is that it extends to called number and may, especially for international access, exceed the ISDN numbering limits between countries.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种方法的问题是，它扩展到被叫号码，并且可能超过国家间的ISDN号码限制，特别是对于国际接入。

contents.text: The other method of subaddressing is where a discrete subaddress is placed in a specific field in the ISDN call setup.
contents.zh-CHS: 子地址的另一种方法是，在ISDN呼叫设置中，将离散子地址放置在特定字段中。

contents.text: The problem with this method, is that it requires the caller to place the subaddress in the ISDN call setup. Not all ISDN implementations will allow this insertion.
contents.zh-CHS: 此方法的问题在于，它要求调用者在ISDN呼叫设置中放置子地址。并非所有ISDN实现都允许这种插入。

contents.text: In conclusion, subaddressing of any kind should be avoided.
contents.zh-CHS: 总之，应该避免任何类型的子寻址。

contents.text: D.4.4. Logical Channel Assignment
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.4. 逻辑信道分配

contents.text: An X.25 dataline will have associated with it a number of logical channels.
contents.zh-CHS: X.25数据线将与多个逻辑通道相关联。

contents.text: The number of channels is a part of the agreement between the PTT and the subscriber. The number of channels subscribed to is important; call failure and similar problems will result if the number of logical channels defined at the two remote ends are different.
contents.zh-CHS: 频道数量是PTT和订户之间协议的一部分。订阅的频道数量很重要；如果在两个远程端定义的逻辑通道数量不同，将导致呼叫失败和类似问题。

contents.text: If a DTE makes a call out, then the highest defined logical channel number will be selected. If the remote Data Communications Equipment (DCE) does not have the same number of logical channels defined, then an invalid logical channel is being used from the perspective of the recipient DCE and the call will be rejected.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DTE发出呼叫，则将选择定义的最高逻辑信道号。如果远程数据通信设备（DCE）没有定义相同数量的逻辑信道，则从接收方DCE的角度来看，正在使用无效的逻辑信道，呼叫将被拒绝。

contents.text: D.4.5. Facilities Negotiation
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.5. 设施谈判

contents.text: In the PSPDN environment, it is possible to subscribe to negotiation of window size and packet size. Although this negotiation requested by the originator's DTE may be propagated to the remote DTE at the discretion of the originator's DCE, it is a local responsibility between the DTE and DCE pair.
contents.zh-CHS: 在PSPDN环境中，可以订阅窗口大小和数据包大小的协商。尽管发端人的DTE请求的协商可以由发端人的DCE自行决定传播到远程DTE，但这是DTE和DCE对之间的本地责任。

contents.text: In the ISDN scenario where it is a DTE-DTE type connection, the window size and packet size may be left at the default value and consequently the values may be omitted from the call request. If no values are specified, then it is vital that both DTEs have configured themselves to the recommended defaults.
contents.zh-CHS: 在是DTE-DTE类型连接的ISDN场景中，窗口大小和分组大小可以保留在默认值，因此可以从呼叫请求中省略这些值。如果未指定任何值，则两个DTE必须将其自身配置为推荐的默认值。

contents.text: The symptom of a window size mismatch is a hang situation without any informational error codes.
contents.zh-CHS: 窗口大小不匹配的症状是没有任何信息性错误代码的挂起情况。

contents.text: The symptoms of a packet size mismatch could work in some scenarios, but would otherwise issue error codes indicating invalid packet sizes.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据包大小不匹配的症状在某些情况下可能会起作用，但在其他情况下会发出错误代码，指示数据包大小无效。

contents.text: Window Size
contents.zh-CHS: 窗口大小

contents.text: The CCITT X.25 window size has a default value of '2', although subscribers may have other default window sizes, e.g., '7', by virtue of agreement with the PTT.
contents.zh-CHS: CCITT X.25窗口大小的默认值为“2”，尽管订阅者可能有其他默认窗口大小，例如，根据与PTT的协议为“7”。

contents.text: Window size negotiation can be explicitly requested by specifying the requested window size in the Facilities fields in the Call Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过在呼叫请求数据包的设施字段中指定请求的窗口大小，可以显式请求窗口大小协商。

contents.text: Packet Size
contents.zh-CHS: 数据包大小

contents.text: The CCITT X.25 packet size has a default value of '128' octets, although subscribers may have other default values, e.g., '1024', agreed with the PTT.
contents.zh-CHS: CCITT X.25数据包大小的默认值为“128”个八位字节，尽管订户可能有其他默认值，例如与PTT商定的“1024”。

contents.text: D.4.6. ISDN Call Setup
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.6. ISDN呼叫设置

contents.text: The initial setup of an ISDN call is initiated with the transmission of a Q.931 SETUP command. Apart from requesting that a call be established, the SETUP command can optionally carry information about the calling party, the called party, routing information, the type of circuit required (e.g., voice or data), and information about the protocols that are requested to be established.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN呼叫的初始设置通过传输Q.931设置命令启动。除了请求建立呼叫之外，SETUP命令还可以选择性地携带关于呼叫方、被叫方、路由信息、所需电路类型（例如，语音或数据）的信息以及关于请求建立的协议的信息。

contents.text: Setup Parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 设置参数：

contents.text: Bearer capability Information transfer and access attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 承载能力信息传输和访问属性

contents.text: Called Party number Destination's network address
contents.zh-CHS: 被叫方号码目的地的网络地址

contents.text: Called Party subaddress Destination's complete address
contents.zh-CHS: 被叫方子地址目标的完整地址

contents.text: Calling Party number Source's network address
contents.zh-CHS: 主叫方号码源的网络地址

contents.text: Low-layer compatibility Layer 1-3 indication
contents.zh-CHS: 低层兼容层1-3指示

contents.text: High-layer compatibility Layer 4-7 indication
contents.zh-CHS: 高层兼容层4-7指示

contents.text: D.4.7. Homologation Issues
contents.zh-CHS: D.4.7. 认可问题

contents.text: Homologation procedures were adopted and vigorously enforced by the PTTs with respect to the quality and conformance of communications equipment connected to the services provided by the PTTs.
contents.zh-CHS: PTT在与PTT提供的服务相关的通信设备的质量和合规性方面采用并严格执行了认证程序。

contents.text: In particular, commercial X.25 products had to be tested and approved before they could be connected to the PTTs' PSPDN. The advantage of this to the subscriber was that there was very little chance of the approved equipment not working.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别是，商用X.25产品在连接到PTTs的PSPDN之前必须经过测试和批准。这对用户的好处是，认可的设备不工作的可能性很小。

contents.text: With ISDN, similar approval standards are still enforced. So the subscriber has the same confidence in their ISDN equipment. Wrong, the ISDN equipment itself is approved, but the X.15 protocol that operates on top of ISDN is now outside of the scope of approval services.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于ISDN，类似的批准标准仍在执行。因此，用户对其ISDN设备具有相同的信心。错，ISDN设备本身已获得批准，但在ISDN之上运行的X.15协议现在不在批准服务范围内。

contents.text: This means that quality of conformance to standards of X.25 over ISDN is subject to the variable quality procedures within the various ISDN equipment manufacturers.
contents.zh-CHS: 这意味着在ISDN上符合X.25标准的质量取决于各个ISDN设备制造商内部的可变质量程序。

contents.text: Although it is likely that commercial reputation will place pressure upon the manufacturers with a programming bug to correct such errors, it still requires the subscribers that do not communicate well to put time and effort into finding the party with the error.
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管商业声誉可能会对有编程缺陷的制造商施加压力，要求他们纠正此类错误，但仍需要沟通不畅的订户投入时间和精力找到错误方。

contents.text: So far, tests have shown a number of subtle errors, such as timing problems, that have taken many days to find, prove, and fix.
contents.zh-CHS: 到目前为止，测试已经显示了一些微妙的错误，比如时间问题，这些错误需要很多天才能发现、证明和修复。

contents.text: D.4.8. Growth
Primary Rate Access
contents.zh-CHS: 主速率访问

contents.text: If a user decides to plan for growth from the beginning, then the Primary Rate Access has apparent financial benefits. Such apparent savings are usually lost due to the increased cost of user hardware to support such an interface. The BRI for data usage is very common and cards/adapters are low in cost, whereas the PRI cards/adapters are few and far between and consequently highly priced.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果一个用户决定从一开始就计划增长，那么主要的费率访问具有明显的经济效益。由于支持这种接口的用户硬件成本增加，这种明显的节约通常会损失。用于数据使用的BRI非常常见，卡/适配器的成本较低，而PRI卡/适配器的数量很少，因此价格较高。

contents.text: Basic Rate Access
contents.zh-CHS: 基本费率接入

contents.text: One way to grow with ISDN is to buy multiple BRI lines, increasing slowly in units of 2 x B channels. The PTTs will be able to provide the same subscriber number for all the lines provided in a similar way to the traditional hunting group associated with PSTN type working.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN增长的一个方法是购买多条BRI线路，以2 x B通道为单位缓慢增长。PTT将能够以类似于与PSTN类型工作相关联的传统搜索组的方式为所有线路提供相同的用户号码。

contents.text: D.4.9. Performance

The obvious benefit of ISDN is speed; unfortunately, the majority of computer systems in use today have a finite amount of computing power available. The attachment of multiple active high-speed communication lines used in file transfer mode could take a significant amount of CPU resource to the detriment of other users on the system.
contents.zh-CHS: ISDN的明显优点是速度；不幸的是，目前使用的大多数计算机系统的可用计算能力有限。文件传输模式中使用的多条活动高速通信线路的连接可能占用大量CPU资源，对系统上的其他用户造成损害。

contents.text: Connecting an ISDN line with the default 2 B channels to your computer using an X.21 interface is going to give a consistent 64 Kb throughput only if one of the B channels is active at any one time.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用X.21接口将带有默认2个B通道的ISDN线路连接到您的计算机，仅当其中一个B通道在任何时间处于活动状态时，才能提供一致的64 Kb吞吐量。

contents.text: If there are two 64 Kb channels active and contending for a single 64 Kb X.21 interface, then effective throughput will be reduced significantly to just over 50%.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果有两个64 Kb通道处于活动状态，并争夺一个64 Kb X.21接口，则有效吞吐量将显著降低到略高于50%。

contents.text: Mainframe issues:
contents.zh-CHS: 大型机问题：

contents.text: Users with a mainframe front-end are also going to find cost an issue. The scanners that scan the communications interfaces are based upon aggregate throughput. A 64 Kb interface takes up a lot of cycles.
contents.zh-CHS: 拥有大型机前端的用户也会发现成本问题。扫描通信接口的扫描仪基于总吞吐量。64KB的接口占用大量的周期。

contents.text: Determining 'DTE' or 'DCE' Characteristics
contents.zh-CHS: 确定“DTE”或“DCE”特性

contents.text: The following section is an extract from the ISO/IEC 8208 (International Standards Organization, International Electrotechnical Commission) (1990-03-15) standard, which is an ISO extension of the CCITT X.25 standard.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下章节摘自ISO/IEC 8208（国际标准组织，国际电工委员会）（1990-03-15）标准，是CCITT X.25标准的ISO扩展。

contents.text: The restart procedure can be used to determine whether the DTE acts as a DCE or maintains its role as a DTE with respect to the logical channel selection during Virtual Call establishment and resolution of Virtual Call collision.
contents.zh-CHS: 重启过程可用于确定DTE在虚拟呼叫建立和解决虚拟呼叫冲突期间是否充当DCE或保持其作为DTE的角色。

contents.text: When prepared to initialise the Packet Layer, the DTE shall initiate the restart procedure (i.e., transmit a RESTART REQUEST packet). The determination is based on the response received from the data exchange equipment (DXE) as outlined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 当准备初始化数据包层时，DTE应启动重启程序（即，发送重启请求数据包）。该确定基于从数据交换设备（DXE）接收到的响应，如下所述。

contents.text: a) If the DTE receives a RESTART INDICATION packet with a restarting cause code that is not 'DTE Originated' (i.e., it came from a DCE), then the DTE shall maintain its role as a DTE.
contents.zh-CHS: a) 如果DTE接收到一个重启指示数据包，其重启原因代码不是“源自DTE”（即来自DCE），则DTE应保持其作为DTE的角色。

contents.text: b) If the DTE receives a RESTART INDICATION packet with a restarting cause code of 'DTE Originated' (i.e., it came from another DTE), then the DTE shall confirm the restart and act as a DCE.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 如果DTE收到重新启动指示数据包，其重新启动原因代码为“DTE起源”（即，它来自另一个DTE），则DTE应确认重新启动并充当DCE。

contents.text: c) If the DTE receives a RESTART INDICATION packet with a restarting cause code of 'DTE Originated' (i.e., it came from another DTE) and it does not have an unconfirmed RESTART REQUEST packet outstanding (i.e., a restart collision), then the DTE shall consider this restart procedure completed but shall take no further action except to transmit another RESTART REQUEST packet after some randomly chosen time delay.
contents.zh-CHS: c) 如果DTE接收到重新启动指示数据包，其重新启动原因代码为“DTE起源”（即，它来自另一个DTE），并且它没有未确认的重新启动请求数据包（即，重新启动冲突），然后DTE将考虑此重启过程完成，但不采取进一步行动，除非在某些随机选择的时间延迟之后发送另一个重启请求分组。

contents.text: d) If the DTE issues a RESTART REQUEST packet that is subsequently confirmed with a RESTART CONFIRMATION packet, then the DTE shall maintain its role as a DTE.
contents.zh-CHS: d) 如果DTE发出重新启动请求数据包，该数据包随后被重新启动确认数据包确认，则DTE应保持其作为DTE的角色。

contents.zh-CHS: 致谢

contents.zh-CHS: 本文件广泛引用了ODETTE文件传输规范[OFTP]第1.4版。

contents.zh-CHS: 许多人为本议定书的制定做出了贡献，特此确认他们的工作。
